1b1(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du.Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bud d+ha/ k+She tra
1b2(dkon brtsegs): gu Na b+hU ha na nA mA ma hA yA nasU tra/ bo skad du/ 'phags
1b3(dkon brtsegs): p a 'jam dpal gyi sangasargyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
2a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// /
2a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
2a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung
2a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa
2b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / ngan song sel dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa byung
2b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
2b3(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
2b4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / byang
2b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go/ / 'di lta ste/ lha ma
3a1(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po phrag rtsub dang /
3a2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dga' dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po thams cad kyang g.yog lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs cig go/
3a3(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang /
3a4(dkon brtsegs): 'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / klu'i rgyal po
3a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud las rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba'i bla ma la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po yul
3a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen
3b1(dkon brtsegs): po bzhi po thams cad kyang / g.yog brgya stong dum dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin kum bi ra dang / babrog gnas dang / khabaspu dang / yid babadra dang / blo gros bzang po dang / dbyib babadra dang / kun
3b2(dkon brtsegs): nas kha dog dang / gnod sbyin mi 'khrug pa dang / de dag dang gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thabs cig go// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por nye
3b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas shing bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag dang / 'khor bzhi
3b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas nas mchod cing gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / na bza' dang /
3b5(dkon brtsegs): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / spun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad bzang po mang po bzhes so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ shama?
3b6(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/
3b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos/ me tog ut+pa
4a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char chen po ni mngon par 'bebs/ sil snyan brgya stong ni dkrol nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po sa
4a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgra'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu phyub do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
4a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas zhabs gang dang gang du gzhag pa'i zhabs bzhig pa de dang der pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam 'dab ma ni gser/ chu ba ni
4a4(dkon brtsegs): dngul/ ze ba ni bain+d+haR+ShA/ snying po ni nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste/ pad+ma de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung bcas te 'dus
4a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pad+ma de dag dang bcas
4a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// skye bo rnams la phan mdzad ded dpon gang / yon gyi gnas gang
4a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba rnam mdzad pa/ shAkya khyu mchog blo zhi bdag nyid che/ 'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs// lha yi gnas su gang rnams rtsen pa dang / de bzhin rga dang 'chi las thar 'dod
4b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / / bdud kyi sde rnams pham par gang 'dod pa// des ni shAkya'i seng ge mchod par gyis// 'gro ba rnams la pham ning thugs bcu'i phyir// bskal pa bye bar spyad pa
4b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams spyod pa/ / thub pa rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'// thub pa de ring rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed// zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang // bu dang bu mo chung
4b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams dang ni/ / sbyin pa dpag med bsam las gang btang ba// kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs// lag parkang pa mig dang rna ba dang // sna dang yan lag dam pa mgo
4b4(dkon brtsegs): btang ste/ / kun btang yon tan ldan pa gtong 'dod pa// des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so// sbyin dang dul dang sdom la gang bslabs shing // skyes bu dam pa tshul
4b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims ma nyams pa/ / bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa// zhi ba'i thugs de grong du deng gshegaso so// sdug bsngal bying ba'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas//
4b6(dkon brtsegs): brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing // bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan// tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring grong khyer gshegs// drang srong chen po de yi shes
4b7(dkon brtsegs): rab ni/ / mtshungs med nam mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu med// bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang // spyod pa dang ni rnam par smin pas sbyangs// blo ldan gang gis bdud
5a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sde bcom zhing / / mi g.yo go' phang mya ngan med pa brnyes// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab bskor te// chos kyi dbang phyug doni sto khyer gshegs//
5a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa'i sku// bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni// snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems zhog ste// mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi thang du song /
5a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang // de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa// de ni ston pa'i thang du nyer song la// mchod pa rnam mang mtha' yas myur du gyis// tshangs pa
5a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang / / brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing // lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtsen dga' ba// de ni thub pa mchod phyir nye bar song // gling bzhi'i bdag po rgyal
5a5(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur bya zhing / / rin chen mchog bdun rang gis thob pa dang // bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa// sems can mchog la des myur mchod pa gyis// khyim bdag chong
5a6(dkon brtsegs): dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang / / mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang // longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa// don dang song thub la mchod pa gyis// gang sunam
5a7(dkon brtsegs): par grol dang 'grol ba kun/ / thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te// 'dren pa rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon gyis// de phyir chos nyan du ni deng myur ngeng / de nas rgyal
5b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi mong khyer chen po nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bskul nas/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams me tog dang /
5b2(dkon brtsegs): bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i phur ma thogs/ gser dang dngul gyi me tog gi phur ma thogs/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs rnga bo
5b3(dkon brtsegs): che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar dzA dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra snyan dang / gling bu dang / khur dkrol dang / kim pa la dang / na ku la dang / pi wang
5b4(dkon brtsegs): thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod
5b5(dkon brtsegs): pabapar 'gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa sgo'i them pa la gzhag ma thag tu de
5b6(dkon brtsegs): nas grong khyer thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ lha dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu bab ste/ sems can long
5b7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos/ sems can spros pa rnams ni dran pa thob/ sems can yid brel ba rnams ni rtse gcig pa
6a1(dkon brtsegs): thob/ sems can gcer bu rnams ni gos rnyed/ sems can bkren pa rnams ni zas rnyed/ sems can dbul po rnams ni nor rnyed do// de'i tshe na sems
6a2(dkon brtsegs): can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin
6a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs
6a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas skyes bu'i seng ge che/ / stobs bcu grong khyer nam gshegs tshe// de yi mod la skye bo rnams// bde ba rgya chen dri med thob// long ba'i mig rnams mthong bar gyur// 'on pa thos pa'i
6a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu yang skye/ / smyos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed// yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no// gcer bu dag ni gos rnyed de/ bkres pa dag gis zas thob bo// skyes bu gang su dbul po yang // dga'
6a6(dkon brtsegs): bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur/ / lha rnams bye ba mang po yang // mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod// smra ba'i seng ge mchod pa'i phyir// me tog char yang rab tu 'bebs//
6a7(dkon brtsegs): dza dang rdza rje sil snyan dung // nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis// grong khyer 'jug tshe sgra yang byung // grong khyer kun tu rab g.yos te// de tshe
6b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams dga' mnyam par gnas/ / skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas// dga' ba shin tu rgya chen thob// 'dod chags kyis ni mi gzir zhing // de tshe khro blun ser sna med// nga rgyal la sog
6b2(dkon brtsegs): nyes pas kyang / / gzir ba de tshe ma lus med// dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste// mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur// gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po// skye bo de phyir grong gshen
6b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ mi yi ma yin sil snyan rnams// ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung // 'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas// bde gshegs 'od kyis rgyas par gang // de ltar gang tshe sangs
6b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ni/ / 'grol phan phyir grong gshegs pa// de tshe ngo mtshar rmed byung ba// rnam pa mang po rab tu gda'// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
6b5(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen por gshegs pa dang / tshong dpon shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong bar zhig na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems
6b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sdig bcom gyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/ dul ba dang zhi
6b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas mchog gis pha rol tu byon pa/ bsdams pa/ glang po ltar dbang po thul ba// mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
7a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan brgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mtho
7a2(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to/ / de sems shin tu dad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
7a3(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom
7a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang
7a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan+da na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
7a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po
7a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong ma po dag kyang lhag
7b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / bar snang las kyang lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// de nas
7b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na myur
7b3(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa
7b4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'ang yongs su 'dzin to/ / chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas
7b5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/ / de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni gang
7b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas mi dge ba'i las gang yang mi spyod pa'o/ / ci mi spyod ce na/ 'dod chags mi spyod/ zhe sdang mi spyod/ gti mug mi spyod/ khyim pa'i
7b7(dkon brtsegs): rtags la sred pa mi spyod do/ rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa mi 'dod cing / gang rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no// de la
8a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
8a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi chos thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so// phung po lnga rab tu
8a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na/ phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par rab tu
8a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o// gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi shes/ rlom sems mi
8a5(dkon brtsegs): byedami rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa de chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa
8a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo // de ci'i phyir
8a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na des ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang / sems can dang chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa
8b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang rten ba rnam gcig su 'di dang ldan nA/ sbyar dab med pa yang drug byar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par badzud du ning / sangs rgyas kyi ring yongs su spyod/ r
8b2(dkon brtsegs): gyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa dri lta bu'ang yongs su 'dzin to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di
8b3(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la mngon
8b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags so/ / 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i srogs chags
8b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzub pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs
8b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
8b7(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang
9a1(dkon brtsegs): bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//
9a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal che
9a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// 'dren pa khyod ni rgyal ba'i stobs la mnga'// khyod ni thams
9a4(dkon brtsegs): cod mkhyen par 'jig rten grags/ / ci yi spyad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs// thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen// de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen// da
9a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa/ / ci srad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsungs// rab 'bring tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa yi// sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen// chag
9a6(dkon brtsegs): grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin/ / mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung bstan gsol// lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te// skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing // skye bo chos spyod
9a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag kun sdod kyis/ / thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol// khyod ni ye shes pha rol phyin// khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa// ci zhig slong
9b1(dkon brtsegs): badzum pa bstan/ / bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag/ chos rnams btsal ba'i slad du 'dir lpalhags te// de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag/ dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal
9b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mchis/ / khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams// rab tu bzang zhing mang brdung bar bgyid// skye bo mang po the tsom 'tshal ba kun// thub pa deng 'dir the tsom myur gcad gso
9b3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
9b4(dkon brtsegs): po sdig bcom 'di shing ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags/
9b5(dkon brtsegs): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na/ bla na med
9b6(dkon brtsegs): papa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin
9b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ kun dga' bo dper na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
10a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sem
10a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi
10a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing na'ang de las mi lhag mi thub par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal nas// bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas gshegs te/ mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i
10a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa dag la 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma
10a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas/ bdag nyid lag dar te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bzang po mang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge
10a6(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshims par byas so/ / bstabs te tshims par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol ba dang lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas/ bcom ldan
10a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la ras bcos bu zung rin thang med pa sku la gsol to/ / skal gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te/ stan ran pa zhig blangs nas phyogs gcig
10b1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab
10b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang nas 'byung ba lags/ mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags/ mi shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la
10b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las gnod sems dang / tha ba dang // zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngar 'dzin
10b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang nyes pa mi shes te/ de bas na mi shes pa zhes bya'o// gang ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes
10b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de la ni shes pa 'am/ mi shes pa zhes gdags par mi nus so// de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro ba dang / gang nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdagra
10b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ltar brlabs par bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po gang gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba med do// gang la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa
10b7(dkon brtsegs): de la skye ba med 'gag pa med de/ gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa'o// shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba'am/ nges par mi
11a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang myi shes pa'i phyir ro/ / gang gi rmo nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges byar mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa ro / ye shes can
11a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes dkyus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
11a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag par skabs 'di kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na ni/ bdag nyi
11a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs
11a5(dkon brtsegs): bstod/ yong dag par rab tu dka' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te kau shegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan
11a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan
11a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ ri'i rgyal po bye rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byor nas/ 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa
11b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ ri'i rgyal po
11b2(dkon brtsegs): bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khor
11b3(dkon brtsegs): do/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/ lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su
11b4(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun du ba dar nas/ lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
11b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
11b6(dkon brtsegs): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par
11b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa'i sgra'ang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
12a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
12a2(dkon brtsegs): bdar nas/ lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
12a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khri ga brgya stong du ma ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan
12a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/
12a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
12a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
12a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po sdig bcom gyis/ gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa la brtsams te/ yongs su zhus pa de'i lan bcom
12b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las
12b2(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te/ ji ltar spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud
12b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba/
12b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
12b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen
12b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid mthob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba
12b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di ni rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba 'dus shing mchis pa gang rnams/ bcom ldan 'das
13a1(dkon brtsegs): las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas/ ji ltar thob pa bzhin du
13a2(dkon brtsegs): tan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par byas na 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyi/ ngas ji lta
13a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas nas/ phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la/ 'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
13a4(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing / de dag 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis mnan nas/ phyir mig
13a5(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyi 'od kyi 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / me dang / skar ma'i gzugs dang / sems
13a6(dkon brtsegs): can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' ya sa mu med pa'i 'khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / btang bzung dang
13a7(dkon brtsegs): btang bzung chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / nagra tshal de dag thams cad 'od zer de dag gis
13b1(dkon brtsegs): thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par bya'o snyam du sems so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas/ gsung bsal
13b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs
13b3(dkon brtsegs): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
13b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang
13b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi skra ga ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
13b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i cho gas re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya brgya yod do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems
13b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de/ bcom
14a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing chos spyod pa'i spyan snun/ shing
14a2(dkon brtsegs): bdun srid tsam du bar sdang yi 'phags te/ lus mi sdang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sna snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi chos ston to//
14a3(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgra tsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi
14a4(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa'ang zag la/ sgra'ang 'byin te/ gzugs yongs su grub pa'ang mi snang ngo // sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no// gzugs ji lta ba
14a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no snyam mo/ / de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems
14a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsungs bsal ba'i sgra de'i ngo thos te/ mthong
14a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
14b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ bcom ldan
14b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po'ang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen
14b3(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba 'di lta bu ni sngon ma mthong ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
14b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtse gis rgyal pos/ byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po chos paphags la 'di skad ces gaka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
14b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
14b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
14b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpab bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag
15a1(dkon brtsegs): btang ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems
15a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
15a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen pakur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la'ang blta ba dang
15a4(dkon brtsegs): chos de'ang nyan du mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod da de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
15a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug khri sum stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs po che sa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang
15a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so//
15a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe/ byang chub sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub
15b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
15b2(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus mo nu ba tsam du gang bar gyur to/ / sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra'ang byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
15b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to/ / spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par med par gyur to//
15b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig
15b5(dkon brtsegs): tu bcom ldan 'das shA kya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tete/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
15b6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khord do// yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung
15b7(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes
16a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
16a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med do/ / yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i
16a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na/ yang rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
16a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas/ lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // chos rin po che'i sgra dang / dge 'dun rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //
16a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyo
16a6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / / de dag dang gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na rin po che zhes bya'o// byang chub sems
16a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lag na rin po ches snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis sgyings pa
16b1(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
16b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po de 'jig rten
16b3(dkon brtsegs): du byung zhing / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po'ang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sa
16b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
16b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
16b6(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i
16b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra phyung ngo / / yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/ der byang chub sems
17a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i rtsal gyis
17a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgyings pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ga na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
17a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la'ang blta ba
17a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod der song ste ci rung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis
17a5(dkon brtsegs): khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang phrad pas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni sdug bsngal ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches
17a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
17a7(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su 'dzin//
17b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas kyang sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa
17b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan par bya'o zhes yun ring po nas smon lam btab par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni
17b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces
17b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du
17b5(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dka'
17b6(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni 'byung bar dka' 'o// de mthong ba'ang rnyed par dka' 'o// bcom ldan 'das
17b7(dkon brtsegs): des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu bsgrim par gyis shig/ smas par gyur ta re/ de ci'i/
18a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba'o// de na sems can gzhan de dag kyang gtum zhing khrob
18a2(dkon brtsegs): dag go/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la
18a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der smas par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag la ni rjes su chag
18a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma mchis/ khong khro ba'ang ma mchis na/ bdag ci'i slang du smras par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la sems can thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gshe zhing spros te/
18a5(dkon brtsegs): bsdigs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste/ sems can gang la'ang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
18a6(dkon brtsegs): pa seng ge'i rtsal d+hI sgyings pa des/ rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed las gang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang
18a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin par spro ba de rigs kyi byudi dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der deng zhig/ bcom ldan 'das nges tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
18b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin
18b2(dkon brtsegs): par spro ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong
18b3(dkon brtsegs): gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpal
18b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po la ga na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing / sems can tshad med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya/
18b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas pas bka ba nas/ la
18b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / de bzhin du bzhon pa dang / gos dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang
18b7(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos
19a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang / de na sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang / sems
19a2(dkon brtsegs): can gang nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon
19a3(dkon brtsegs): par byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bsten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom
19a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
19a5(dkon brtsegs): smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
19a6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da
19a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bai DUR+Ya bzang po 'ba' zhig las mngon par grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mnyan
19b1(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo // yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'
19b2(dkon brtsegs): gang rnams 'gro'ang rung / 'od yang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / ldang yang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ de dag gis bai DUR+Ya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
19b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de mthong ngo / / 'di lta ste/ dper na shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
19b4(dkon brtsegs): bai DUR+Ya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo / / mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang de dag la lung ston to// de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob po
19b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su'ang nor bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste/ nor bu rin po che
19b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang / me tog kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par/ nyi ma
19b7(dkon brtsegs): dang zla bar mngon pa'ang med/ nyin mtshan du mngon pa'ang med do// yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems
20a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros
20a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de ga la
20a3(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
20a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba
20a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po'ang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyog
20a6(dkon brtsegs): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na
20a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa
20b1(dkon brtsegs): des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad
20b2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing / gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di
20b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
20b4(dkon brtsegs): de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de'ang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
20b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la da bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
20b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
20b7(dkon brtsegs): mjed 'dir gnas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
21a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thang du 'gro bar bya snyam mo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par/
21a2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
21a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me'ang rab tu zhi bar
21a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / sems can gang dag bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams
21a5(dkon brtsegs): cad bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral zhing / bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de
21a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid la sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas/ skad cig de nyid la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ khro ba'am/ nga rgyal lam/
21a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chab pa 'am/ 'tshig pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna'am/ g.yo 'am/ tha ba 'am/ gnod sems kyis gzir ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can
21b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas
21b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo glo kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
21b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
21b4(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
21b5(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gnyis pa/ yang de'i tshe byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung stong phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bye ma snyed
21b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba
21b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur
22a1(dkon brtsegs): smig 'chang ba sha stag go/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
22a2(dkon brtsegs): gos ngur smrig gyon cing skyil mo krung bcas par rdzus te 'byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
22a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston to/ / de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
22a4(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa/ gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/ sems mi g.yeng ba/ gtong ba rjes su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/
22a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa la/ yang dag par sgrub pa/ smon lam med pa tshol ba/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chag
22a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa/ de la mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ de dag la yongs su rtogs pa med pa/ rtogs pa yang dag par chad pa de'ang mi mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas
22a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ / yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rig+sas kyi bu de'i smon lam
22b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyad par ni 'di lta bu ste/ sems can ji snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong na/ de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba
22b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po
22b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu
22b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i
22b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'byung ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten bu byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces
22b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba des/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
22b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
23a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
23a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des/ gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i
23a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed bgyi/
23a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 'dod chag la mi mjed/ zhe sdang la mi mjed/ gti mug la mi mjed/ sdug bsngal la mi mdze
23a5(dkon brtsegs): de/ de'i phyire 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag las/ la la spros pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdeg
23a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang / gauti mug gi sems sel ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rig
23a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las/ gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las phal cher ni gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang mang ste/ 'dod
23b1(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab po// gal te sems can de dag bzod par 'gyur na ni de'ang
23b2(dkon brtsegs): rung na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mi mjed bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi bu dang / rig
23b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bzod pa dang / dul ba dang
23b4(dkon brtsegs): nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis spros/ bsdigs/ mtshon gyis btab kyang ji snyam mi mjed de/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrog
23b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ / rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mi mjed ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'ang de na sems can kha cig sdig
23b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ mu cor smra ba/ khro ba/ gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mi gus pa/
23b7(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du spros shing smad de gnod par byas shing skur kyang / bcom ldan 'das de snying rje che bas bzod cing dang du len te/ sa dang mnyam/
24a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa/ de bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed/ bsti stang mi byed kyang 'dud par mi byed de/ de spyos shing brgyad kyang
24a2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrog/ mi chags/ mi skye ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
24a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i skad ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
24a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der de tsam du smad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
24a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang dang shar gyi mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
24a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams rab tu bde ba
24a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan no/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no// yang rigs kyi bu 'jig rten
24b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa der lo bye ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa bas ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam srid du sems can thams cad la byams
24b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed na/ gong nyin mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
24b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
24b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba
24b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de'ang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus
24b6(dkon brtsegs): la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing / lhan
24b7(dkon brtsegs): cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma
25a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i thang du 'gro snyam nas
25a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang / rin po che'i
25a3(dkon brtsegs): gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab/ sil snyan brgya stong yang 'khrol/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan brgya
25a4(dkon brtsegs): stong yang mngon par 'phyang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang
25a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen phran
25a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma
25a7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
25b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
25b2(dkon brtsegs): pab byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag
25b3(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang
25b4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
25b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang dag stong gsum gyi
25b6(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
25b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de'ang thos nas/ bcom
26a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
26a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas/
26a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa ji snyed pa de dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / 'jig
26a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas
26a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang chu zheng ci 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa'ang de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas mthong ba dang / sangs
26a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir
26a7(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad
26b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po de mthong nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
26b2(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// phyogs ba
26b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo/ / 'jig rten lcer bcas 'dir ni lam me ste// thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyis// tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas/ phyogs
26b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa/ / chos tshol spang du de ring 'dir lhags shing // bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas gnas// smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs//
26b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa// tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis// seng ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes te// nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du
26b6(dkon brtsegs): gsal/ / lha dang mi dang lha min gsang ba dang // dge bsnyen pho mo dge slong dge slong ma// thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis// bcom ldan phan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol//
26b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // da ltar yang ni shin tu nges par mkhyen// lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la// the tsom chen po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol// thub pa rgyal
27a1(dkon brtsegs): sras ji ltar spyad pas na/ / zhing rnams dag pa rdul med thob par 'gyur// ji ltar smon lam grub pa thob 'gyur ba// de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol//
27a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi gos shing // ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang // sdig pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang // brnyas pa dag kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod// sdug bsngal du mas
27a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzir ba yi/ / 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du// bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams// ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing spyod par 'gyur// rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig
27a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam gzhag cing / / bsam gtan gnas pa spyod yul rnam dag ste// pad+ma chu yi nyes pas mi gos ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'gyur// thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing //
27a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan 'gyur// brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas// byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
27a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gad na shoms shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdan
27a7(dkon brtsegs): de la bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa/ dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
27b1(dkon brtsegs): bshad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag gdan bting du bcug ste/
27b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' ma stsa la/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'dings su bcug pa las na/ gtam 'di ni byang
27b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtsams nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i gtam zhig 'byung ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bstan pa
27b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ de bzhin
27b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i seng go'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa/ rin po che du mas sbas pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/ shing bal ltar 'jam pa reg na bde ba bshams nas/ khri de'i 'od kyis
27b6(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma de las bzhengs nas/ seng ge'i khri de las bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das seng
27b7(dkon brtsegs): ge'i khri nga la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
28a1(dkon brtsegs): bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi bsam pas
28a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bzhugs pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
28a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam las
28a4(dkon brtsegs): mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
28a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang 'dun po skyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces gal te
28a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na/ sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces smras te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i
28a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni skye ba thams cad du rab tu 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung //
28b1(dkon brtsegs): ma byung yang rung / gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin
28b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba
28b3(dkon brtsegs): dang dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang / de chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam
28b4(dkon brtsegs): par spong ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la brten pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / de la
28b5(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dga' ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dka' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de dag yong
28b6(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod
28b7(dkon brtsegs): pas rgyun du rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu chos gcig pu de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs
29a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi
29a2(dkon brtsegs): nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyu ro/ gnyis gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/ nyan
29a3(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi sten/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi spro ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang
29a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang de bzhin pa dang / gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
29a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
29a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa dang / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
29a7(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrogs shing chos ston pa dang / 'di lta ste/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung
29b1(dkon brtsegs): ba rgya chen po skyed pa dang / mi gyur na'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog
29b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o// shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
29b3(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas/ gang rigs
29b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la gzhag na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan
29b5(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu sangs
29b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung ba yod na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa'ang yod par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i
29b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ / shA ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
30a1(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams
30a2(dkon brtsegs): shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// gsum gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zang
30a3(dkon brtsegs): zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o// shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa
30a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par kha zas za ba dang / mi 'jigs par
30a5(dkon brtsegs): gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lung 'bogs pa dang / mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung
30a6(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman
30a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo//
30b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin de shes kyi
30b2(dkon brtsegs): khe mi 'dod pa yin/ de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyim la ser sna med pa yin/ de gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo
30b3(dkon brtsegs): byang ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa yin/ de
30b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems skyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to//
30b5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon bcu yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di 'du 'dzi rnam par spong ba dang /
30b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dben pa la sten pa dang / de bsam gtan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang / de'i lus bde ba dang mi
30b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par spyod pa bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshegs chung ngus ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / des tshig dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chud mi za ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos
31a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phar yon bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu
