31a2(dkon brtsegs): chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sem dpa' smon lam las mi nyam shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/
31a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden par rma
31a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ nga rgyal tshar gcad pa'i phyir zhugra ging phrag dog dang ser sna yod+ha su spangs pa yin/ pha rol 'byor pa la yid dga' ba yi no/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par smra ba'i byang
31a5(dkon brtsegs): / chub se ma pa'i phar son te/ bani gang nem 'di lta ste/ de'i khanas ut+pa li'i dri dang 'byung ba dang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang lhar bcas pa'i
31a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing tshig 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang
31a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon no/ / shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ ba'i gang zhen
31b1(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dri ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnga mo dang / ba glang dang / bong bu dang / rta'i skye gnas dang / de bzhin du gzhan smad par skye ba rnam
31b2(dkon brtsegs): par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyiso phyag bya
31b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon yin no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su
31b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de gtong ba'i sem+ba la mi rmodadra pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang / de tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'odra ni khyim gyi
31b5(dkon brtsegs): sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i gtong ba dang len pa la su'ang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni phrag dog dang ser sA yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems
31b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i phan yon no/ / shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gis
31b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag gzung ste/ bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas/ 'di dag la bde bar sbar ba bya ba yin na/ sems can 'di dag rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs
32a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod kyis bde bar 'tshe'o zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu la sogs pa dang / bgo skal la spyod pa
32a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang // longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyid pa
32a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po'ang dga' bar 'gyur na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de longs spyod dang kun spyod pa rgya chen po la sems 'jug pa ste/ shA
32a4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ / shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dgo dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing
32a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing /
32a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
32a7(dkon brtsegs): g i yon tan bkod pa rnam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kun tu tshol zhing de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag
32b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sgrub pa de kun yongasu 'dri zhing / des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
32b2(dkon brtsegs): su dag par skye bar smon cing / de tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon pa de dang der skyes te/ de der skyes nas de
32b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa'am/ longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa phun
32b4(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs dpa'i thad du song nas/ bcom ldan
32b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyad na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun zhus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen
32b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing / yang dag par rab tu 'chad de/ des de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan
32b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spong ngo //
33a1(dkon brtsegs): de la ye shes ni gang / bya ba ni gang zhe na/ ye shes zhes bya ba ni gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni ye shes te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o// bya
33a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni gang / 'byung ba ni
33a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ rgyu zhes bya ba ni gang 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/ gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de ni tshul bzhin
33a4(dkon brtsegs): la brtson pa yin te/ de la tshul bzhin la sbyor ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'byung ba'ang de nyid yin no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems
33a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/ zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang / zhing gi ngo bo nyid ni gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba
33a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni ming tsam mo/ / zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo// gang ming tsam pa de dben par shes shing / ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos lnga
33a7(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing / yongs su sbyong ngo //
33b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / 'jig rten thams cad
33b2(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ drug gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/ de dngos po gang
33b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa yid du 'ong ba/ / mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ba de dag yongs su btang yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / yid dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes
33b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'di ltar gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par smon pas bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang / theg pa chen po dang / bya ba chen po yongs su rdzogs
33b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par mi nus so snyam du rtog go// des de ltar brtags nas bdog pa thams cad yongs
33b6(dkon brtsegs): su gtong bar 'gyur te/ des rang gi lus dang srog yongs su gtang yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur na/ gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang / chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo
33b7(dkon brtsegs): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems
34a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir de byang chu bathob pas nathams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//
34a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa'ang rung / rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa
34a3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da' 'o// gang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par bzung ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
34a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spod de/ de tshangs par spyod cing
34a5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do/ / de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ro so sor rtog pa la gnos pa ni
34a6(dkon brtsegs): zab mo la bzod pa skye'o/ / zab mo la bzod pa skyes pa ni lta ba drang por 'gyur ro// lta ba drang ba ni yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la
34a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur ro// skrag pas 'byung ba tshol lo// 'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag sdug
34b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la nye bar zhi ba ma gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan med do snyam mo// de de ltar so sor
34b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa na snying rje chen po 'thob bo/ / de cher snying rje bas thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang
34b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de bzod pa'i go cha gyon cing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan pa ma yin no// de spros rgyud brdegs bsdigs kyang bzod pa spro ba ste/ pha rol la mi 'khrug
34b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod par mi sems so/ / de 'di ltar sems skyed do// gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi tho bas brdegaso shing bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par gshe'ang / bdag gi
34b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni ma bslabs pa/ bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bslab par 'dod pa'o snyam nas
34b6(dkon brtsegs): de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis spros pa dang / rgyad pa dang / brdeg pa de lta de lta bur snying rje chen po skyed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o// bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go
34b7(dkon brtsegs): cha bgos nas/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ba yin te/ bdag gis 'di dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya'i// bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems
35a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par ni mi bya'o/ / // de de ltar bzod pa'i go cha bgos pas/ phun sum tshogs pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun
35a2(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos nyan pa
35a3(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos la nan tan byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa 'thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu
35a4(dkon brtsegs): babazod pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phun sum tshogs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos yongs su bsgrub
35a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams shing / yi dam la brtan pa yin no// de 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar yang 'khor
35a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o zhes tshul 'di dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di dang / spyod pa 'di dang / sems zhi ba 'di dang / yi dam 'di dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'di dang / snying rje ba'i sems 'dis sems can 'di dag thams kyi ched
35a7(dkon brtsegs): du bskal pa de snye du 'khor bar byas te/ 'di ltar bdag gis sem+ba tson 'di dag yongasu mi gtang ngo snyam nas brtson 'grus rtsom mo// yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sem dpa' gang gri/ d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sarba
35b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te/ sems bskyed pa sems bskyed pa tsam la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin te/ tshul 'di
35b2(dkon brtsegs): dang stobs bskyed pa 'dis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa snying rje chen po la gnas pas/ 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go
35b3(dkon brtsegs): cha'i sems bskyed na/ de de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyod do// shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ nges 'di lta ste/ des
35b4(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i spyod pa spangs pa yin/ des sangs rgyas kyi spyod po yongs su bzung ba yin/ des 'khor ba la nyes par 'du shes bskyed pa yin/ des snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba yin/ sngon dam bcas pa la
35b5(dkon brtsegs): las mi 'gyur ba yin/ nad nyung ba yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin byas pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
35b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug chung ba yin/ ji ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa yin/ nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems
35b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/
36a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni thugs rtse gcig pa/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
36a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya na/ sems g.yengs pa dang brjed ngas pas ni gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te/ gnas 'di thob par mi nus so snyam nas/ de chags pa
36a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang / 'thob pa dang bkur sti thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal la chags pa thams cad dang / grogs po dang / gla mi dang / khyim
36a4(dkon brtsegs): la sred pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su mi btang ngo snyam nas/ dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin/
36a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bse ru ltar gcig pu spyod cing de dgon pa rab tu dgon pa dag tu gnas nas phyogs gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du tshad med pa
36a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do/ / byams pa la gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro// yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa
36a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas pa bas
36b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang rab tu dben pa 'dod cing / dgon pa logs su phyogs te gom pa bdun dor na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// ches myur du byang chub thob par
36b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni dben par gnas shing bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin/
36b3(dkon brtsegs): gros dang ldan pa yin/ rtog pa dang ldan pa yin/ mos pa dang ldan pa yin/ myur du spobs pa rab tu thob pa yin/ gzungs sgrub pa yin/ skye ba dang 'jigs pa la mkhas pa thob pa
36b4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ tshul khrims kyi phung po las mi nyams pa yin/ lha rnams kyang de la rim gro byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi 'byor pa la mi 'dod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu bcu po de dag ni dben pa la gnas
36b5(dkon brtsegs): shing / bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de
36b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar shes rab gang nas byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las byung ba ste/ shes rab byung ba las chos dkar po thams
36b7(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par 'phel lo snyam nas/ de shes rab la slob ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / sngags kyi gnas dang / sman gyi gnas dang / gang bya dka' ba dang /
37a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub dka' ba'i las de dag thams cad la slob bo// bslabs nas kyang de 'di ltar sems skyed de/ gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab 'di ni yid 'byung bar ma yin/ 'dod
37a2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral bar ma yin/ 'gog par ma yin/ zhi bar ma yin/ mngon par shes par ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ma yin/ dge sbyong du ma yin/ mya ngan las 'da'
37a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bzo rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / sngags rnam pa de lta bu dang / sman rnam pa de lta bu dang
37a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rnam pa de lta bu yongs su btsal lo snyam nas/ de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol lo// de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol ba na/ chos gang yang chos
37a5(dkon brtsegs): gang la nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab tu zhi bar spyod pa la gnas
37a6(dkon brtsegs): rnas yongs su mi mi 'argyud do/ / yongs su yi mi 'chad pas sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tsu bar bya ba'i phyir 'amams pa'i na
37a7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa 'dzin te/ shA ri'i bu chos drug po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing smon lam las mi
37b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams la/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu
37b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo // bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta
37b3(dkon brtsegs): ste bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / sbyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyang skyon med la/ tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang / bzod cing des la/ se
37b4(dkon brtsegs): can de'ang mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems de'ang mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan yang yongs su sgrub la/ de'ang mi gnas pa'i bsam
37b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan la bsam gtan pa dang / shes rab kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ de rtog pa'ang med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyang rjes su dran la/ de mtshan ma'ang sel ba ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bdun
37b6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos
37b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sem dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu stong ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang / rgyan sbyin pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang /
38a1(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba la bsti stang byed pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang / kun bged pa'i ngang tshul can dang / bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi spong ba ste/
38a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyod do// / bam po gsum pa/
38a3(dkon brtsegs): / shA ri'i bu chos dgu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
38a4(dkon brtsegs): lus sdom pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang / yid sdom pa dang / 'dod chags bsal ba dang / zhe sdang bsal ba dang / gti mug bsal ba dang / slu ba med pa dang / mdza' ba bstan pa dang / dge ba'i
38a5(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen la brnyas pa med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong bar byed do//
38a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems
38a7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jig shing snying rje ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jin
38b1(dkon brtsegs): shing snying rje ba dang / lha rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / mi rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dbul ba dang / mu ge dang / rkun po dang / rang rta dang / dmag gi gnod pa
38b2(dkon brtsegs): thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba ste/ de 'di snyam du ci nas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul med cing / bsams pa
38b3(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/ nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la/ bla na med pa yang dag par
38b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas kyi bar du brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
38b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub dpa' me tog khyer zhing de bzhin gshegs pa
38b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du song nas 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ me tog de ji ltar dri zhim la/ kha dog bzang zhing blta na sdug ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang mdzes pa
38b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur cig ces bya bar
39a1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed do/ / de bzhin du sbyar te phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
39a2(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel lam/ byu ru'i bar du gang ci 'bul yang rung ste/ de thams
39a3(dkon brtsegs): cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub pa'i don du yongs su bsngo zhing tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa
39a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni su la'ang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig mi brjod cing / yid du 'ong ba'i
39a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang gis kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos te/ yid 'ong ba'i sgra sha stag thos par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i
39a6(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis bde ba yongs su mi tshol zhing / gzhan bde bas dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bde
39a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dam pas tshim par 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par blangs shing smra ba ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de
39b1(dkon brtsegs): de'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i
39b2(dkon brtsegs): las kyi lam dang ldan zhing 'byung ba'i shes rab can du 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yul ga na 'dug kyang rung ste/ yul der skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam//
39b3(dkon brtsegs): khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ sems can gang ji snyed cig des mthong ba de thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / su la'ang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi brjod cing /
39b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
39b5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i
39b6(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi rnyed pa mi 'phrog cing / gzhan gyis thob na dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed
39b7(dkon brtsegs): cig skyes pa de thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos kyi thob pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge slong
40a1(dkon brtsegs): du / skye/ / la s+ho// dbyung /
