40b4(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsams pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis gang thos na de yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur bar mdor
40b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan to/ / shA ri'i bu chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / ji ltar
40b6(dkon brtsegs): bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag yod par gnas pa dang / ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa
40b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / smon lam gyi khyad par te/ shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
41a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya zhing / ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
41a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni bag mchis
41a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas so/ / byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
41a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni bag yod pa la gnas so// byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs
41a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub bo/ / shA ri'i bu sngon ngas ji ltar smon lam btab pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'grub bo// shA ri'i bu nga bag yod pa la gnas pas smon lam
41a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs so/ / shA ri'i bu ngas nan tan byas pas byang chub thob bo// shA ri'i bu ba ga med par gnas shing / tshig gi las lhur len pa dang nan tan med pas ni nyan thos kyi sa'ang bsgrub
41a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos te/ shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i ming du gdags par dam 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i byed
41b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/ / de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong so so'i stan las langs te/
41b2(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab
41b3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi'o/ / nan tan gyis yongs su bsgrub par bgyi'o// bag mchis par gnas par bgyi'o// smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa
41b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ / ji ltar bsams pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
41b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags
41b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di skad du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//
41b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rigs bu 'di dag thams cad bskal pa brgya phrag stong 'das nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ba
42a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu dper na seng ge zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung ba ngas gzigs pa de bzhin du
42a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ming smon lam bkod pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs
42a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de
42a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad ni ma gtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi tshe'i tshad tshim zhig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
42a5(dkon brtsegs): stsasprul pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re zhing tshe'i tshad bskal pa bcu bcur 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal
42a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
42a7(dkon brtsegs): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur
42b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par
42b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems
42b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig
42b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
42b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo la ci khyod bla na
42b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs sam/ 'on te ma zhugs shes je dris shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gal te kho bo byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
42b7(dkon brtsegs): na ni/ de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang yang rgyan/ kho bo yang dag par zhugs pa med pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sem can rnams
43a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can
43a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gal te kho bos sems can zhig dmigs na ni/ de'i phyir kho bo'ang de dag gi don du byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug na/ rig kyi bu gang gi phyir
43a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can yang med/ srog kyang med/ gang zag kyang med pa de'i phyir kho bo 'jug pa med do// ldog pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma zhugs sam
43a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig kyi bu chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ste/ chos gang zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa med la/ mtshan
43a5(dkon brtsegs): ma med cing mtshan nyid med pa de ni sangs rgyas su zhugs pa yin te/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang 'dra bas/ sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang mi 'dra ba med do// rigs kyi bu
43a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don du ma zhugs sam zhes smras pa de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lung ston cig/ rigs kyi bu
43a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu smon tam/ 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs
43b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dben pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu smon/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te gzugs rang bzhin nam/
43b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/
43b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ gzugs byang chub tu smon pa med do// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs/
43b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi stong pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi chos nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa med do// gzugs ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba ste/ gzugs
43b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
43b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa byang chub tu smon tam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub tu smon tam/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs
43b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ spras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
44a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa ni byang chub
44a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po
44a3(dkon brtsegs): lnga po dag las phyi rol du bdag gam/ bdag gi zhes bya bar gdags par nus sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta yin na byang chub tu ston pa'i chos
44a4(dkon brtsegs): de gang zhig yod/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gi dbang du
44a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pas kho bo byang chub tu smon pa med do// kho bo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bshad na/ bstan pa de thos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa
44a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams skrag par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skrag pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni skrag pa med do// skrag pa med par bya ba'i
44a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos ste/ gang skrag pa de ni skyo bar 'gyur ro// gang skyo bar gyur pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni
44b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'grol lo/ / gang rnam par grol ba de ni bcing ba med par 'gyur ro// gang bcings pa med pa de ni chags par mi 'gyur ro// gang chags pa med pa de ni 'gro ba med do//
44b2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'gro ba med pa de ni 'ong ba med do// gang 'ong ba med pa de ni smon pa med do// gang smon pa med pa de ni smon lam 'debs pa med do// gang smon lam 'debs pa med pa de ni ldog pa med
44b3(dkon brtsegs): do/ gang ldog pa med pa de ni phyir ldog ste/ ci las phyir ldog ce na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang
44b4(dkon brtsegs): chad par 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go// rnam par rtog pa las phyir ldog go/ nam phyir ldog pa de ni de'i tshe 'gyur ba med pas phyir mi
44b5(dkon brtsegs): ldog ste/ gang las phyir mi ldog ce na/ stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog go// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir ldog go//
44b6(dkon brtsegs): de la gang las phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bral ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// khongs su gtogs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// dmigs
44b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ / len pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// dor ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// rgyu ba med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa
45a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ming tsam du zad pa dang / stong pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
45a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba dang / rdul med pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang / bdag gi po med pa dang / yid la bya ba med pa dang / mi ldan pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / blangs pa med pa dang / mnyam pa med
45a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
45a4(dkon brtsegs): dag la gang las 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya bar brjod par bya ba'i gnas mi dmigs so/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa gang gis bstan pa 'di thos
45a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang 'jigs pa ma gyur pa de dag ni ci'ang mngon par rdzogs
45a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams shing de skad ston/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par rtogs par 'gyur te/ gang
45a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa de dag ni 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pas/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa ji snyed
45b1(dkon brtsegs): du skyed par gyur pa de snyed du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / gang dag de lta bu'i sems mi skyed pa de dag ni byang chub tu dmigs pa med cing / sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed do//
45b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems su dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do// gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do// de ci'i phyir ci'ang
45b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med ce na/ byang chub de mi dmigs pas de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i
45b4(dkon brtsegs): khams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams
45b5(dkon brtsegs): cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan mod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de
45b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ byang chub ji lta bar nam mkha' yang de bzhin te/ nam mkha' dang byang chub ni gnyisu med de gnyis su dbyer med do// gang gis de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes na de ni cung zad kyang
45b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med la/ des ma shes pa'ang gang yang med do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong khri nyis stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha dang mi khri bzhi stong chos
46a1(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi mig rdul dang / bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag go/ srog chags dgu khri drug stong gis sngon ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
46a2(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
46a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po seng gi'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang
46a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kha rog/ chos rnams ma skyes pa la bdag rnam par rtog tu ma gzhug/ rigs kyi bu gang la la
46a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bya'o zhes zer na/ de nyid de'i log par lta ba chen por 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni
46a6(dkon brtsegs): sems gang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ de ltar bdag gis sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas byang chub tu'ang sems ma bskyed do// /
46a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig de'i don gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid bstan to// smras
46b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni gang la tha dad pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i
46b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul du tshul gcig tu bstan pas ro gcig tu brjod cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / mi skye ba med pa dang //
46b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gag pa med pa dang / nga'i ba med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i phyir chos ston cing / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du
46b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos nyid khong du chud pa de ni khams la tha dad par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gcig/
46b5(dkon brtsegs): tu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa med pa'o// mi mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas dag pa'o//
46b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon
46b7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa 'di ni ji srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bgyi bar mi ston te/ 'khor 'di dag ni nyan par 'tshal lo// bcom
47a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ de'ang ji tsam du byang chub kyang mi dmigs
47a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang mi dmigs pa de tsam du bab pa'i bzod pa dang ldan te/ des byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pas ngas 'di srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bya bar mi ston na/
47a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bstan par bya'o// rigs
47a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag bdun 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa
47a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i dbyings kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
47a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs
47a7(dkon brtsegs): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya ba byung ste/ de na bcom ldan 'das de
47b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'brug smra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de chos ston to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur/
47b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni des nyis 'gyur du gyur te/ de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/
47b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba de bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen 'dab dang / 'khor du bcas pas las gzhan med cing skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshes
47b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du zhal zas kyi rnam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa
47b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / na bza' gsar pa gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / pho brang khang pa brtsegs pa gsar pa gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / rim gro ba
47b6(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis rim gror byas par gyur to// de ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu
47b7(dkon brtsegs): dben pa na gnas shing gnyis su med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de dag nges pa
48a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ med pa'i sems kyis 'dus byas na/ de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su bsngo bar bya'o snyam nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i 'di brgya byin du bats+tsha
48a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ tshangs par bsngo'am/ 'khor los sgyur bar bsngo 'am/ nyan thos su bsngo 'am/ rang sangs rgyas su bsngo 'am/ gang du bsngo snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu rgyal po
48a3(dkon brtsegs): de sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu steng gi bar snang las lha mang pos sgra bsgrags pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyis bsod nams kyi phung po yangs
48a4(dkon brtsegs): pa byas kyis/ rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig ces byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po
48a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur te/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis bdag gis sems yongs su shes te sgra bsgrags so snyam
48a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam mkha' de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
48a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
48b1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod do/ / rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
48b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ / khyod kyi spyan sngar dam chos zhu/ skyes bu dam par mchog skye bar// rnam pa gang gis 'gyur ba de// rnam par 'dren pos bdag la gsungs//
48b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du/ mchod pa yangs pa bgyid bgyid kyang // mo nges sems kyis bgyi gyur gyi// gar yang yongs su bsdom bgyis// bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas
48b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe'adi 'dra'i ses shig skyes par gyur/ / bdag gis bsod nams che bsags na// ji ltar yongs su de bsngo snyam// tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam// gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par
48b5(dkon brtsegs): ram/ 'on te nyan thos dngos por ram// rang rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam// de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag/ lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni// dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod nams
48b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di/ rnam par chud gson ma byed cig/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis// byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing // 'jig rten rnams kyi
48b7(dkon brtsegs): don yang gyis/ / de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste// thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na// rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur// ye shes de ni gang gis
49a1(dkon brtsegs): thob/ / don de bdag la bstan du gsol// byang chub sems ni bskyed byas shing // thub pa khyod 'drar ba dag kyang smon// de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas/
49a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po shes par gyis// rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya// chos rnams thams cad rkyen bzhin te// 'dun pa'i rtsa la rab
49a3(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas/ / gang gis smon lam ci btab pa// de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// rgyal po ngas kyang sngan chad ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur// sems can kun la
49a4(dkon brtsegs): phan don du/ / ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab// smon lam ji ltar btab tshul du// ngas ni 'bras bu thob par gyur// byang chub dam pa ngas thob pas// nga yi bsam pa rdzogs par 'gyur//
49a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po brtan gyi sa la// mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis// gal te spyod pa spang byas na// khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// thub pa'i gsung de thos gyur nas// rgyal po
49a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni dga' bar gyur/ / 'jig rten kun gyi mngon sum du// seng ge'i nga ror tshigo 'di brjod// 'khor ba tha ma med pa yi// sngon gyi mtha' ni ji srid du// de srid sems can phan don du//
49a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// 'gro ba thams cad mgron gnyer te// dbul zhing 'phongs las sgrol
49b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ / de ring phan chad gal te yang // bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par bya// byang chub
49b2(dkon brtsegs): nam zhig thob par du/ / tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang // phrag dog dang ni ser sA yang // de ring phyin chad mi bya'o// tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad// sdig pa'i 'dod pa yo
49b3(dkon brtsegs): su btang / / tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la// sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya// bdag ni byang chub rings tshul du// 'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba med// phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang //
49b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyor bar bya// phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du// bdag gi ming ni thos par bya//
49b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te// sangs rgyas 'gyur ba dogs pa med// bdag gis lhag bos ma rnam par dag/ bdag dbang 'di na 'dren pa rnams// lus dang ngag gi las rnams
49b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang / / rnam pa kun tu bdag gis sbyangs// yid kyi las kyang snang bar bya// mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya// ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te// 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na// bden
49b7(dkon brtsegs): ba des ni sa 'di yang / / rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig/ bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod po// ma nor yang dag sus shes na// bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las// sil
50a1(dkon brtsegs): spyan dag gi sgra grag shog/ bdag la gal teg mo med cing // de bzhin tha ba med cin// mngar ba'i me tog bzang // bden pa des ni car du pog/ yangs/
50a2(dkon brtsegs): don du nges pa yi// tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang // phyogs brgya mtha' yas thams cad kyi// bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// de yi mod la mkha' dbyings nas// sil
50a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i sgra yang byung / / me tog mnad rab dag/ mi 'grong bdun srid bab par gyur// rgyal po de yi rjes bslabs te// srog chags bye ba nyi shu yis// 'dren par bdag cag
50a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur smon ces/ / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags// de ltar srog chags bye ba phrag/ nyi shu po rnams thams cad kyang // rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing // byang chub mchog tu
50a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par gyur/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//
50a6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu sems bskyed kyi
50a7(dkon brtsegs): chad bskal pa gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag 'dun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to/ / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas kyang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur te/ de nas
50b1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bzung nas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs so/ / 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongs su rdzogs so// 'di sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs so// 'di sangs
50b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/ bar 'ga' yang des bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/ mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur to// rigs
50b3(dkon brtsegs): kyibu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar/ rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad kyang tha
50b4(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas/ sangs
50b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /
50b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud de/ thams cad la'ang bsnyen bkur dang yongs su spyad pa byas so// thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos
50b7(dkon brtsegs): bzung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ma gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi khri bzhi stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
51a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams sa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med pa dang / sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par
51a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa ste/ de da ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tsho'o// gzhes so// sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
51a3(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal
51a4(dkon brtsegs): te de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang yongs su rdzogs/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa cu'ang yongs su rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
51a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs na/ ci'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
51a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs na/ yang dang yang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs
51a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgyar med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des byang chub thob par gyur pas thob zin pa ni gzod thob par mi bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs shes bya ba ji lta
51b1(dkon brtsegs): / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o// nam mkha' yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/
51b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de ltar nam mkha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
51b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin zhes de skad zer ba la/ gang gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs
51b4(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
51b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mthong
51b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo / / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos gang rtag pa'ang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin pa de la yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni med do// /
51b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar chos gang yongs su rdzogs pa'ang med/ 'grib pa'ang med pa de ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ cis yongs su rdzogs shes bya/
52a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ des chos ji ra shes pa de ltar ma shes 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang gi mal shes 'jug pa gyur pa de'i dzi mdog nam par matog go// gang sa chos ma rnam par martog par
52a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ 'bri bar byed pa med de/ gang yongs su rdzogs pa la/ 'khrib ba med pa na nyam panyid do// rigs kyi bri lta bsan gzugs ni mnyam pa nyid mthong ba ga ma
52a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o//
52a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de ltar khyod yun ring po nas bzod
52a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thob kyang bdag gis byang chub thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang skye ba med na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang dag par gzung bar bya// smras pa
52a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can dben pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gang gis sems can
52a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa des ni byang chub kyang dmigs/ gang gis byang chub dmigs pa de ni byang chub la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni byang chub kyang ma dmigs//
52b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yang ma dmigs pas/ de ltar byang chub la sems can rnams 'dzud par mi byed do// mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa byed pa'ang med/ de las ldog pa'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam
52b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pas de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do/ / ldog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed rnams la gang nas kyang 'ong ba dang / gang du'ang 'gro ba med de/ de ni mnyam pa
52b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid do/ / rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste/ stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du de ltar yun ring po nas bzod pa thob na
52b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ci'i phyir bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems mi skyed ces zer ba ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems gang gis byang chub thob par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes
52b5(dkon brtsegs): su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas/ byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/ yid las byung ba ma yin pas byang chub
52b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba 'am/ sems shes bya ba ni ming tsam ste/ ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de las bsams nas/ bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyam du sems
52b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa med do zhes smras pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni ma skyes pa ste/ ma skyes pa la skye ba med do// gang skye ba med pa de la thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba'ang gang zhig yod/ smras pa/
53a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang chos thams cad la rlom sems med cing / mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa 'di ni mngon par
53a2(dkon brtsegs): / rtogs pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar rdul tsam gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed mi 'gog pa de ltar rtogs pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin nyid dang mnor ba de bzhin nyid ni rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ni mngon
53a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ / yang dag pa'i lta bas zhugs te/ mnyam pa nyid la chos gang yang mi dmigs shing ma dmigs pas/ gcig pa 'am tha dad par mi byed cing rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni mngon par
53a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ / chos thams cad gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing shes kyang lus la'ang mngon par zhen pa med/ sems la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa
53a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa thob pa zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal thob pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni rgyu ba med pa'i tshig ste/ de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// de'i rgyu ba khams gsum na
53a6(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad du 'di yin no zhes bstan du med de/ 'phags pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa de ni brjod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni gnas med cing rgyu ba med pas de'i phyir brjod par mi nus so// rigs kyi
53a7(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang de ni thob pa med pa las thob pa'i sgrar brjod pa ste/ de ni chos gang yang thob pa'ang ma yin/ ma thob pa'ang ma yin pas de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// / bam po bzhi pa
53b1(dkon brtsegs): ste tha ma'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam
53b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
53b3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
53b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub la mngon par dga' ba de la dris shig
53b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub la mngon par dga' ba ma yin nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mngon par dga' ba de ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'o//
53b6(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de ni sred pa'o// sred pa gang la yod pa de ni skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba gang la yod pa de la tshor ba yod do// gang la tshor ba yod pa de la 'byung ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de lta
53b7(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ kho bo byang chub la mngon par dga' ba med de/ byang chub tu dmigs pa med pas de'i phyir mngon par dga' ba med do// rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/
54a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa jil bu zhig tu 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ de la bdag gis bdag bstod par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir ne na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams
54a2(dkon brtsegs): cad thugs su chud pa mngon sum du bzhugs bzhin du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i bdag bskyed du 'gyur ro//
54a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam ston cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen
54a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod las smon lam de dag zos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang spyod pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin
54a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bka' la slar mi zlog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pastan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/
54a6(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lpang sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 'atud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
54a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba dag bdag la nyan cing smon lam de dag thos nas kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid na bdag gis
54b1(dkon brtsegs): na pa gyi'o/ / de wa 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pas bus ma galas pa'i ltungs la tsugs ma pa gtu nas skad cig de la phyogs bcu'i dag na gyi khams gang+gA krung gi kris na nas pan
54b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsal pa bye ba zug khrig phrag 'bum phrag brgya stong grangs ma
54b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ sangs rgyas bcom
54b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa dang / bdag gis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud pa dang / de bzhin
54b5(dkon brtsegs): du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis bskul ba dang / bdag gis rjes su bstan par gyur par
54b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i/ nam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcur rnam par bltas kyang /
54b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid la ma bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu gang yang mthong bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang za na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
55a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/ / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' la la 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis
55a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
55a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu gang la la zhig skyes par gyur te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
55a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdul phra rab tu grags shing bshig ste thal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag cis shes pa'am/ rtsis la shin tu mkhas padag gis
55a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/ stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe 'am/ 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/ bye ba zag 'di snyed cig yod do na 'am/ bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe 'am/
55a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/ bye ba brgya stong 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhes shes pa 'am/ bgrang ba'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom
55a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas rnam par bltas na
55b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
55b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig la gang+gA'i klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsam gyi thag grur yangs par yongs su ma grub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i phyir rin po che
55b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong 'bum phrag du ma las grub pa dang / rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du mas spras pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du ma gyur gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi
55b4(dkon brtsegs): bar smon lam btab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes te/ byang
55b5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad rgyas shing khyab par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis byang chub kyi shing de'i
55b6(dkon brtsegs): drung du bdag 'dug pa'i cha/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs kyang bdag
55b7(dkon brtsegs): gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de
56a1(dkon brtsegs): skad btab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming tsam yang ye med par gyur te/ nga
56a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' zhe sdang dang / tha ba dang / 'chab pa med pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par spyod pa sha stag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi
56a3(dkon brtsegs): grag cing mngal du skye ba med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon cing skyil mo krung bcas par rdzus te byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de shin tu dag par gyur te/
56a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par gshegs shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag theg pa gsum las brtsams te/ mos
56a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar gyur cig ces bgyi
56a6(dkon brtsegs): bar smon lam de skad btab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol
56a7(dkon brtsegs): to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas na ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
56b1(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ci'i phyir kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa
56b2(dkon brtsegs): des/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa kun gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs
56b3(dkon brtsegs): bde mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang sran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu da ltar byung ba'i dus sam/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste/
56b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan gang gis thos pa de dag ni mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa dang / mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma
56b5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya'o//
56b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis dga' ba'i thas
56b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur bar smon lam mdzad pa lta bu'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag kha zas kyi
57a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes shig skyes par gyur na/ de ma thag tu skad cig des de dag gi 'ag pa g.yas par ro bro ba brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i snod mngon du byung bar gyur la/ snod
57a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lam phul/ sems can dbul zhing 'phongs pas sdug bsngal ba dang / mgon
57a3(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur pa dag dang yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du sme ba gang dag lo stong phrag du mar yang mchil ma'i thal ba 'ga' yang mi rnyed pa de lta bu dag yongs su tshim par ma byas par/ bdag nyid kyis bza'
57a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o zhes bgyi bar dran pa thob par gyur cing / de'i mod la de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su grub par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing nam mkha' las mchi ba dang /
57a5(dkon brtsegs): rlung ltar thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis padag tu phyin nas/ kha zas de las de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
57a6(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa la'ang phul/ sems can 'phongs shing ltogs pa dang mgon ma mchis pa rnams dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongs su tshim par bgyis nas/ de dag la chos
57a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan te/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der slar mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis ni bdag byang chub
57b1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i tshe/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag gos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod dang ldan par gyur te/ bsams pa tsam gyis ci
57b2(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i gos rin po che dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa rung ba dag kyang byung bar gyur la/ gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis gos 'di lta bu phyogs bcu'i sangs
57b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul bar/ bdag cag nyid kyis yongs su spyad pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o snyam pa'i dran pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu/ 'jig rten
57b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mchis shing / gos de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bkab ste/ slar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mchis nas ci dga' ba'i gos rin po
57b5(dkon brtsegs): che la spyod par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs
57b6(dkon brtsegs): su spyod pa gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag la phul nas/ slad kyis bdag cag yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
57b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi dge ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sdug bsngal gyi sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
58a1(dkon brtsegs): de na skyon du 'gyur ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gzugs dang / bla dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa yid du mi 'ong ba ma mchis par gyur cig ces bgyi bar
58a2(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ga'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
58a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
58a4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs shing dag la rdul med pa bsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de
58a5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gang logs shig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de ni lho phyogs logs su 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
58a6(dkon brtsegs): mjed 'di nyid kyang de'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
58a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gis ni smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas gang zhing / nor bu rin po che du mas spras pas/ nor bu rin po che kun tu
58b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'dra la/ rin po che de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dkon la/ sngon chad ma mthong la mi srid pa sha stag ste/ de dag gi ming brjod na'ang lo bya ba brgya stong thogs
58b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nor bu rin po che dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su gang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gser las
58b3(dkon brtsegs): grub par mthong bar dga' 'o snyam na'ang des gser las grub par mthong ba dang / dngul las grub par mthong bar dga' 'o snyam na'ang dngul grub par mthong la/ gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong
58b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bai DUR+Ya las grub pa dang / shel las grub pa dang / mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang / rdo'i snying po las grub pa dang / spug las grub pa dang /
58b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las grub pa dang / tsan dan las grub pa 'am/ a ka ru las grub pa 'am/ ta ka ra las grub pa'am/ ta ma la'i lo ma las grub pa'am/ tsan dan sprul
58b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi snying po las grub pa'am/ tsan dan dmar po las grub pa 'am/ su rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du mthong ste/ phan tshun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par mthong ba'ang na
58b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub shing de las 'od byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rang rang las 'od byung bas snang zhing gsal ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od
59a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi mngon/ skar ma dang / rin po che dang / zhugs dang / glog gam/ sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang / gang dag ji tsam du 'od kyis khyab
59a2(dkon brtsegs): par gda' ba/ tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed du de dag gi 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me
59a3(dkon brtsegs): tog kha bye ba dang / bzum par 'gyur ba dang / gang dus dang tshod rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su spyad par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i 'grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming yang ma mchis pa dang /
59a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na grang ba dang tsha ba'ang ma mchis/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'ang ma mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de 'jig
59a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas su tshe bas par bgyis nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gi bar snang las sil snyan ltar
59a6(dkon brtsegs): mi gda' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sgra 'byin pa dang / sil snyan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan bI sgra mi 'byung gi/ gzhan du na pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang
59a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba dang /
59b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta bar 'tshal na 'chag gam/ 'gro 'am/ 'ong ngam/ sdod dam/ mchis kyang rung ste/ gang dag der sangs rgyas blta ba'i
59b2(dkon brtsegs): yid la bgyi bar skyes ma thag tu/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de de nyid na bzhugs par
59b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar gyur cing / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag tu de dag gi the tsom mam/ nem nur ram/ ying gnyis sam/ chos kyi som nyi gang ci mchis pa yongs su chad par gyur te/
59b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongs su 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo// de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mgrin
59b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu smras pa/ gang 'di kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan de ni tshul dang 'dra ba ste/ sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de
59b6(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa lta ci smos te/ gang dag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag gis 'jam dpal
59b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
60a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi mtshan brjod
60a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bas ni/ gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na/ 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa
60a3(dkon brtsegs): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi don ji snyed du byas pa'i sems can gyi don de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang
60a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mdzad do/ / de nas 'khor de'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang /
60a5(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag
60a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ / de skad ces brjod pa dang / de'i mod la srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to// sems
60a7(dkon brtsegs): can tshad med pa dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam
60b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag na/
60b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang / smon lam gyi rgyan dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod pa dang / gnas kyi rnam
60b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi bkod pa dang / snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par de dag thams cad bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dang /
60b4(dkon brtsegs): khongs su chud par bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal na bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te
60b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug las gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam/ de bas kyang ring du bshad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthar thug
60b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam gyi rnam pa gang ci 'dra ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par dbang du gyur pa gzhan gang
60b7(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
61a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ni thogs pa med de/ dus gsum kun tu 'jug go/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du
61a2(dkon brtsegs): sems par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
61a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de gnyis 'dra 'am/ 'od te mi 'dra snyam pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
61a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi
61a5(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i chas/ rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thig pa gcig blangs na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems chu blangs pa de dang phyin las pa de gnyis gang sang bar 'gyur/
61a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung / slad nA las pa ni tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i chas
61a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa de tsam du ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ /
61b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po na chu'i lhag ma ji snyed cig yod pa de tsam du ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs
61b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces
61b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan la la la mnga' bar gyur tam
61b4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bar 'gyur ram/ da ltar la la na de lta bu mnga' ba lta'ang bzhugs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar
61b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams smon lam la rab tu gnas pas mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
61b6(dkon brtsegs): d e bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun na 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pas da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
61b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
62a1(dkon brtsegs): / zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
62a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de gnyis mtshungs te lhag chad med do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
62a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go bgos pa 'jug pa chen pos zhugs pa gang 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid la gnas pa bzhi yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sangs rgyas
62a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'ang 'di dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ / gsol bapa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ming bstan du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na
62a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dang
62a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad/
62a7(dkon brtsegs): du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gcig ni 'od kyi tog ces bya ste/ shar phyogs
62b1(dkon brtsegs): logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go/ / gnyis pa ni ye shes bla ma zhes bya ste/ lho phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de
62b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go/ gsum pa ni zhi ba'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ nub phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab
62b3(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go/ / bzhi pa ni smon lam blo gros shes bya ste/ byang phyogs logs ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i sangs rgyas kyi
62b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing na 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mngon
62b5(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ bcom ldan
62b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngan chad ma mthong ma thos shing bsam gyis mi khyab
62b7(dkon brtsegs): la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pa'i lag na skyu ru ra'i 'bru 'dug pa mthong ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sangs rgyas
63a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'di nas kun tu snang bar gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po de'ang sku tha mal bar
63a2(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad brgya khri bzhi stong mnga' ba ste/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi ri bo ltar mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tshad
63a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi khri nyis stong tsam du gyur pa sha stag gis bskor cing mdun gyis byas te/ byang chub kyi shing yon tan bkod pa du mas rab tu brgyan pa'i drung na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig
63a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong mngon par sprul pa mdzad de/ sprul pa de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por drong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo //
63a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / byang
63a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i tshogs phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' brgya khri bzhi stong stan las ladwa te/ thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang mgrin gcig/
63a7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba'i spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas
63b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas
63b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog dum dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / l+ye brgan dang / shel dang / dngul
63b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi kha dog lta bu mang po 'thon par gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
63b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces

63b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya khri bzhi stong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
63b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brgya khri bzhi stong po de dag las skyes bu dam pa bcu drug gis ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par bsam pa thag pas
64a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig brjod de/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'ang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin
64a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / lhag ma rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag gi

64a4(dkon brtsegs): lhag chad med par 'gyur ro/ / byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa gces spras byed pa la ltos/ tshig tu brjod par 'dra'ang gang gis lhag pa'i
64a5(dkon brtsegs): babasam pas bsam pa thag pa nas tshig tu brjod pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod bdag ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bzhin du gyur to//
64a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis dma' ba'i sems dang dang pa tsam gyis tshig tu brjod pa de dag kyang las dma' ba des bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil te/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su
64a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'od kyi tog dang / ye shes bla ma dang / zhi ba'i dbang po dang / smon lam blo gros dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtseg
64b1(dkon brtsegs): pa baiDUR+Ya'i mdog tu 'dug pa mtshungs pa med par bzang ba dag gi nang du zhugs te/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam pa drug tu

64b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ lhags nas kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis

65a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bzhi nas snang chen pos snang bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs
65a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'ongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gos gyon pa 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la
65a3(dkon brtsegs): rim gro skyed la chos dris shig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu dang

65a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag nyi shur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur cig/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bud med gcig gis bdag cag gi ming thos na'ang myur du bud med kyi lus las 'gyur
65a6(dkon brtsegs): bar shog cig ces bya ba de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dag go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan te/ rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir brtul ba mdzad pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing

65b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma sprul pa'ang bgyid/ sgyu ma ma mchis par yang bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye'ang skye/ 'gag
65b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'gag ste/ gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang
65b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
65b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob ma bshig cing / gang la'ang yod pa'am/ med par
65b5(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dmigs su med pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/ med pas kyang mi 'thob bam/ smras pa
65b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/ yod par ma gyur mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'thob par 'gyur ba med do// smras pa/ 'jam
65b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pas de skad du ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang
66a1(dkon brtsegs): phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la/ dmus long yang ma yin/ sha'i mig can yang ma yin zhing / chos gang la'ang
66a2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos gang la'ang 'phel ba dang 'grib par mi mthong ba 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng
66a3(dkon brtsegs): ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal zhing chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos
66a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos so/ / 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed cing gang 'di dben pa'i tshul gcig la 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi tshul
66a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bstan pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid la'ang zhugs la de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / 'di ni zab bo zhes bya bar
66a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad kyi mi zad pa gang
66a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni shin tu zad pa ste/ gang chos thams cad mi zad par chos ston pa de ni chos nyid las mi 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//
66b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems pas smras pa/ gang bsam pas bsam du med pa la 'jug/ bsam du med pa med pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing mi dmigs pa
66b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral bas smras pa/ gang 'dod chags dang shin tu bral ba de ni mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod
66b3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'ang med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang med/ rjes su chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med/ rmongs pa'ang myed/ gcig tu byed pa'ang med/ gnyis su byed pa'ang med/

66b5(dkon brtsegs): mchos smras pa/ gang rgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos la zhugs pa de chos la'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos ston cing bdag dang
66b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du rlom sems su mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ / zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ gang sems can thams cad la mnyam
66b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyi zla ba lta bur gyur kyang / sems can de dag la'ang rlom sems med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa
67a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rtun bcad pa de ni mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do// sems can rnams ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang
67a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'o/ / de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/ gang 'dir ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems
67a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mi dmigs pas smras pa/ gang 'dod pa'i khams la'ang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
67a4(dkon brtsegs): chos la'ang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta bas smras pa/ gang chos ston na gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid
67a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis mnyam pa nyid du ston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems
