67b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba nub pas smras pa/ gang chos rnams cad 'dra ba med par snang shes shi / ji ltar shes pa bzhin nga ston pa/ 'di lta/ chos thams cad brjod
67b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' zab mor spyod pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi
67b3(dkon brtsegs): zab pa nyid kyang shes la/ chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang ston pa dang / gang la bstan pa dang / gang bstan pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa
67b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang gi
67b5(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa ston par gyur to/ / tshul gcig tu bsnun pa'i chos kyi sgo 'odi bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun nu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sros
67b6(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bani ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par n+d+har to/ / dge slong bdun stong ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las
67b7(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol lo/ / lha dang me'i skye dgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas bcom
68a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
68a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
68a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal gzhon
68a4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
68a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi/
68a6(dkon brtsegs): tshenam mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe
68a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag bzang pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
68b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya'o/ / gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang / zag cha dang / mig sor dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang
68b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor gyur la/ zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
68b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de lta yin gyis/ su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu mi smon nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
68b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyid kyang byang chub la/ byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni ming tsam mo//
68b5(dkon brtsegs): ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa ste stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng
68b6(dkon brtsegs): ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sbal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan
68b7(dkon brtsegs): thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong ngo // thos so// bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gsol pa/ @
69a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / bde bar gshegs pa de ni bzang du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
69a2(dkon brtsegs): yul ma ga d+ha'i til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig cig blangs na/ rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig pu de ji lta ba de ltar bur ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / 1
69a3(dkon brtsegs): thos 'dus par blta'o/ / phyi na til gyi lhag ma las pa ltar ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o// rigs kyi
69a4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar glags te rdul phra rab tu byas pa de la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyis bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu
69a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ / stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bzang
69a6(dkon brtsegs): bdang / rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe tshad ni tshad med grangs med
69a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu glags te thal bar byas la/ de las skyes bu la la
69b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ der rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig gzhag ste/ skyes bu des
69b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad zad du bkod par gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab
69b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdul re re nas tshul de bzhin du bor te/ de bzhin phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re re nas bor na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems
69b4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ / stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod
69b5(dkon brtsegs): do/ / bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// gtam
69b6(dkon brtsegs): phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ / dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
69b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni mi nus so/ / bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
70a1(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig 'das pa dang / gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btags te/
70a2(dkon brtsegs): rdul phra rab tu glags na/ rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa 'am/ rtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di skad cig yod do// brgya
70a3(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ / bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod

70a5(dkon brtsegs): dozhes bya bar shes pa 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpe de la ni sems can rnams myos par 'gyur gyi/ don
70a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni rdul phra rab de dag bgrang
70a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ / stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed
70b1(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do/ / bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed
70b2(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do/ / dkrigs phrag ni 'di skyed cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su
70b3(dkon brtsegs): chud do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i
70b4(dkon brtsegs): slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen po ra sreg kyang / bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges bzod par
70b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ / de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sems can mos
70b6(dkon brtsegs): pa chung ngu dang / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po la 'dod pa mi skye/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog chags khri byang chub
70b7(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
71a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ga dag tu d+hinaH
71a2(dkon brtsegs): rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te mabor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu grags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par
71a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ de byang chub thob pa'i
71a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i tshad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' seng
71a5(dkon brtsegs): ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed du'ang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i
71a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa chen po ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das spyod pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam pa'i sems 'di
71a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du zhag dang / nyi ma dang / rdzab phyed dang / dus dang / lo dang / bskal ba dang / bskal ba brgya dang / bskal bstong dang / bzhal pa bye ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig dang /
71b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so snyam du sems sam/ sbas pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
71b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha'i khams lta bur long
71b3(dkon brtsegs): du chud de/ ci nas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to// nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du la
71b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtog go/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la'ang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i
71b5(dkon brtsegs): khams ni bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang / skyo zhing yongs su yi chad pa med de/ nam mkha'i khams la skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ tshig pa 'am/
71b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par
71b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni skyo ba dang / yongs su yi chad pa'i sems mi skyed do// rigs kyi bu gang la nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba de la ni tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/
72a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med/ rgab med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang la 'jam dpal
72a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la'ang tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med//
72a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
72a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam
72a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa lta smos kyang
72a6(dkon brtsegs): ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o//
72a7(dkon brtsegs): bklag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so// de nas bcom
72b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
72b2(dkon brtsegs): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgyid dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher bstan pa dang / gang 'jam
72b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab po zhes sems skyed pa des bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
72b4(dkon brtsegs): g dus las phyogs brgyar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyus kyi lhan sgri pa mad pas sa rnas kyi dzid ky-i khrig pa de rnams cad rin pa che bdun gyis yongs bz
72b5(dkon brtsegs): hin gshegs pa re re la phul ba dang / rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te/ phyi ma'i
72b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chung ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/
72b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par byed dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sems skyed cing gom pa bdun 'dor na/ bsod
73a1(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi gro'o//
73a2(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
73a3(dkon brtsegs): gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe
73a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sgyu ma lta bur byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
73a5(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu/ 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar
73a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug cing rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam
73a7(dkon brtsegs): dusems te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por cig car du snang bar gyur pa ni smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes
73b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi khyad par ngo mtshar tshe'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes par gyur to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad
73b2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de bas na chos kyi rnam
73b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung
73b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig/ byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin
73b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod
73b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma sangs rgyas/ deng ni bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i seng ge'i sgra dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du
73b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod do/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klu gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// sems cad tshad med
74a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub
74a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang
74a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
74a4(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bco lnga pa
74a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so/ / / sho lo ka stong sum brgya bzhi bcu'o// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/
74a6(dkon brtsegs): skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pi ta pu tra sA ma ga man nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du
74a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa yab sras mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / / bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs
74b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grol bgrol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dul bdul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ zhi bzhi pa'i

75b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol

76a3(dkon brtsegs): par dad par bgyi'o/ / de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u din+ya khyod ni bla ma bla mar bya ba'i

80b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ / bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// sa bdug zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi tshe// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur// 'char ka khyod ni
80b6(dkon brtsegs): de la ji snyam sems/ / rjes su rab phyung zlas byin gzhan snyam mam// khyod nyid de tshe de yi dus na ni// bden pa 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin// de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis
80b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir/ / rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig/ sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na// skying pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
81a1(dkon brtsegs): kas/ / bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bar khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang shAm thabs bgos/
81a2(dkon brtsegs): lhung bzed thogs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na/ shAkya stong tsam zhig dang dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus
81a3(dkon brtsegs): shing 'khod do/ / rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing / ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos nas/
81a4(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas/ bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so// gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
81a5(dkon brtsegs): po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /
81a6(dkon brtsegs): glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che ste 'di bdun no// de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod
81a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur ba zhig/ de'i gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing // mchon/
81b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis bda' ba med la/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing / chos dang ldan pas legs par phab nas/ bskal pa rdzogs par legs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag
81b2(dkon brtsegs): cag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa dang / dbang
81b3(dkon brtsegs): phyug gi dbang chen po'ang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo// des 'di snyam du bsams
81b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su'ang ma 'gro zhig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na/ de'i
81b5(dkon brtsegs): lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do/ / de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas
81b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon
81b7(dkon brtsegs): pa legs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs
82a1(dkon brtsegs): sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyal tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'om
82a2(dkon brtsegs): brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so// dga' ba'i bzhin de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la
82a3(dkon brtsegs): spyan mi mnga' 'o/ / stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga' 'o// de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga'a'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod
82a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyi sa 'o brgyal ba med do/ / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas
82a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la bya der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'cha
82a6(dkon brtsegs): ka byon pa legs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun ring mo zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs
82a7(dkon brtsegs): sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyi sa 'o ma brgyal tam/
82b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so// shin tu legs par sad de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das bstun mi
82b2(dkon brtsegs): mnga'a'o/ / stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga' 'o// de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyisa'o/
82b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral gyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sang gnas dben pa na 'khod/
82b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong nas// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka
82b5(dkon brtsegs): yun kyang ring zhig na byon to/ / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam
82b6(dkon brtsegs): nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas//
82b7(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral ba la 'di skad ces smras so// mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga'a'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so//
83a1(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba mi mngona'o// de la ny+tsa ma nga ba ci yang mi mnganga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhen
83a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de skad ces sbas pa dang /
83a3(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na/ bdag cag gis de
83a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ nga'i bu la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su'ang ma 'gro zhig/ la la zhig de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen
83a5(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba'i phyir song na/ lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do zhes bka' stsal to// de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba
83a6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin tu'ang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na/ ji ltar bdag
83a7(dkon brtsegs): gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// 'on tang bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags la steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung
83b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa des
83b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas/ bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka
83b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyang ring po nas nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas/ de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshon
83b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/ khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos/ khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin// brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka'// de skad ces smras pa dang //
83b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu// bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs// bdag ni de bzhin
83b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te/ bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro// yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba// khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob// gzi brjid kyis
83b7(dkon brtsegs): ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar/ / ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra// ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni// phyogs rnams kun tu 'od byed mngon par 'bar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod
84a1(dkon brtsegs): sras/ / ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun tu snang // ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na// srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang // de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod
84a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sras/ / mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs// ji ltar nyi mas zil non skar ma rnams// nyin par 'od stor lam mer mi rung ba// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis//
84a3(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang // ji ltar nyi mas zil non zla ba ni// nam mkha'i dbyings na 'od stor nyid mi sdang // de bzhin khyod sras zil man+dan mu stegs rnams//
84a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i zil non zla bzhin gsal ba me// seng ge'i nga ro thos na phra mo rnams// shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du// ri sul gsab tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas// stag gi nga ro gsan
84a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis bzod par dka'/ / de bzhin rgyal ba drang srong chen po'i gsung // bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na// shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang // gsung thos pas ni thams cad
84a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs par 'gyur/ / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal// snang ba mdzad cing rdul yang rnam par sbyangs// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor
84a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shar/ / bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab tub nyan// lam dang gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan// lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du bcud// 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang
84b1(dkon brtsegs): thangal bton/ / ji ltar nom pa'i sa la sbyin gyis ni// skang dang gshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyisas// 'gro ba ltar bcas chos kyis ngoms
84b2(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ / ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri lung gnas// rtswa dang gel ba nags tshal shing rnams dang // 'khri shing sdong po spyan gyi rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs rnams kyisas mdzes pa//
84b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos mnga'i sdong po la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang // 'bras bus sbas pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so//
84b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri// lha yi gnas gyur mi skul rnam par mdzes// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes// bde sogs khyim
84b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs brgya byin lha dbang po/ / lha yi stan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// byams pa'i stobs can zab
84b6(dkon brtsegs): mo'i 'brug bsgrags te/ / thugs rje chen po'i glog 'phreng rir ldan pas// dran pa nyer gzhag char rgyun 'dab 'khrigs te// rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs// yongs dag dkyil
84b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer/ / ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'jom zhing // ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skems// rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro bar rnam par mdzes// ting nge 'dzin
85a1(dkon brtsegs): dang tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nor bu rin chen tshogs// byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs// thar
85a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya/ / tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan par zug/ ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa yal ga 'dab// byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdong // bdag
85a3(dkon brtsegs): med dri ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po ste na/ / tshul khrims nags mtha' sten pa'i stobs tshon po// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas// stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod yul can// rgyal ba stobs
85a4(dkon brtsegs): can seng ge khyod kyi sras/ / thub pa mi gnas gnas ni rnam par ston// rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs bzhud pas// byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan sngangs te// khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog smra
85a5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'byin/ / tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan// bsam gtan dang ba'i ni gnas nye bar bskyabs// ye shes kyis bsrungs par pa'i spyod yul can// rgyal ba tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong
85a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / dge ba yongs su bzung bas sdig bcom ste// nyon mongs zhi mdzad dge bsten bka' stsol bas// lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes// tshul
85a7(dkon brtsegs): khrims mchog sprin blo gros glog 'byin cing / / yan lag brgyad lam char chen rlan gyis spangs// thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol// khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrogs// rgyal pos smras pa/
85b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci// bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa mngal lam// de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam// thang gnas ut+pal bzhin ma rnyis sam// 'char kas smras pa// rdza 'phrul
85b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can/ / dgos shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te// thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas// gser gyi pad+ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyis// rgyal pos
85b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing // gling bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te// bud med glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang na// da ltar sang na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam// 'char kas
85b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul can// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste// mnal ta ma bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na// sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag
85b5(dkon brtsegs): tu dgyes/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'os mal mchog bshams pa la// me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te// bud med tshogs kyis bskor zhing nyal nyal na// da ltar mun par nyal
85b6(dkon brtsegs): na cis mi rmongs/ / 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzims pa ni// byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs// dga' ba'i gnas pas dges dang ldan pas na//
85b7(dkon brtsegs): srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'// rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya'i dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar// bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' rgyas te// gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga'
86a1(dkon brtsegs): byas na/ / nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar dga'// 'char kas smras pa/ chos kyis byung bzhi sems ldan rnams kyis// zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar/
86a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dgon par zhi ba bsten mdzad pas// ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe// yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te// rgyal
86a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i rkyen du bos pas khrus byas na/ / nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru// 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste// thub pa de bkru gzhan yang bkru ba mdzad// sku la mi
86a4(dkon brtsegs): gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog/ rang yang rgal la skye bo phal chen sgrol// rgyal pos smras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang gyon gyon// tsan
86a5(dkon brtsegs): dan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris/ / nags chen de gseb thub pa su yin brgyan// 'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan 'phreng bas brgyan// khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin
86a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan brgyan/ / mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyun gyi sku// rnam grol gzi mang thub pa nags na mdzes// rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshon thogs pa'i// dpa' bo
86a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yul du mos pas lus bsrungs te/ / bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu dag ba dgab pa// gcig pu nags na 'dug pa su yis bsrung // 'char kas smras pa/ byams pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te//
86b1(dkon brtsegs): de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring g.yog/ yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'// stobs bcu dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'gis brnyes// rgyal pos smras pa/ nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras//
86b2(dkon brtsegs): chos legs spyod cing dub med brjod pa thos// khyod kyang zan zo bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis// bdag kyang mi yi dbang po bltar 'gro'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ rgyal
86b3(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de ni tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshogs
86b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal po lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga la zla ba nya ste/ yongs su rgyas pa'i tshe/ skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun
86b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bskor ba ni lham me ldan ne lhang nge'o/ / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma ni
86b6(dkon brtsegs): ston gyi dus na shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab
86b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i dbang po brgya
87a1(dkon brtsegs): byin ni chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa na gnas na/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me ldan ne lhang nge //
87a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang na gnas na/ lham me
87a3(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne lhang nge'o/ / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa
87a4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na/ lham me ldan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de nas rgyal
87a5(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su zad na/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar

87b1(dkon brtsegs): tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing / sdang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci thos// btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma bsten par sa la gom pa bdun

87b6(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / blo mchog ldan pa gang zhig bltams ma thag/ nor ba med pa'i gsung ni brjod mdzad de// gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba// de la
87b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ / gang zhig bltams par gyur ma thag nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes// mgon pos mnyam pa med par gsung brjod pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid
88a1(dkon brtsegs): mi ches/ / su nig rmi lam rmi ba'i dus na yang // brdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te// ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa// de la mkhas pa su mig 'di
88a2(dkon brtsegs): mi ches/ / gser gyi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yis// gang zhig chags par bya ba mi nus shing // gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches//
88a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig khro bar bya bar mi nus so// zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// chags par 'gyur dang
88a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang rmongs 'gyur bas/ / gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te// shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang /
88a5(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis// gang zhig bcings par nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// rmad du byung ba rnam pa brgya dag gis// ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhug
88a6(dkon brtsegs): nam yang ma nus te/ / dpal sdug ldan zhing rtag tu mi ngam bA// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig snyam pa// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang // gang
88a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ / de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang // chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par
88b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pa/ / de yi gsung la su zhig yid mches// dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa// gang zhig grong khyer mchog nas 'byung ba'i tshe// dpung rnams kyis ni thub par mgyur pa//
88b2(dkon brtsegs): yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nus su// 'chi med rgyu phyir ri dgas spyod mdzad pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid
88b3(dkon brtsegs): mi ches/ / byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis// lo drug par du dka' thub drag spyad pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches//

88b6(dkon brtsegs): a cung zad tsam yang mi spong la/ / 'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig gzhan la gsan pa ma mdzad par// rtog par dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi//

89a1(dkon brtsegs): chos ni rab tu bshad pa na/ / de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir// shAkya'i grong khyer khyim du byon gyur te// shAkya'i tshogs

92b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur to/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du/ ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nya ba yis/ skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis
93a1(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas ni/ / nam mkhar zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes// zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba// mun pa rab ri bsel cing dri gsum 'joms// rtog sa
93a2(dkon brtsegs): can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni/ / mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa// ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing // lha min
93a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ / nyi ma de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed// nyi ma 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// stong gsum po drag zil gyis mnan nas ni// mi yi nyi ma rnam
93a4(dkon brtsegs): par mdzes gyur cing / / nyan thos pad+ma'i tshul mchog kha yang 'byed// lha yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni// 'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba// lha yi 'khor rnams
93a5(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan nas ni/ / bde sogs khyim thab sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang po dpal sdug stobs bcu yang // dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum na/
93a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog ge tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// lha yi rgyal po 'thab bral dbang byed pa// 'thab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas pa/
93a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral bzang po lha tshogs nang bzhugs te// 'thab bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang // lam ngan ngan 'gror dong ba zil mnan nas/
93b1(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing // stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes// lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de// dka' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor//
93b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtse bas rab tu mdzes// de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang / bi lha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas// 'khor brgyad po dag zil
93b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mnan nas ni/ / skyes bu seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su// rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas
93b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ / gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing // stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po// ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang /
93b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// lha yi rgyal po dbang sgyur byed pa ni// lha gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes
93b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa ji bzhin du/ / de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag/ sngan chad spyad pas lha mi zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rgyal ba de ni rab tu rnam par
93b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes/ / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te// shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag/ yongs su rjod pa byed cing mngon du mdzes//
94a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis// mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtam gsung zhing // 'jig rten gsum po dag
94a2(dkon brtsegs): na mngon du mdzes/ / nyan par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang // lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston
94a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad/ / bya lam nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung yang srid// ri rab srang brgyar gzhal du rung yang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi
94a4(dkon brtsegs): nus so/ / rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas/ ring po ma lon pa rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ shAkya
94a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bsgo ba/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni/ gang 'di dmar rengs 'char ba'o// dmar rengs shar na nyi ma 'char bar shes so// grogs po dag
94a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka'ang / bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te/ dge slong 'chur kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin
94a7(dkon brtsegs): no/ / grogs po dag de lta bas na/ bzhon pa'i mchog mchog rnams rtod de sta gon gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de lta
94b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'dong ngo do/ / lha legs so zhes gsol nas/ shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bsnyad do// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang
94b2(dkon brtsegs): mas ser skya'i gnas dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing / bye ma gtsang ma 'dal du bcug ste/ nyams dga' ba
94b3(dkon brtsegs): dang me tog sil mas gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / 'phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang / glu mkhan dang / gyad dang / bum rnga thogs pa dang /
94b4(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan dang / rol mo dang / glu'i chu byad dang / yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang chas pa rnams dang / bdag nyid
94b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe shAkyal la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta
94b6(dkon brtsegs): bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad sngol/ rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing / rgyan rnams kyang sngol/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ 'khor rgyan sngon po can gyis
94b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba gdugs dang / ral gri dang / zod dang / nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang / lham rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tshar ma gcad pa'i ras sngon po gyon cing / rgyan sngon
95a1(dkon brtsegs): po thogs pa'i zhal ta pa rnams zhal dbyed pa/ rgyan sngon po can gyi lcag thogs dang khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag ste/ shing
95a2(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to/ / shAkya la la'i bzhon pa ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du ser ba nas/ thams cad du dmar
95a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / thams cad du dkar ba dang / thams cad du bkra ba dang / shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar sdu snga ma bzhin no// shing rta de dag re re'i phyi bzhin
95a4(dkon brtsegs): du'ang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag bshams te/ glang po che brgyad khri bo de dag gi steng du rin po che sna
95a5(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to/ / glang po che brgyad khri bo de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha
95a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyus pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs
95a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis/ shAkya ser skya'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos
95b1(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba de dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rjes su 'thun no// de la 'di skad ces
95b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer dam pa nas// rgyal po zas gtsang mi yi khyu mchog de// 'khor dang bcas te ji ltar 'od gyur pa// de ltar bstan gyis khyed rnams de nyon cig/ shing
95b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong mchog dang bcas pa dag/ legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur// shing rta sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba dang /
95b4(dkon brtsegs): rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma snga bo dag kyang sngo ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo// lcag kyang sngo zhing thag srang rnams kyang sngo// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams
95b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas/ / mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta ser zhing rgyan kyang ser ba dang // rta yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor dang
95b6(dkon brtsegs): bcas/ / mtshan ma snga po dag kyang ser po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser// lcag kyang ser zhing thag srang rnams kyang ser// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas//
95b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas/
96a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma snga po dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar// lcag kyang dmar zhing thag srad rnams kyang dmar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
96a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang bcas/ / mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar ba dang // rta yang dkar zhing
96a3(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas/ / mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar// lcag kyang dkar zhing thag srad rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra
96a4(dkon brtsegs): brnams dang bcas/ / mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta bkra zhing rgyan kyang bkra ba dang // hA yang bkra zhing bkra
96a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor dang bcas/ / mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang bkra// lcag kyang bkra zhing thag srad rnams kyang bkra// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
96a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang bcas/ / mi rnams kyang ni 'akraba'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du// glang po brgyad trir tshang ba bsham
96a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan// glang chen rnams ni gser gyis chal par brgyan// de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi// khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas
96b1(dkon brtsegs): su/ / rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// shing rta rnams ni phyi bzhin 'byung bar bshams// de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang // rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis legs par brgyam//
96b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i cha 'os rgyal po 'tsham stabs can// glang po de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang // rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi// me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram// dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang /
96b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bres// bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// glu mkhan gar mkhan rnams dang gyang rnams dang // dum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas// rol mo rnam pa
96b4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs byed pa yang / / rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'brang // rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u sna gnyis pa'o// / de nas rgyal po zlas gtsang ma dang /
96b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du ba dar te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo //
96b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas/ mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag
96b7(dkon brtsegs): cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zham ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas lha'i
97a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin zham ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/ / de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zham+b+ha ring du lhags pa'i rgyal po rab 'thab thul dang / yongs su dga' ldan
97a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis gsob par gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu
97a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das
97a4(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang / bcom
97a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
97a6(dkon brtsegs): de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang
97a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / kumra
97b1(dkon brtsegs): da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lnga'i man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phyem rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i rol mo sa
97b2(dkon brtsegs): snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// mi'i las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro'ang steng gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to// sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab
97b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to/ / lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang 'bab par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas/ lha dang mi rnams
97b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'ang mthong / lha'i rin po
97b5(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar che
97b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du nga la ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug lnga dbang bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
97b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni 'di yin pa lta ste/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du/
98a1(dkon brtsegs): zad/ bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mi'i 'khor can du gyur to snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i rgyu
98a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bltams ma thag tu sus kyang ma bsten par sa chen po la go
98a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bdun bzhud de/ phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa/ nga ni 'jig rten na mchog/ da ni 'jig rten na gtso/ nga ni 'jig rten ra rab ste/ ngas skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
98a4(dkon brtsegs): nab dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsung ba de'i tshe'ang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing
98a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i grong du bzhud nas/ 'dzam bu'i gribam bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ nyi ma yol yang 'dzam bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgyum gtang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar
98a6(dkon brtsegs): nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so// da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/
98a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltams nas// sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de// nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs// de tshe
98b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pakhyod la bdag phyag 'tshag/ gang rjechub chen zhing ba'i grong bcud de/ 'dzam bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa ma gtang shing // nA d+ha gzhon nu drug kris btud sgyur ba// de che mchod 'o ga /
98b2(dkon brtsegs): la bdag phyag 'tshal// da yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du// thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag
98b3(dkon brtsegs): ci smos/ / mtshan ni don grub lags zhes sngon brjod pa// pha dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags// khyod kyi bsam rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na// don grub lags par bdag
98b4(dkon brtsegs): gis da gdod 'tshal/ / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel
98b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bshams so/ / thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bus yog par bting ngo // steng du'ang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla re bres so//
98b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das par snang gi 'chags de nas babs te/ kAdan khri bshams pa la btsugs so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
98b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bar snang ba
99a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khod par gyur to/ / 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ser sgra zhes bya grong khyer dam pa mi// n+ya gro d+ha si ra ba nyams dga'/
99a2(dkon brtsegs): bar// rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe// 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe// skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te// lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dbang po// klu tshogs rnams dang
99a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin grul bum dang / / dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te// mi 'am ci yi tshogs dang mi rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod pa
99a4(dkon brtsegs): dag na spyod pa'i lha/ / rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yi// tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang // 'od gsal
99a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang / / 'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus// dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang // spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dag dang // gcer bu ba dang
99a6(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs gzhan mang po/ / log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis// rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems// yongs su smin par
99a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i don gyi phyir/ / de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur// sngan chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bshad pa'i// tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad// da ni rgyal ba rgyal po/
99b1(dkon brtsegs): thas gtsang la// rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzhed// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis// gzhon nu myod nis bdag chen po yi// rgyal por 'gyur zhes ma
99b2(dkon brtsegs): pas lung bstan gyis/ / khab nas mabyung zhig ces sngon gsol ba// gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rin chen sna brnyan
99b3(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ / 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shing sa yang sbyong ba ste// gling bzhi dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur// mi yi bdag dang mi
99b4(dkon brtsegs): yis mchod par 'ong / / lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab// de nas de tshe byang chub sems dpa' des// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas// bdag ni rtag tu bden
99b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho ga smras kyis/ / rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis// bdag la slu ba mdzad par bzhed pas na// de lta'i tshul las rgyal po
99b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod/ / bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re// rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis rus sbal gcig cig 'phangs// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa dag
99b7(dkon brtsegs): rus sbal de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung / / de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gang nas 'dir 'ongs kye// nga yi the tsom skyes pa gcad pa'i phyir// myur nga la smos shes de skad
100a1(dkon brtsegs): b+hUs/ / zhon pa'i nang kI rus sbal de nyid la// rgya mtsho'i rus sbrul rdo chen des smras pa// nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te// khron pa 'dir ni de ring bor bar gyur/
100a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir log song // nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te// nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na// rus sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'chaba'o// de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal
100a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ / rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam mam// 'on te khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig/ dris lan nga la myur du smros shes smras// rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo rgya chen po des// khron pa'i rus sbal de la tshig
100a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ / khron pa'i rus sbal khyod ni byis pa ste// blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan// nga ni lan tshwa can gyi chu der btsas// yun ring dus nas de na skye skye yang // rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par ma
100a5(dkon brtsegs): nus na/ / dbus lta shes par ga la nus shes smras// de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang // bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de// gling bzhi pa yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni// khyod kyis
100a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag la slu ba mdzad par bzhed/ / bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chad pas mi gcad mtshon chas bda' med par// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya//
100a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang ba'ing nas// de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang /
100b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs pa mdzad// rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya'i phyir// thugs kyis yongs su bskul ba mdzad pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag/
100b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lus par// de yi tshe na der ni 'dus par gyur// rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang
100b3(dkon brtsegs): po thag bzangs ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i sems thog mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do/ / de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs rIs/ lha ma yin khrag khrig
100b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag drug cu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te/ des rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che rin thang yod pa dang /
100b5(dkon brtsegs): rin thang med pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir phul lo// rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas
100b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod par phul lo/ / rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rtswa khrag khrig phrag drug cu'ang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug
100b7(dkon brtsegs): cu mngon par sprul te/ rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yar kha'i dra ba can la/ rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis sbas pa dang ldan pa/
101a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dbyar 'dab can/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go// rta cang shes de dag gi rgyun du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun
101a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ / shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gsar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa shwa stag go/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang steng gi bar
101a3(dkon brtsegs): snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ shing rta de dag 'dong na ni rjes su 'dod/ shing rta de dag sdod na ni sdod pa sha stag go// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re dag la'ang
101a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sbyangs so/ / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul
101a5(dkon brtsegs): to/ / shing rta'i rgyan dang / rta'i rgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/
101a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ mkhas pas sgra phyung na sgra snun cing yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan na bde ba 'byung ba de bzhin du/ shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / rta'i rgyan
101a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stagazung bar gyur to// shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis kyang steng gi bar snang
101b1(dkon brtsegs): la dpag tshad drug cu bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to/ / shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyun sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// shing rta de dag thams cad la'ang lha ma yin gyi bu
101b2(dkon brtsegs): mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni sil snyan len/ la la ni glu lan/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni tsan
101b3(dkon brtsegs): dran dang ut+pa la'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni a ka ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phya mas 'thor/ la la ni gser dngul gyi phye mas 'thor/ lal

101b7(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun dang dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang rgyan 'bul lo// la la ni sku rags dang / zhabs kyi rgyan dang / phyag
102a1(dkon brtsegs): gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdubu mam pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung d+hanA dang / cod panA dang / gser chud dang / ma tiH
102a2(dkon brtsegs): gi do shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / bya do dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to// la la ni tshong tshong gshibs pa/ la la ni mgo rgyan/ la la ni rna cha gdub
102a3(dkon brtsegs): kor/ la la ni gser gyi 'phreng ba rin po ches spras pa/ la la ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba gser gyis spras pa/ la la ni gser gyi dra ba/ la la ni gser gyi 'phreng ba dang / nor bu'i 'phreng ba dang /

102a5(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can mang po
102a6(dkon brtsegs): thogs so/ / la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to// la la ni bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur to// mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi phu
102a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rkang gnyis gcol phyag 'tshal lo// khyod la ngo zla yong ma mchis// 'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mtshol phyag 'tshal lo// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo//
102b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag tshal lo// spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas pa mi mnga'
102b2(dkon brtsegs): zhum mi mnga'/ / le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'// brtson 'grus brtsams shin rtul ba nyid// nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ rin po che
102b3(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu'ang mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul te/ bzhugs sa de dag

102b7(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// dngul gyi khyims rnams kyi gdung phyam ni gser/ bral bu dang sgo 'phar ni baiDUr+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni spug

103a6(dkon brtsegs): dmar po/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni gser/ them pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/ kA ba ni bai DUR+Ya/ ka Tu ni ke ke ru/ sa gzhi ni shel gyi rang bzhin can sha stag go// khyams de dag tu'ang seng ge'i khri rin

104a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dag btsugs so/ / de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnam ni tog dkar po
104a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni tog dmar po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni tog rin po che sna bdun pa sha stag go// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing
