106a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha rdzas kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo / / sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
106a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can gang dag gis sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyis/ bcom ldan
106a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni
106a4(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar/ la la ni tsan dan dang / ut+pa la dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra
106a5(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / s+ya snar dang / bya bAr chen po dang /
106a6(dkon brtsegs): snasngar khra bo dang / s+yA bAr bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che
106a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang / rkang gdub dang / sku rigs dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / gsor gdub dang / gdu bu dang
106b1(dkon brtsegs): gdu byatham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser krung dang / mu tig gi do sha la dang / nor bu'i do shAl dang / sa mo do dang / gya do dang /
106b2(dkon brtsegs): mgul rgyan sna tshogs dang / rna cha dang / rna cha gdub kor dang / tshong tshong gshibs pa dang / mgo rgyan dang / 'phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lda ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing
106b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu'i bla re dag thogs so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs so// la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so// la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom
106b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ / la la rin po ches snyim pa bkang // la la ni gser gyis snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// tshogs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so//
106b5(dkon brtsegs): gang brten gang la gnas bcas nas// gang zag mchog la mchod gyur pa// de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang // rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyi
106b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ sgyu ma srin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rdul 'on te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed
106b7(dkon brtsegs): cing / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'jigs 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos lam
107a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dres nges par gyur pa po/ / 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
107a2(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa mi mdza' zhing // 'gro ba kun las thugs ni rnam grol te// pad+ma chu yis
107a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gos 'dra ba po/ / blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid bsten// rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams cad bshig/ khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'//
107a4(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas
107a5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / gser phye dag gis gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sa dang
107a6(dkon brtsegs): bar snang dang ni lha yul na'ang / / bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis// mtshan mar bzung nas phyin ci log zhugs pa'i// 'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen// 'di na byed pa tshor ba
107a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can med/ / gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med// chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun las dben// rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan// su zhig bde gshegs bstan pa 'dir mos te/
107b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba// de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yang ltar stod// rnam 'dren ldong la bdag bstong bsod nams gang skyes te// ji ltar
107b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir// 'gro la stsal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog// bam pa
107b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa/ / / lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ rin po che
107b4(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/
107b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu las pha rol rnam rgal ba// brgal nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing // bde gshegs pha rol thang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa// spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa
107b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi zhabs la gtugs/ / blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen// phyin ci log lnga thibs por rab zhin blo ldan te// 'khrul pasmig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la// mtshungs
107b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad/ / mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang // smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs shes rab tu bstan// thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos
108a1(dkon brtsegs): kyims mchog bskyed/ / srid pa gsum po na mi chags spya du spyod// dngos pa log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin thal pa dang // gzhan gyi dngos pos spyong bar ming bang rjong /
108a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen// byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bur// mi dbang khyod kyi sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod/ lha ma yin gying dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas par
108a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po snga ga can gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtal zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / me
108a4(dkon brtsegs): tog sgra snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di zil mnan//
108a5(dkon brtsegs): ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang // rgya mtshos pa rjes chu bzhin no// gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang // gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis
108a6(dkon brtsegs): mnan/ / dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis// sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas me khyer zil rlag bzhin//
108a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// 'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam ma min// nyi mas zla 'od zil rlag bzhin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis
108b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed
108b2(dkon brtsegs): cing / me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 'dren pa blo gros zhi ba po// zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi//
108b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad// char pas rdul rnams ni bgyid bzhin// 'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad// thugs sbyin gyis ni me bzhin no// nags btang nags mes shing sreg lha
108b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba sreg/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// dpag tu med par dge rtsa 'dzin// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad do// bdud rtsis lus zhugs drug bzhin no// mun pa mun
108b5(dkon brtsegs): gnag sel mdzad de/ / mun khung sbron me 'bar ba bzhin// chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de// nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas
108b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
108b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum bsko ba byed cing / rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas/ tshogs su bcad bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// gdul dka' mi mdzad sems ni khyod kyis btul
109a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yul la dpa' bas gsul ngor dpa' bo bzhin/ / shin tu tshar bcad rang gis dbang du mdzad// thugs dul mi bskyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis dbang po sbrul
109a2(dkon brtsegs): cing dgra yang bcom/ / gang du'ang mi bsnyengs mi bskyod bde ba brnyes// khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs// rnam pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom// mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs
109a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms te/ / khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam// thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros pashig/ 'gro ba kun tu khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'// shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred pa bskams// shes rab
109a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag/ chos rnam kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar
109a5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun d+hi shing rtal zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la la gsum bskor ba byed cing /
109a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po'ang sprul nas/ tshigs su bcad bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni// chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen//
109a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di chom shes brjod pa yang // do ni brdar btags tshig tu zang // chos rnams chos kyi tha thams// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni ming tsam lad ces gsungs/
109b1(dkon brtsegs): ming ni ming gis dben paste// mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste// ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad// rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang // bshad pa ci yang ma mchis
109b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ / gang gis kyang nim bshad cing // su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so// khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams// chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rnams la yang mi chags par// rnam par spyod
109b3(dkon brtsegs): dothub pa che/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas
109b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi dro shal yang phul nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan
109b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod do// tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs// des ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis// de phyir khyod ni dgra thul
109b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs ma mchis/ / khyod kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na// gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan// b+hin+d+ra pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phran snam tshogs// dpe byang phun su
109b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shing gzugs kyang ngag/ / tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi gyod de// skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang // khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag/ mi yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor/
110a1(dkon brtsegs): shes ra ba stobs kyis snod sargyas ga 'amamachis// des na mi byin 'di rten pas na/ wA d+has ca bsngags te// rtog tshogs kyi
110a2(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan/ / lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la
110a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / rin po ches snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'ad
110a4(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa chen po skye bo tshogs pa 'di/ dang ba'i sems kyis khyod kyi zhal du lta// kun gyi rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bco
110a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/ / skye bo bsamapa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal// thub pa khyed kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung // dri ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis
110a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung gcig brjod pa la/ / 'khor gyis tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing // 'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas mi 'dres mtshan// gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa
110a7(dkon brtsegs): ma bas ni/ / gcig la 'jog gi gzhan ni dgag pa mdzad// 'dren pa su dgam bslabs rtogs par mdzad// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dus mtshan/ lham yin gyi ba
110b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par snang byed kyis ji skar byas pa de bzhin d+ha/ mA ma sbyin gyi dbang po btang bzung gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtal khon te/ bcom ldan/
110b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rmugs dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba
110b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gang / / yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi// blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te// mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di dag
110b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te/ / rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra// rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs//
110b5(dkon brtsegs): ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu yi zla ba 'dra// byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid// gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs
110b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid/ / rgyal ba khyod kyi bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang // mi mchog dam pa de dag mi ngal yong mi mchi// chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas// yang dag mthong ba de dag ting
110b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ / de nas thag zangs ris la sogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis mchod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas/ byang chub la gnol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing macul
111a1(dkon brtsegs): yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes temal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to//
111a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs
111a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
111a4(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir log nas/ bcom
111a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
111a6(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/ 'jig rten pa
111a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par/ / mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// drang srong chen po ci smad 'dzum pa mdzad// skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs
111b1(dkon brtsegs): myur nas/ / 'jig rten phan bzhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na// lha min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// de ring su yis dogs med rgya chen
111b2(dkon brtsegs): sems/ / 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// de ring yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis su//
111b3(dkon brtsegs): mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gis bsam mkhyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di ltar
111b4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di/ / su yi dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes// 'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal// the tshom 'tshal ba'i som
111b5(dkon brtsegs): nyi gcad du gsol/ / mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi// the tshom sbyar te legs par gcad du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan/ bcom ldan 'das
111b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa// de yi 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya// bstan
111b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ / bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir// lha min rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas te// de dag sems ni ci la'ang chags med pas// nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags
112a1(dkon brtsegs): meng bzhin/ / min chogs kyis dang pa'i ming byas te// de dag la mchod pa 'di byas pas/ thocan de dag sa min ris por te// sor dong nus ca drug bar gyu/
112a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi'i seng ge/ gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba skyed// bsnyen bkur byas nas yid 'ong bskal pa la// de dag thams cad mtshan 'thun rgyal bar 'gyur// de tshe bde gshegs khrag khrig drug cu'i
112a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ / 'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su grags pa ste// de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing // shin
112a4(dkon brtsegs): tu yangs shing snyigs ma med par 'gyur/ / de tshe khrag khrig drug cur tshang ba yi// rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur// de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad// de dag zhing der dga' ba
112a5(dkon brtsegs): / sbyospyo bar 'gyur// brtan pa de dag mi khom thams cad sbyong // bla na med pa'i theg paston par 'gyur// de dag tshe yi tshad du 'gyur ba ni// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang // rnam par
112a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur/ / chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad// thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu zhi gyur nas// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni//
112a7(dkon brtsegs): rang zung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul// dgralas rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan 'thun 'gyur// zhing
112b1(dkon brtsegs): dang tshe dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang 'thun/ / bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug cu yi// skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad de// bla na med pa'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur// mkhas pa
112b2(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin/ / rgyal bas lha min de dag lung bstan pa// 'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsungs// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas// yi rangs gyur cing
112b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyang skyes par gyur/ / lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'di mthong nas ngo mtshar
112b4(dkon brtsegs): dugyur te/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzad na/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa grub snyam nas/
112b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag pas/ bskal pa grangs med pa'ang rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang der 'chi 'pho dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa
112b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par
112b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te
113a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can gang ji
113a2(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang / de dag gis thugs bskyed pa
113a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig la'ang yan yon par mi nus so snyam mo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob par gyur nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su
113a4(dkon brtsegs): bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ / thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi// thugs bskyed pa ni re re la'ang // lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis// cha tsam mi spyod mi'i seng ge/ de lta'i yon tan mthar phyin te// lha dang
113a5(dkon brtsegs): mi yis mchod gyur pa/ / tsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam// mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge khyod la ni// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// rgya mtsho rab tu bkang ba yi// spos chu dag gis mchod
113a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'os/ / yon tan chen po mnga' ba la// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog tshogs ni ri bo mchog/ khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os// rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba// mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam//
113a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi// mar me rnams kyis mchod par 'os// mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur// yon tan pha rol phyin gyur pa// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os// mi ngas
113b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pas thugs brtse ba/ / rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang // sems can mchog la mchod par 'os/ yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod// rin po che yi rgya
113b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyis/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste// bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge khyod la ni// bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// ba dan
113b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mchod par 'os/ / drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag/ lha rnams dang ni mi ngag dang // gzhan yang sems can gang tshegs pa// brtag bzung dab la gsan du gsol// gal te gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi//
113b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i bstobs ldan la// de dag re re'i mgo bo yang // gang+gA'i bye ma snyed gyur te// mgo bo
113b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re zhing / / de snyed kha dang ldan gyur la// kha rnams de dag re re zhing // lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni// rgyal ba de dag spobs
113b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bas/ / khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin// rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi// pha rol tu ni phyin par 'gyur/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
113b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag legs so legs so// nga'i nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa/ ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/ chos su gyur pa/ dbang du b+ha ra pa/ tshang mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ de ngag
114a1(dkon brtsegs): ni nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha stag go/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam
114a2(dkon brtsegs): phyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi
114a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
114a4(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad
114a5(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ bsams kyang bsam par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems bskyed pa gang yang
114a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ni tshe dmed pas
114a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / / sems can gyi khams ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar
114b1(dkon brtsegs): mi zad pa'i bsod rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / / sems de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsrud pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mchod
114b2(dkon brtsegs): lan lon par mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
114b3(dkon brtsegs): don du 'byung ba ni/ sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te/ zang zing med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
114b4(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa/ bgrang du med pa
114b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
114b6(dkon brtsegs): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog
114b7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed pa re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan par dgongs
115a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/ don kyang mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing
115a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gyur te/ yongs su dag cing / ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye
115a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yod med par gyur to/ / lta ba'i rnam pa yong med par gyur to// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yod med par gyur to// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems
115a4(dkon brtsegs): can yod med par gyur to/ / ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i
115a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la btsud cing btams te/ rjes su bstan cing bslabs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i
115a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan
115a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te// de dag bde ba de la'ang spyod la/ bde ba
115b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med par gyur to/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tshe'ang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su
115b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snang la'ang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa'ang med do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su
115b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med/ rmongs par 'gyur ba med de/
115b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du na yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba sha stag la yongs su spyod de/ de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des
115b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dge ba las yongs su bzlog ste/ dge ba la btsud pas/ de dag las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par 'byung ba
115b6(dkon brtsegs): yi dge ba'i las de lta bu yang med de/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ngo // de dag gis ni rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug
115b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'du ma byas te/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa
116a1(dkon brtsegs): de mi 'byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas/ nyams
116a2(dkon brtsegs): su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro/ / rlung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo // char nyams su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/
116a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bstan cing bshad pas/ sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems
116a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bsgrubs pas/ las de'i rnam par smin par
116a5(dkon brtsegs): dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do// rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do// de ltar sangs
116a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing / bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa
116a7(dkon brtsegs): des gtams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to/ / de dag 'chag na'ang chos nyid la sems shing / chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mos
116b1(dkon brtsegs): shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag la de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo / / de bzhin du 'greng ba dang / 'dug dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad du'ang sdug bsngal
116b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la yang ba ma spangs ma med de/ de'i phyir yang ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // yang dag pa'i spong ba yod pas de dag la
116b3(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba med de/ de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams
116b4(dkon brtsegs): cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ / de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar
116b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i phyir ro/ / de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug
116b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar de na sdug bsngal
116b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshor ba rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro/ / gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston to//
117a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gang+gA'i klu gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe/ des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni
117a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro/ / dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa bzhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal
117a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par bsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas
117a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can de snyed gcig gi don bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am
117a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das do na ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ sems zhan pa dang / sems dma' ba
117a6(dkon brtsegs): nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i
117a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam
117b1(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ dad pa gzhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang / tshul khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang / thos pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i
117b2(dkon brtsegs): bar dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i
117b3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de skad cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug
117b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das da ni ma lags so//
117b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so legs so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / sems zhan pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus
117b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug
117b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par bsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba 'am/ nga dag la phan par bsam pa
118a1(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar
118a2(dkon brtsegs): mi nus so/ / dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam mam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong
118a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa
118a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing
118a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
118a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos ston gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o// de skad ces
118a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de'i dus la dbab par shes
118b1(dkon brtsegs): na song zhig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor
118b2(dkon brtsegs): ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer
118b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dir gnas par gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
118b4(dkon brtsegs): go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i
118b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin
118b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par gyur to/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mnga' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
118b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na/ rgyal ba gtso
119a1(dkon brtsegs): bo/ rgyal ba dam pa/ rgyal ba mchog/ rgyal bar rabaces brjod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid legs par yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do// de skad ces smras nas/
119a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dpa' bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing // sems can yongs su smin mdzad
119a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ / dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul// bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang // da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal// byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug/ stong
119a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad pas// ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa// rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal// da dung dang po thugs bskyed par// de dang der ni yongs bstan te//
119a5(dkon brtsegs): da dung du yang 'dren pa khyod// sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'// khyod kyis gang yang
119a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen mdzad de/ / brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang // la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis// sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de// 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus// bud med cha byang spyod pa mdzad// dung
119a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'/ / 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin// 'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi// 'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad// des na skye dgu 'ang
119b1(dkon brtsegs): dag rnams/ / gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod// la lar bltam pa yongs su bstan// la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan// la la na ni 'khor lo skor// la lar spyad pa spyod par mdzad// sems
119b2(dkon brtsegs): can gdul ba'i don skad du/ / dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad// bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// sems can sus kyang long ma 'tshal// 'dod chags mi mnga'i chags pa'i tshul// 'jig
119b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar/ / sems can rnam par gdul don du// 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te// byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis// sems can rnam
119b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gdul don du/ / 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// spros pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul// zha ba ma lags zha ba ltar// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad//
119b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig/ sngon byung ba 'od srungs chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga
119b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ / / de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gzhal
119b7(dkon brtsegs): dumed pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba blta na sdug
120a1(dkon brtsegs): @#pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to/ / lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / sdug dang / mu tig
120a2(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no// 'ang ba brtsegs pa de dag kyang / rin po che sna bzhi'i lan+da kan gyi dra ba ris bkrab bldan sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// rin po che rtsa ba'i
120a3(dkon brtsegs): ni/ 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel lo// gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni gser/ shar ba rnams ni dngul/ dngul gyi lan ka na rnams kyi ka
120a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang gdang bu rnams ni dngul/ shar ba rnams ni gser/ bai DUR+Ya'i lan kun rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni bai DUR+Ya/ shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnam
120a5(dkon brtsegs): ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas
120a6(dkon brtsegs): pa sha sta ga ste/ 'di ltar gser dang / dngul dang / bai nun+da dang / shel dang / sdug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i ting po dang bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba ba
120a7(dkon brtsegs): ba blta na sdug pa/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang / bai DUR+Ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang / spug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas
120b1(dkon brtsegs): bkab par gyur to/ / gdugs bkra ba bstan sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas/ rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag /
120b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha
120b3(dkon brtsegs): stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po can sha stag mngon par sprul to// ba dan la
120b4(dkon brtsegs): dog sna tshogs can bkra ba bstan sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur to/ / bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur te/ bla re de dag kyang gser
120b5(dkon brtsegs): skud kyi bla re dang / dngul skud kyi bla re dang / bai DUR+Ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste/ rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa
120b6(dkon brtsegs): sha stag go/ / de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug sdong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /
120b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhi bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
121a1(dkon brtsegs): ba byas so/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing nam mkha' las song ste/ yongs 'dus brtol
121a2(dkon brtsegs): dugazhog go/ / de bzhin du khang ba brtsegs pa de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom
121a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to/ / de nas 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
121a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing / tshogs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rkangadang 'chi las rnam bral khyod
121a5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rgadang 'chi las rnam 'grel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gzhal yas kha lo sbyar la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so//
121a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu yi lus ldan zhing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i// sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren
121a7(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyig zi ldan zhing // mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te// sgyid lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing // 'gro
121b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam sbyong mya ngan zlo bar shog/ bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing // shes rab ldan pas mchog tu gyur par shog/ da ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur// sne bo rab 'grel
121b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa khyod lta bur// bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing // 'jig rten mkhas pa
121b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen du shog/ bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang // rmi lam sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang // brag cha nam mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing // ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin
121b4(dkon brtsegs): du shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan
121b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams// rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa// 'jig rten pa na
121b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs/ / 'dab bzangs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te// bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyed// rkang gnyis
121b7(dkon brtsegs): dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/ / 'gro ba thams cad thal mo rab sbyar cing // dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod// mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal// rkang gnyis
122a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/ / mi mchog ljod la khong dag mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tshom med 'gyur zhing // the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur//
122a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dis ni sangs rgyas gnyis par bgyis shes mchi// 'khor 'di 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal bas// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mthong dga'
122a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ / slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su sman pa mdzod// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur gyis//
122a4(dkon brtsegs): rang byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ thams cad zil gnon stobs
122a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu brtson 'grus bden/ / rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs// 'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis// 'dab bzangs 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis
122a6(dkon brtsegs): dri ba legs par dris/ / 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa// de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid kyis nyon// the tshom sel la rab tu dga' ba snyeng // bla na med pa'i byang chub ni tshol zhing //
122a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir// 'dab chags dbang pos ngal mchod legs byas// ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi//
122b1(dkon brtsegs): sred meng bu lus shin tu mkhregs pa dang // sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams// yongs su btsal phyir ngal mchod pa byas// rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang /
122b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang // phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnams dgrol ba// 'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas// de dag la dga' bas mchod byas pa// dud 'gro'i
122b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas/ / lha dang brtul zhugs mthun par de dag 'dong // 'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// de dag lha mi'i nang ni gnas
122b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / / rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas// de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar gyur// de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste// mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med//
122b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes// ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal pa rab 'byung 'gyur// lo ni bye ba brgyad cu bzhi ba grangs par// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs// 'jig rten
122b6(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhug pas/ / lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur// skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi/ 'dus pa nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad cur 'gyur// de tshe skyob pa
122b7(dkon brtsegs): rdul dang bral rnams kyi/ / shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cur 'byung // 'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i nga bsal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur// mi dag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal che//
123a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dab bzangs lus su gyur nas stobs po che// 'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na// drang song dka' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshang ba
123a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ / dka' thub spyad de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal// de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis// dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur// tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dab tu/
123a3(dkon brtsegs): zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig/ nga rgyal nges ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur// rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dang // nga rgyal gyis
123a4(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ / nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / bam po bzhi pa// / de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug

123b6(dkon brtsegs): ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ me tog ut+pa la dang tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ me tog rnam
123b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ spos sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin mchod pa rgya chen po byas so//
124a1(dkon brtsegs): @de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can

124a5(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam pa
124a6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te/ me tog gi char debab pa'i tshe/ spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngadabyung ste/ 'gro zhing ldog go// spos chu'i char debab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po
124a7(dkon brtsegs): khir yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos kyi dri nges kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tsher
124b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /
124b2(dkon brtsegs): rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la
124b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig
124b4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod par gyur to/ / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yi rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su/ byang chub zhi pa tshol zhing shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen
124b5(dkon brtsegs): po byas/ / rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te// bde bar gshegs la mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral// rgyan gyis legs brgyan
124b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te/ / kha dog sngo zhing rgyun kyang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan// de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub la rta yis mchod pa byed// klu yi bu mo de dag dang
124b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal/ / mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu li sil stan gyi// mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa byas// sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs
125a1(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/ sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs// de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur/
125a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur dpag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur// nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal// klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i mdun du
125a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal la mchod pa byas/ / gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing // 'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub par shog/ ji
125a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grel pa ltar/ / chos kyang bstan de sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol// chos rnams sgyu ma smig sgra
125a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra zhing dbu ba lta bur nyam chung la/ / char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bu ra lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad brtags nas ni// 'gro ba
125a6(dkon brtsegs): dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi/ / sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis brdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa// skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa//
125a7(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan// ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'gribs
125b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang / / yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid// shes pas brtags nas
125b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/ / yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas// des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur// khyod kyi
125b3(dkon brtsegs): sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdzab la zam pa 'dra/ / 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang // de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i
125b4(dkon brtsegs): mgon/ / skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi// gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod// sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyi/
125b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang
125b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul gyis/ / bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba// 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad// dpal sdug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu
125b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa bdag gis yong ma mthong / / mi yi dbang po'i dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang ngag gsungs// de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa// dri za rnams kyang skyob pa'i
126a1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur/ / 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen// rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen
126a2(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur yong ma mchis/ / de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chung 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yi rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar
126a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi/ / 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur//
126a4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung // 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te// sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing
126a5(dkon brtsegs): chos la som nyi gang 'tshal ba/ / de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol// drang srong khyod kyis gang spang 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol the tshom khum// rgyal ba gang gis
126a6(dkon brtsegs): de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul/ / su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol//
126a7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas bdag cag yi rings mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur// khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// 'dzum chu dga' ba skyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom
126b1(dkon brtsegs): bsal du gsol/ / de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
126b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris// klu yi bu mos mchod tshe 'jig rten phan
126b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ / de yi 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon// gang 'di don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon// klu yi bu mo 'di dag
126b4(dkon brtsegs): chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs/ / 'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam bshig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas// 'di na byed med tsher med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med// chos
126b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'di dag brdzun zhing smig rgyur mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ / 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag ngas shes te// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing
126b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po med mthong legs/ / mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra// byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong // nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de
126b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang 'gro ba stong skyes pas/ / klu las shi 'phos nas ni lhag nas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang na dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas// ma smad grags dang
127a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ / 'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha yi gnas su lha yi dga' ba spyod// lha gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de na tshe
127a2(dkon brtsegs): yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur/ / rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshad zad pa dang // dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag de na lha yi bu
127a3(dkon brtsegs): mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod/ / pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bo de gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur// skyob pa
127a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi dran pa rdol brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams/ / de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde gshegs
127a5(dkon brtsegs): ma spang grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te/ / mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe tshad bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni
127a6(dkon brtsegs): mamakhas pa tshe zang blo gros ldan pa chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nAs/ / 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can// chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'dra bar ni
127a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur/ / de dge lha gnas de na gnaso shing lha yi dga' ba spyong par 'gyur// bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshang gnas par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod
127b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs/ / bsam gtan bsam pas tshungs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan
127b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu spyad gyur nas/ / der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur// de dag bskal par tshangs gnas 'thun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang
127b3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed/ / mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med// bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'dra/
127b4(dkon brtsegs): rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi// kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan// mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi pa'i mtshan nyid 'gyur// bde bar
127b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi pa yongs tshol ba/ / tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas// kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha
127b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug byang chub don gyi phyir/ / rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum la ma las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston// tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur// tshang
127b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nyes 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni/ / bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la// ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur
128a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar chos kyang ston/ / de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir// phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod//
128a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur// dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur// lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab bzangs dag dang lha min
128a3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / / dri za grul bum mi 'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyangs chos kyi stobs rnyed pa// de dag thams cad yi
128a4(dkon brtsegs): rangs thal sbyar bde bar gshegs la mgos phyag 'tshal/ / klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan
128a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang thos/ yongs su rdzogs par yang rig nas/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des sems
128a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing / bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang med cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi
128a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ni legs par gsungs te/ yang dag par mthong ba/ nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par/
128b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o// 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ rgod pa mi brtan pa/ mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang /
128b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ 'a
128b3(dkon brtsegs): bar zhugs pa dang / 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mi bzang ba dang ldan pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni
128b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/ ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog
128b5(dkon brtsegs): par byas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so// spos kyi dri des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can
128b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tsher bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya
128b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so/ / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba derang rimathang med pa'i nor bu rin
129a1(dkon brtsegs): @po ches chal par bkang ngo / / klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo
129a2(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo / / klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la'ang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so// rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba
129a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang bai DUR+Ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to/ / 'dun khang de'i gzhi'ang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur to// 'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba
129a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa/ kha dog bai DUR+Ya'i ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsu la na di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ nyi mas dag
129a5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/ mi dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas/ nor bu la la lnga
129a6(dkon brtsegs): nime 'byung / la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/ de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni rgyu kha dog ser po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung
129a7(dkon brtsegs): la la las ni mu dog dkar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo // nor bu la la las ni bde bar bi sal pa'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la la las ni de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan
129b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bsams pa bzhin du 'byung / la la las ni snum gyi bya ba byed/ la la las ni me long gi bya ba byed de/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to// ser
129b2(dkon brtsegs): skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
129b3(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'ang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to// 'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og
129b4(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon par gyur to/ / rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
129b5(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog brtsegs ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa
129b6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang / dril bu gser kha'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du bkri
129b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan 'das la la ni gsum bskor ba byas te/ nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/
130a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gtor to// 'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
130a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to/ / klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis
130a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ cang mi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rjes su dran par
130a4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / mig mi 'dzum par lta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de nas de dag gis
130a5(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cig tu mi smra bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas/ so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom
130a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad bdag gis mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan brgya rdzogs pa
130a7(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs legs spyad pa/ / dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can// rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te/ bde gshegs khyod ni grong khyer mngon par byung /
130b1(dkon brtsegs): drug bar du dka' thub dka' mdzad de// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang // bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum mgyur// thub pa khyod kyis byang chu bzugs kyis spyad// ji ltar/
130b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa d+ma mi'i bla ma khyod// 'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de// 'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal ltar gyur pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// thub pa dbu
130b3(dkon brtsegs): dang spyan ni btang ba dang / / byang chub sems ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa// bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na// de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur// gang tshe ka li nga rgyal po
130b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod smra ba'i/ / zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te// de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// phug ron skyabs su
130b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ma gtang ste/ / gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la bcal gyur pa// rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste// bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che// bdag cag mi 'tshal ma
130b6(dkon brtsegs): lags ci zhe na/ / bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa// ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi// sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags// ji ltar 'jig
130b7(dkon brtsegs): rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang / / bde gshegs spyod pa ma'i tshe blor gyur dang // sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa// 'jig rten 'dren pa spyod de bka' stsal gsol// mtha' yas
131a1(dkon brtsegs): blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la/ / thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson// ji ltar khyod kyi bka' bzhin spyod 'gyur ba// de ltar bde gshegs byang
131a2(dkon brtsegs): chu ba lam bstan gsol/ / rga shi ma mchis go 'phang thob 'tshal zhing // klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa sgom par gnas// 'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i// brtul
131a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs spyod de bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lcag pu'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag
131a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / 'di ni chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog du
131a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//
131a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcang de gsol ba/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa rnams// rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi
131a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad na/ 'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzub rgya bka' stsal gsol// tshigs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni// 'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod
131b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhal du lta/ / yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa the tshom rnam par bsal du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub// de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su/
131b2(dkon brtsegs): dga'// gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te// rmongs par bgyis nas yid ni mi dgar bgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis// bde gshegs chos nyid yab la
131b3(dkon brtsegs): brnyar bkur bstiH/ / bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa brtsig/ shAkya me dag bka' stsol the chog khum// sor brgya thal mo sbyar ba mgor gzhag cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i
131b4(dkon brtsegs): zhal du lta/ / tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal du gsol// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// de thos skye bo 'di dag dkar 'gyur te// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtog
131b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ / bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams tshom bgyis na// gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thub
131b6(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis// tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis// rta thul skyon med sems kyis dang byos la/
131b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyud mnyan par gyis// klu yi bdag po 'di dag dang gyur te// 'gro bzil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas// skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang
132a1(dkon brtsegs): chub 'di ni yongs su tshol/ / snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi// 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi sten// 'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la// 'dre
132a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur/ / zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs// mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa// rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su/
132a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro// 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te// gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje
132a4(dkon brtsegs): thob/ / 'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can// 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral
132a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dron par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing // 'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste// de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'a
132a6(dkon brtsegs): med thob/ / de ni bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med// 'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi// rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed// bde gshegs bka' dang tshig
132a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad dang / / bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur// srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad spyod cing // rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par
132b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / mtshungs med thub pa bde bar myur du yang // yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur// thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur// skye bo kun kyang gzugs
132b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchog dang ldan/ / 'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur// phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag/ rang byung dgongs
132b3(dkon brtsegs): min cung zad byed mi 'gyur/ / de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan// bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med thob par 'gyur// de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni/ bstan
132b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med/ / bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi// 'gro ba 'chi med yang dag 'thob par 'gyur// de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs// rga
132b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ni na dang 'chi ba dang / / mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su 'grol// tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur// klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng ge la// yongs su zhus
132b6(dkon brtsegs): nas ji ltar de dag rnams/ / gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyis// ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan// klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi// rgyal ba'i
132b7(dkon brtsegs): gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste/ / de la ying ni rab tu zhi gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skabs su song // klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
133a1(dkon brtsegs): @#de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams kyi mchod pa'ang mthong /
133a2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes
133a3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi mnga' rgya chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing
133a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
133a5(dkon brtsegs): la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas/ mchod pa 'di lta bu dag pa zhes kyang / mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar
133a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu che'o snyam mo/ / de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi tha
133a7(dkon brtsegs): re bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi srud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai DUR+Ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar
133b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i bla re dang / sdug gi b+hA re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag go// rin po che'i bla re de dag la'ang me tog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ gser gyi srung ba'i bla re/
133b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni dngul gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ bai DUR+Ya'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi 'phreng
133b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lda ldi bkya/ shel gyi bla re rnams la ni be DUR+Ya'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni spug gi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ spug gi bla ra rnams la
133b4(dkon brtsegs): ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog ge 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi ba kye bA sha stag mngon par sprul to// shing rta bkra ba bstun
