133b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du'o// shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba/
133b6(dkon brtsegs): can dang / bai DUR+Ya'i yu ba can dang / shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul to// gdugs de dag la'ang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lnga ldi mngon par sprul
133b7(dkon brtsegs): to/ / 'di lta ste/ gser gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang // dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai DUR+Ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / shel gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda
134a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lnga ldi sha stag go// mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba de
134a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gi gzugs byas so/ / grul bum gyi rol mo sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// de nas grul
134a3(dkon brtsegs): bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla re dang / me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ mchod pa byed
134a4(dkon brtsegs): cing bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to/ / bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod
134a5(dkon brtsegs): de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can// thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste// ri yi rgyal po lhun po
134a6(dkon brtsegs): ri'adra ba/ / mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang // tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'// 'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs
134a7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / shes rab ldan la dregs pa yong mi mnga'// rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba spu 'drar mkhyen// rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam ngag 'dra dang // chu zla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bur ni// bde bar gshegs
134b1(dkon brtsegs): pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs/ / dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang // grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med// gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro
134b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di gzigs/ / mchod pa 'di kur brag cha ji bzhin te// shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang // me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa// brag cha ji bzhin de dag de ltar gdar/
134b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang // sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog/ rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis// rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par
134b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ / nad dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang // byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas// gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par bgyi//
134b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas// sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi// thub pa 'khrugs med chos rnams rab ston pa// mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par
134b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
134b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa midzad de// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'// ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu legs par
135a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nyan par 'tshal/ / rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal// the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khrum
135a2(dkon brtsegs): mi yi dbang po'i 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ / gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag gyur// de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyu la yang mthong // deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis//
135a3(dkon brtsegs): mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid cig bcom// gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g.yo gnas// rnam
135a4(dkon brtsegs): dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ / de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom/ thub po ston pa dang sus mnyes par bgyis// 'dren pa de ring su zhig gting rnyed gyur// tha
135a5(dkon brtsegs): tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal/ / 'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnyan slad du// 'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas// 'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom sol// rkang gnyis
135a6(dkon brtsegs): dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshogs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris
135a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na/ / 'gro ba'i den yang khyod kyis byas par gyur// de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis// grul bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod byas te// zhi ba'i chos
135b1(dkon brtsegs): la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngam gyur te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchod de// zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang /
135b2(dkon brtsegs): lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing // bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed// snying rjebs na ngal mchod pa byas// rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsams// mkhas pa
135b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag las de byas pas na/ / grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzung // rgya byin lha yi drung du 'dong bar 'gyur// thugs thub byams don mdzad ston drung du'ang 'dong // des ni cung
135b4(dkon brtsegs): zad yang dang yang bstan te/ / phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur// de dag bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing // bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa
135b5(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / go cha chen po rab tu bgos yid kyis// de dag spro ba med par 'jig rten khams// khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te//
135b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba// der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes// de dag thams kyisnga ma 'ongs dus dag na// ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam
135b7(dkon brtsegs): grol byed/ / rgyal ba ngo mtshar med par zhing sbyor zhing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi ba tshol// de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te// 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar
136a1(dkon brtsegs): @#'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing / / bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te// grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thos nas// 'gro ba the tshom
136a2(dkon brtsegs): bsal te dga' bar gyur/ / grul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis/ lha ma yin rnams dang / nam
136a3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams dang / grul bum rnams kyi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu
136a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa'ang yang dag par bka' stsa
136a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'ang bstan la/ chos gang la'ang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshur rmad do snyam nas
136a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te/ rab
136a7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal pos srungs kyi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// glang
136b1(dkon brtsegs): blo ches srungs kyi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ so re re la'ang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re
136b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re zhing yang 'dab ma bye ba phrag stong stong / 'dab ma re re zhi yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan
136b3(dkon brtsegs): pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa bdun bdun zhing pad+ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to/ / glang po che sa srungs kyi bu de dag gi mgo re re la'ang rin po che sna
136b4(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi gdugs nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gzungs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul
136b5(dkon brtsegs): to/ / glang po che'i mgo bo thams cad la'aja lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to// de nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srungs kyi
136b6(dkon brtsegs): bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la zhon te/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan len cing nam mkha' la rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan sum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i tsan
136b7(dkon brtsegs): dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// lha'i a ka ru'i phye ma dang / lha'i ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang /
137a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / man zu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru
137a2(dkon brtsegs): sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gser dang / dngul
137a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / smug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rje'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon
137a4(dkon brtsegs): par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor te// spos kyi bla re de dag las spos kyi dang byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go// lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon
137a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bab bo/ / spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos chu'i rdzab de'i dris
137a6(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra
137a7(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ blangs
137b1(dkon brtsegs): che sa srungs kyi bu'i mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la/ lha'i bu mo glu len pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de/ skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so// lha'i bu mo de dag las
137b2(dkon brtsegs): la la nI lus kyi tshul sbyar/ ya la ni tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / tam la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor
137b3(dkon brtsegs): la la ni me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po nas sku snar khra bo dang / sgra snar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni gser gyi me tog
137b4(dkon brtsegs): nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che snyam pas blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni na bza' dag 'thor/ la la ni
137b5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs kyi rgyan dang / klu regs dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba rin po ches sbas pa'i bar dag 'bul lo// la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin/ la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
137b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char ba bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa ngag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
137b7(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ / de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu de dag la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las/
138a1(dkon brtsegs): @#glang po che sa srungs kyi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar
138a2(dkon brtsegs): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'degashegs srid pa mthar phyin pa// srid pa'i bcings las 'gro
138a3(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam grol mdzad/ / khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mngara'// mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di steng du// grags pa mtha' yas
138a4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan/ / 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la// dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod// bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// brjod pa tsam ste
138a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ni ci ma mchis/ / tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis// 'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni 'gro ba sbyong // bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ongs med dang // gnas med rang
138a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang / / chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan// rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan// chos rnams gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis// 'jig rten gtso bos
138a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'ang yongs su bstan/ / bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan// shing rta'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ bdag dang gzhan gyi
138b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mi sems kyang / / shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yongs su srul mi bgyid// chos ni chos
138b2(dkon brtsegs): la dran par bgyid ma mchis/ / chos rnams chos la nye bar mi rten te// chos rnams gang yang ma skyes 'chi ma mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs// kun rdzob de yang de
138b3(dkon brtsegs): nam mchis te/ / 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes// tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yang dag gsungs// ming gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshegs pas
138b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rnam par bzhag/ chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad// de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te// nor
138b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams/ / chos kyis rgyo kyi tshul la gzung bgyis te// zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi med thob par bgyi// rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 'dren pa
138b6(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa/ / thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas// bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog/ ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin
138b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis/ / nga rgyal ba sgribs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba// mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya ldan yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bde
139a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ / 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la// g.yo yi zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong // yongs 'thom spre'u ltar
139a2(dkon brtsegs): rgod pa yongs su dgrol/ / ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi// lha tshogs songs sgo gnyid kyis log gyur cing // bdag nyid las
139a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'bras bu chud gson dgrol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang
139a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na// bde ga
139a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs/ / nem nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tshom sol// bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas// skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par gyur// 'dzum pa'i don
139a6(dkon brtsegs): ni de dag nyan par 'tshal/ / thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs// the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das
139a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/ / mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad// su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur// gang
139b1(dkon brtsegs): gi blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas/ / bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad// 'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste// bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thos par dka'// sor
139b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing / / dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du lta// nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten mig/ 'gro
139b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol/ / rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshogs su bcad de slar
139b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas mdzad pa// khyod kyis don dris 'thun zhing legs pa ste// 'dzum pa de yi don ni lung bstan pas// skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel//
139b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis// rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// de ni ma log par yang ngas bstan gyis// bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon// dri za 'di rnam
139b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rjes snyegs shing / / bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas// chos nyid byung bar gyur pa med pa ste// chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin// rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur
139b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ / rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur// gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba// des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsung // de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas// rta med glang
140a1(dkon brtsegs): po mchog gis mchod pa byas/ / byang chub dam pa rga med tshol byed cing // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do// nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni// thams cad
140a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos/ / 'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas// dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te// blo gros bzang rnams lha gnas lha yul ba// brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar
140a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa// bye ba khrag khrig mngal mchod byed 'gyur// zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing // de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan// de dag bde
140a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs spyod pa yongs su sbyong / / de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni// khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston// 'gro ba 'di dag rang
140a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin stong rig nas/ / bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa// rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan
140a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste/ / sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i// bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston// rgyal ba thub pa nyon
140a7(dkon brtsegs): mongs bcom pa yis/ / de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan// rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa// dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad// dri za lung bstan yid du 'thar 'gyur ba// de
140b1(dkon brtsegs): thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'/ / der ni bde bar gshegs kyi gsung thos nas// shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong // dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
140b2(dkon brtsegs): bam po lnga pa// / de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad rgyus lha ma yin rnams nas/ dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi
140b3(dkon brtsegs): rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de/ chos nyid la 'jug pa'ang thos pas/ ston pa'i
140b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo brad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
140b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
140b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mngon shes stobs ni kun tu mtha' yas te/ rgya mtsho chu 'dzin pas ma 'tshal dang 'dra// de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa// mi
140b7(dkon brtsegs): yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod/ / ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'// gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'// shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs//
141a1(dkon brtsegs): tshad gzung dpag par nus pa yong ma mchig/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsam bathugs su chud// skye bo drang rung mi rung gdul min pa// de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par
141a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ / de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// de dag ci 'dra'i khams la rten pa dang // de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang // de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen// de bas
141a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ / 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod// mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen// phrag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste// de bas mtshungs
141a4(dkon brtsegs): med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ / 'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyu dgar 'khyams pa// de dag mtshungs med khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// de la ye shes rgyud du rab 'byung bas// de bas mtshungs med kun
141a5(dkon brtsegs): tu mtha' yang yas/ / bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs// chud za'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing // byams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa// de dag ma lus
141a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ / 'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas shing // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag rag 'gyur dang // lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams// de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis
141a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzigs/ / mi yi seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang // gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar// gang la rten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rang
141b1(dkon brtsegs): tu gzigs/ / de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis// ci 'dra'i lam la de dag bsten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis
141b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ / byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la// rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yi// bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs
141b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas/ / dmyal ba chen por ji srid gnas pa dang // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu
141b4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ / gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dang bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing // chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas// mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig
141b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyis shing / / 'gro rgyud kun tu smon pa rnam spangs te// lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas// phung po brag cha 'dra bar rtogs gyur te// byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu
141b6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ / mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa// de yis bla med sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob
141b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
142a1(dkon brtsegs): rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni// rgyu ma mchis
142a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ / 'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol// ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// mgon pos de
142a3(dkon brtsegs): dag the tshom bsal du gsol/ / 'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskyed// gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs// gang gi sems ni mi
142a4(dkon brtsegs): bskul gnas par gyur/ / de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol// de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing // kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du lta zhing sdod// ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun
142a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ / de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol// de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags// gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'di bstan lags// gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal
142a6(dkon brtsegs): don mchis 'gyur/ / de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa// the tshom 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis legs bsal gsol// de thos lha dang
142a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ / dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
142b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// de ring 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas// rang byung 'dzum mdzad cu ni dris pas na// ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyod kyis legs par mthong // de
142b2(dkon brtsegs): dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par bya/ / gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas// 'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa// dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis// rgyal
142b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas/ / gnod sbyin tshigs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de// 'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang //
142b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang // mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnam spangs shing // byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // rnam
142b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnams bshig cing / / kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te// srid pa kun tu chu la pad+mo bzhin// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // de dag srid pa
142b6(dkon brtsegs): glang du chags 'gyur ba/ / stong par bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs pa// de nyid rgyal ba'i bla mad byang chub ste// byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes// skye dang rga shi yong
142b7(dkon brtsegs): gis stong pa ste/ / de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin// dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas// zhi ba bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing
143a1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid/ / byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste// ye shes ldan pas shes kyis byis pas min// ye shes/
143a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te// shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas// shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur na// byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya// stong pa'i rang
143a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin stong bar shes par bya/ / mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // ston pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste// de ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod pa yin// de thos lha dang
143a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ / dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur// rang byung chos la de dag yid ches te// zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur// gnod sbyin
143a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te/ / 'di ltar ngal mchod pa rab byas pas// gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams// mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag
143a6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis/ / zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig la yang // blo can+da de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod// de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston// de dag 'jig rten
143a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis/ / mtshan ma med par spyod cing 'dod gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas// 'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod// de ltar brtan
143b1(dkon brtsegs): pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas/ / byang chub bla med de dag 'thob 'gyur te// de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mthara' yas 'gyur// sems can mtha' yas padag rnam par 'grel// sangs rgyas mkhyen
143b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas grags pa can/ / de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas zhes bya// zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi/ tshe tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur// de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur
143b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ / rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de// kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med// de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig
143b4(dkon brtsegs): rten dag/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol// ngoms par gyur nas brtson 'grus brtan brtsams te// kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur// gnod sbyin lung
143b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang / gnod
143b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar de dag kyang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la/ srog dang / skye ba po dang /
143b7(dkon brtsegs): shing las skyes dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang / bdag gi gang yang med la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i
144a1(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / kham sa dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya ba'i las de'ang mi dmigs/ b+hang /
144a2(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa
144a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do/ / ci zhig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs
144a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / zhing bkod pa de dang / zhing yongs su dag pa dang //
144a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed
144a6(dkon brtsegs): cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
144a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di skad cig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs
144b1(dkon brtsegs): pas lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te/ sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam
144b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
144b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas// sha rab che mnga' bdag dogs skyes// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bde gshegs bdag gis de ma 'tshal//
144b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang // rang bzhin med gsung ji lta bu// mchod pa 'di ci gang zag mchog/ skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub tu// sems
144b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ni ji lta bu/ / skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i// ldem po ngag de bdag ma 'tshal// mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung // de ni yang
144b6(dkon brtsegs): dgo lung bstan pas/ / thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum// sgyu ma 'dral lhar skye zhes// gsungs pa de ni ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // shAkya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal/
144b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la// dge ba shes brten gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal// g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams//
145a1(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs
145a2(dkon brtsegs): shes mgon gsungs ji lta bu/ / the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes// shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal// zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal la// chos kun ni gsungs ji lta bu// mtshungs
145a3(dkon brtsegs): med 'di 'dra'i ldem po ngag/ bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol// gru mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams// nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu// chos ni rab tu spangs bgyid na//
145a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu// bsam pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang // 'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang // las de bgyid pa ma mchis la// rang las can gsungs ji lta bu//
145a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang // zil gyis mi non bdag ma 'tshal// mgon po de la bdag dogs na// bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom sol// dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis
145a6(dkon brtsegs): la/ / byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs// dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul// de skad bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal// chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la// spong byed las ni
145a7(dkon brtsegs): zad bstan pa/ / tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang // bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal// yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la// ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang
145b1(dkon brtsegs): rab rib bral ba yi/ / spyan mnga' sdig spangs bstan du gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di// sel nus ma mchis de lta bas/
145b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan nas/ de la lan gdab pa'i phyir/
145b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa// gal te 'ga' zhig mi stong na// rgyal
145b4(dkon brtsegs): bas de lung bstan mi gsung / / ci phyir zhe na 'di lta bur// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na// 'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste// de la 'phel med 'grib pa med// me long shin tu yongs
145b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la/ / ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi// gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du// ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis// chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na// mchod pa'i yan lag
145b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gang shes/ / yan lag rnams la brtag byos la// ljon pa mchod pa 'di la dpyid// chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du// 'gyur med skye bo mkhas pas rtogs// byis
145b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni 'di la 'khrul/ / blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes// skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed// de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag/
146a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba rnams// 'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa// log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can//
146a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de dag sngon chad ma thos pa'i// sems med chos ni ngas bshad na// byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams// 'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/
146a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang // byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas// zil gyis ma non rang byung sems// rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba//
146a4(dkon brtsegs): riyang ma 'tshal ces smras pa// 'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis// gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la// 'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med//
146a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par bstan// sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skye ba// ji lta bu zhes dogs gyur pa// mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang // skye ba
146a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mtho ris bshad/ / gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la// dge ba shes bstan ces gang smras pa// gnas dang dpral bar bya ba'i phyir// gnas pa med pa'i dge ba shes bsten//
146a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// bstan pa ma 'tshal zhes smras pa// shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang // shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs// mi gang bdag yod khas len cing /
146b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa// de dag la ni bya ba dang // g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa/
146b2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams// rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa// de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston// kun tu rtogs pa'i rtogs pas
146b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed/ / yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings// zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang // zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni// mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyis// kun tu rtog las sred pa ste//
146b4(dkon brtsegs): skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la// kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye// mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod pa min la log par brtags// chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang // smig rgyu la ni rgyu
146b5(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / de bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs// sdug pa min la sdug par rtog/ byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis// sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te//
146b6(dkon brtsegs): smig rgya la ni chu med do// de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med// gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na// byis pa log pa'i 'dus shes can// sdug pa rtog pas bcings par gyur// chos
146b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang / / spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa// meng ba mthong bar ma gyur pa// mi mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na// bdag zhen dus
147a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mi shes pa/ / de dag stong zhes thos gyur na// bdag med 'gyur zhes blag pa skye// de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te// nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas// stong pa gya nom
147a2(dkon brtsegs): spong byed de/ / mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por ltung // mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang // skye bo 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang // las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te// byed pa po ni rab tu bkag/
147a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag tu na 'gro ba dag/ rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis// rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med// log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen// ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan// byed po phyogs
147a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu rnams na med/ / shing rnams rlung gis bskul ba las// me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no// bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes// rlung dang shing la sems pa med// 'on kyang me ni 'byung
147a5(dkon brtsegs): bltar/ / las kyi byed po de bzhin no// bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang // legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni// de tshul yang dag mnyan par
147a6(dkon brtsegs): byos/ / mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste// de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyis// lo la phung por spungs pa med// sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs// zad pa med ces gang smras dang // las
147a7(dkon brtsegs): zad ces ni ngas spras pa/ / stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med// tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan// yang dag mtha' ni nges bshad pa// phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'// log pa'i blo can
147b1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rnams/ / yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so// mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de// mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi// nges pa ljon pa
147b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod nyon cig/ yi ge gcig gis brjod pa yi// byang chub blo ldan rnams la bstan// chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa// a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// de ltar spyod pa byed rnams
147b3(dkon brtsegs): / / mtshan nyid mtha' las ngas bstan te// 'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni// a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// chos rnams thams cad 'gag med la// a yi chos la 'jug par
147b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ / a si sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// de yang ljon pas shes par gyis// chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa// de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs// chos kun 'gyur ba med pa ya/
147b5(dkon brtsegs): a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag/ ljon pas de ltar shes par gyis// mi zad pa dang zad smras pa// chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba
147b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis/ / mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bag+h+nAn// chos rnams kun la sgo med de// de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung // 'di yang gzungs sngo yin te// a la brten nas
147b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par bya/ / chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces// yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// 'di yang ljon pas shes par gyis/
148a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kun lus med byang chub ces// blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams
148a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa ste/ / med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brtan nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste// med pas de
148a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gdags pa med/ / 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste// med pas de dag rang bzhin med// 'di yang
148a4(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ / bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// gzungs kyi sgo mo nga las nyon// chos kun yid la bya ba med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar
148a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/ / med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya//
148a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kun thogs pa med pa ste// thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par//
148a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes par bya// chos rnams yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma lus rang bzhin meng/
148b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya// gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de dag mthong med bstan par bya// lta ba po ni med pa dang // de dag rnams kyang
148b2(dkon brtsegs): med phyir ro/ / chos kun mnyam med de bas na// mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med// nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste// chos kun yod pa ma yin no// de ltar lhag med chad pa
148b3(dkon brtsegs): med/ / mnyam gzhag med cing gnyis su med// gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med// lta ba'i lam min med phyir ro// drang po ma yin yon po min// mun pa ma yin snang ba min//
148b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba med cing thos med de// med pas gzungs su shes par gyis// g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste// chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba med// 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med// ci yang
148b5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed nyer zhi med/ / skye ba med cing gnas kyang med// 'gro med ldog med 'gro sems med// nyal ba med cing mi nyal med// sad pa med par shes par gyis// mig can ma yin long ba
148b6(dkon brtsegs): min/ / lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min// sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min// dul ba ma yin ma dul min// rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min// 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bden min
148b7(dkon brtsegs): brdzun min de lta bur/ / rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis// 'jig rten gdul ba'i don phyir gyi// 'di la the tshom gang yang med// gang gcad bya ba'i the tshom de// dam pa'i don du
149a1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba med/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa dang / gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim
149a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa shing la rten pa dang / pad+ma la rten pa dang / ri la rten pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi
149a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin can/ rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang lda ldis brgyan pa bye ba
149a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes
149a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ de mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan
149a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thang las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de
149a7(dkon brtsegs): nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs te rkang pas dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar
149b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
149b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
149b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu// 'dzum mdzad rnye de bka'
149b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal gsol/ / thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa// 'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal// zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du// smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du lta// bde gsheg
149b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa deng su zhig/ gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes// bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog dam pa the tshom sol// bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la//
149b6(dkon brtsegs): da pa thob na bcom ldan 'das// 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// smras mchog bdag gi the tshom khum// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis// bcom ldan bstan
149b7(dkon brtsegs): thos yid dga' zhing / / the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad// ji ltar bstan zhing gnas par 'gyur// de ltas rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ 'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa
150a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / / the tshom gcad smad ljon pa dang // mid+d+hi rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
150a2(dkon brtsegs): thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ / skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du// sangs rgyas yon tan sten 'gyur ba// ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa// rta thul
150a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis legs par dris/ / ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa// bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can// deng khyod dang ba'i yid byos la// skyon med yid kyis nga las nyon//
150a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir// ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa// de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas// the tshom bcad pa la nyon// ljon pa la sogs mi 'am ci// bye ba
150a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa/ / de dgang la mchod byas nas// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong // bsal pa bye ba dgu bcur der// lha min nang du 'khor bar 'gyur//
150a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur// mi yi seng ge de dag gis// sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu// sprul bkye rang ni lha
150a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas na/ / bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang // de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas// rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su// byang
150b1(dkon brtsegs): chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ / rtag tu gnang ba'i bskal ba la// mi yi seng ge 'jig rten mgon// chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas// stobs bcu gang+gA/
150b2(dkon brtsegs): brjid mtha' yas 'gyur// de dag zhing du sems can gang // yongs su ma smin 'ga' mi skye// nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba// kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa// mi mi/
150b3(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i zhing der ni// byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba// de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams/
150b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing // yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes// de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs// sems can rlabs chen de dag ni// smon lam rgya chen yun
150b5(dkon brtsegs): ring btab/ / de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// bsam pas rang bzhin rnam par sbyong // nyon mongs 'joms pa de dag gi/ zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni// dga'
150b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams/ / ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag/ de dag zhing du rnam kun tu// mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// zhing rnams yongs sbyangs de dag ni// /
150b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren// de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis// mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad// lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang
151a1(dkon brtsegs): / yid ni rangs par 'gyur// mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le ruH bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas lnga 'phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khrin/
151a2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin rnams nas/ mi 'am ci'i bar dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang
151a3(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po
151a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man da ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gang bar byas so/ / de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
151a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas/ tshogasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal// srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba// bde bar gshegs pa
151a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje can/ / 'jig rten bdag po mi yi bdag/ sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi// 'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par// zhabs mchog mdzes shing dag ldan pa//
151a7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal// ji ltar dgung zla nya ba'i tshe// mi rnams zla bar phyag 'tshal ba// de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'das
151b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhal du lta/ / dpag tu med pa'i dge spyad pa// dpagayas ye shes phung po ldan// gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can// blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal//
151b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal sdug pa// bden bzhi mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel// rgyal ba'i bco brgyang chos dang ldan// the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis
151b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mnga' zhing / / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs// bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims stobs kyi
151b4(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin pa/ / ting 'dzin stobs nas mi bskyod pa// ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can// bdud stobs bcomathub rgyal ba lags// ye shes stobs mchog rgyus
151b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ / ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// skyes bu seng ge badre gshegs khyod//
151b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi// chos rnams 'dir ni thob par shog/ ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi// bsam
151b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du/ / 'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang // lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du// snying brtse nye bar bzu
152a1(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ / 'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba// srid pa'i rtu las bsngal bar bgyi/ bdag cag ltar bcas 'jig rten gyi// 'dren dang
152a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dren gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa// srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha 'phreng ldan glang po can
152a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ bde gshegs
152a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa po/ / rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i// rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal
152a5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dzum mdzad pa/ / 'gro ba dang bgyi byung mthong nas// 'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te// 'dzum pa'i don ni nyan par 'tshal// don chen 'dzum pa mdzad
152a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don/ / bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa mchog/ dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod// the tshom chad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol// gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par
152a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis/ / gang gis deng khyod bla med bgyis// su zhig de ring gi ting thob gyur// bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum// de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas// dkrusas
152b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yengs kun tu 'khrugs par bgyis/ / deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' yid ldan par bgyis// rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston// 'gro ba'i the tshom
152b2(dkon brtsegs): myur du 'um/ / de thos bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su btsud de/ tshe dang
152b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ 'phreng ldan glang po can lnga yi// lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pas// des na 'gro ba mang po yi// don chen shin tu dang byas 'gyur//
152b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par// sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston// de ni 'gro ba mang don du// de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// 'phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs
152b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ / ngal sems dang nga mchod pas// bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu// nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// 'thun
152b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi yi nang skyes te/ / rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la// me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur// kun tu bde bar gshegs kyi sems// skyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel
152b7(dkon brtsegs): byed 'gyur/ / rang byang mi yi seng gi la// tshigs su bcang bas bstod par 'gyu// ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang // me tog
153a1(dkon brtsegs): gis mchod tshig bcad kyis/ / mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te// de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing // mthu bo che yi sku bstod nas// rab tu
153a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i bskal pa la/ / rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung // grags pa mA sma dA nags rgyu ba// brgyad khri po rnams de dag kun// bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur/
153a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya// de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang // ngan song gshin rje'i 'jig rten med// zhing de na ni lha min med// mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom//
153a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ldan glang po can lha yi// longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi// ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med// de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag/ mi dge byed pa
153a5(dkon brtsegs): smos ci dgos/ / de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi// skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ gang+gA'i bye ma rab mang snyed// grol bar byed
153a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur stobs bcu rnams/ / gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston// grags pa ma sdud de dag gi/ ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel la'ang /
153a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi// ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang // byang chub tu ni sems
153b1(dkon brtsegs): skyed 'gyur/ / 'phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// thos shing shes nus 'khor kun kyang // de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'//
153b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'phreng ldan glang
153b3(dkon brtsegs): po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la sI rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/
153b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na kham pa'i grul zhon pa'i mi zhig chu'i dbus su phyin na// gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu
153b5(dkon brtsegs): rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid la drad pa skyes nas/

154a1(dkon brtsegs): mdog dang / bain+duR+Ya dang / gser dang / rdo rje'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// lha'i rol mo sil snyan dgu khri'ang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu
154a2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri po de dag thogs nas/ rol mo sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing / steng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing

154a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor te/ de dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad padag
154a5(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi/ lha ni dgu khri tham pa dang // 'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na// thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchi zhum ma mchis//
154a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis// mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis par// rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshol// khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum// mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs// sred
154a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phur pa rab tu byung / / nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bskal// khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste// bral gdug pa khyod kyis spangs// khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste// 'dren pa khyod kyis rma rnams
154b1(dkon brtsegs): sos/ / khyod kyis nyon mongs thams cad sbyangs// bcing ba dag ni thams cad bcud// sbyor ba kun dang bra ba ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'das// rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ni// spyod
154b2(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid dang mtshan ma med/ / bcom ldan khyod la smon pa yang // rnam pa kun tu mi mnga' 'o// khyod kyis sbed pa drung nas phyung // ma rig pas ni thugs kyang phyung // rnam pa bzhi po'i phyin ci
154b3(dkon brtsegs): log/ rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs// glang du 'jig rten mi chud de// ri dwags rngon pas ji bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba yi// yang dag mtha' ni khyod kyis gzigs// sems
154b4(dkon brtsegs): can 'jigs tshogs ltar lhung ste/ / stong pa nyid ni ma 'tshal bas// ma rig pa yi mun pas gtibs// 'khor ba'i btson rar dga' bar bgyid// khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du// 'gro da chang
154b5(dkon brtsegs): bstong 'drar gzigs/ / gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i// ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan// phung po stong par rnam par bshig/ ming dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing // khams rnams dang ni
154b6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched dag/ bdag med stong par rnam par bshig/ chos gang dang ni ming gang gis// chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba// chos de chos des stong pa ste// thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan
154b7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la/ / skye bo'i tshogs chen mngon sprul na// de la sems can gdags ma mchis// srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar// de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang // dbang
155a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang tham rgya byu / / yang dgra sa min sA m+b+ha n+tas// skyes byungam pas brtan pa mdzad// dri myur rdzos dan 'i k+Shik+ta/ drung med gzugs ni rnam bris shing/
155a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang // lci dang yang ba bstan gyis kyang // byis pa'i mig ni bslus pa ste// de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam lags na// byis pa
155a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni de la rmongs/ / gang shes khyod kyi bsgrub pa la// legs bslabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du// de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan// shes rab chen po khyod kyis
155a4(dkon brtsegs): ni/ / ye shes sgron ma rab bus te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can rnams la chos bstan pa// de ltar bdag cag myur du ni// bla med byang chub zhi thob ste// ji ltar 'dren
155a5(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod bzhin du/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi// 'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can la// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin// bdag

155b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu/ / dpa' bo chen po sa lung bstan gsol// skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag/ bde gshegs deng bzhad mthong nas ni// yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te// kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar
155b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / de ring su yis bdun 'am bgyis// nem nur gang gis bcad par gyur// su zhig de ring chos rtogs gyur// skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol// de ring khyod la su yis mchod//

156a1(dkon brtsegs): tu dad pa'i yid kyis byas/ / sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas// stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur// chos rnams la ni nges pa rnyed// nga yi bstan la rab tu
156a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ / sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod// ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni// bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur// 'dren pa de dag ji srid du//
156a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod cing // bsnyen bkur byas par ma gyur pa// de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya// de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na// kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od zer 'chang/

156b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan 'gyur/ / 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi// mchod rten de dag thams cad la// srog chags brgya dang stang rnams dang // khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas// byang chub mchog tu

157b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug/ so de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad+ma stong phrag bdun bdun/ pad+ma dag re re zhing yang 'dab rtswa brgyad Sh+T+rI brgyan/
