157b4(dkon brtsegs): khang pa de dag las kyang / lha'i tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / ut+pa la dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / gser phye'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog man pa ra ba dang /
157b5(dkon brtsegs): man da ra bu chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sprul pa'i ma
157b6(dkon brtsegs): tog dag gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / sdug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi ma
157b7(dkon brtsegs): tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ / lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang /
158a1(dkon brtsegs): glang po ches srungs kyi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu rtswa cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad rdul
158a2(dkon brtsegs): zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po'ang phul bar gyur to// lha'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad cu'ang bar snang las s+thA
158a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byin par gyur to/ / shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la'ang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu mngon par sprul te/ lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar
158a4(dkon brtsegs): byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag
158a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na/ chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam
158a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du sems par gyur cing / de dag gis
158a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sprul pa dang 'dre bar shesanas chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to/ / de dag de ltar the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
158b1(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing / bdag cag kyang sprul
158b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'dra bar mthong / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de
158b3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas/ the tshom med cing nim nur med par gyur te/ de'i tshe
158b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang / sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyi sa dang // lha rnams kyis
158b5(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/ / 'di ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid// 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang // 'di/
158b6(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad sprul po 'dra'o zhes// de ltar lnga tshegs de dag blo gros skyes// bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du// ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste// rgyal bas lung bstan
158b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas/ / 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so// rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas/ byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa// de dag sun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te/
159a1(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs 'gro ba srung bsnun de bzhin no// slob pa rnams dang bang dgu mi slob dang // bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa// de dag gan kyang bcom ldan smra
159a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra/ / bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra lhur len cing // ba se ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs// de dag rnams kyang sprul 'dra bcom ldan
159a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ / bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so// gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir// rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang //
159a4(dkon brtsegs): khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra// bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can// ye shes stobasa' phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag/
159a5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs// 'dren pas 'di 'chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas med ni bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing // sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa// de ya
159a6(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no/ / bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis// gang tshe go'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di// bdag cag rtogs nas the tshom
159a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spangs/ / sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa rnams// the tshom ma mchis
159b1(dkon brtsegs): rang byung 'dren par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sgyum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu bo drug gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs sna chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad/
159b2(dkon brtsegs): do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhal yas grangs mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid can// bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad//
159b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tshomakhum// rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di// byung bar rig nas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal//
159b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i the tshom thub pas bsal du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis mdzod// lha tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas// rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod// bde
159b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad/ / rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol// zla 'drar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi// can nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di
159b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pas/ / mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dgar 'gyur bar// rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol// bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun// sprul
159b7(dkon brtsegs): blta bur rnam par rtogs gyur na/ / stobs brtsa mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsol te// rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs// skye bo 'di dgathe tshom bral gyur nas// thub pa
160a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur/ / rab tu dba' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur te// dgongs pa rig nas rgya chen rtsom par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/
160a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig/ smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste/
160a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa des dris pa// des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstan gyis// dga' zhing dang ba'i se
160a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis nga la nyon/ / lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni// ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas// chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing // rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon
160a5(dkon brtsegs): bor 'gyur/ / srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// mi yi gtso bo gang+gA'i bye snyed chos// srid rgyun de na 'di dag thub pa las// chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo // 'di dag nga la mchod
160a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog 'dir byas pas/ / chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong // bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni// chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yong mi 'gyur// lha tshogs
160a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di yis nga la mchod byas te/ / chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas// bskal pa pad+ma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe// smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming
160b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog 'gyur ba ni/ / bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po// chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing // 'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grel bar 'gyur/ kha de gshegs
160b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag bstan la bag yod pa/ / chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems// zhi gnas de la su rten bag yod pa// myur du bla med byang chub mchog zhi thob// sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung
160b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o/ / / de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang
160b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas// tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs pa med
160b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob na ma shes pa 'am/ pa mthong ba'am/ ma rtogs pa 'am/ mngon du ma byas pa 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag
160b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis thugs
160b7(dkon brtsegs): su chud de/ shes par bya ba'ang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do// de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid du rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen/ legs par mngon du mdzad pas/
161a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa
161a2(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ pa shes pa/ rnam pa
161a3(dkon brtsegs): ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma btags pa/ 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa/ nye bar ma bsnyen pa/ ma bor ba/ ma bzhag
161a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi ba med pa/ ma smad pa/ ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/ sdug bsngal ba
161a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma yin pa/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten
161a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsams pa/
161a7(dkon brtsegs): ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ ji ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
161b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / s+tha dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang /
161b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi
161b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid
161b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i bAR+Sha gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'dus shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su
161b5(dkon brtsegs): sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par
161b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma mi dmig pa ste/
161b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba
162a1(dkon brtsegs): yin na/ de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa mi ges pa rnams kyis thos na 'jigs shing dngang ba dang skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad
162a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas
162a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mcho
162a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las khyad par du 'phags pa sa bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu
162a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khor nas 'theng zlal gyi lha de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bskyod pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzik+shas kham
162a6(dkon brtsegs): dang skyed mched rnams kyang de bzhin te/ dbang po'i mong ni mtshan ma sa dben pa dag/ kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa 'di gnyis te// khyod kyis
162a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan las ma gas na rang gis gzigs/ / de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste// bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so// gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams/ bde ba'i don
162b1(dkon brtsegs): du dad bskyed 'gyur ba/ / rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// 'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to// sems can tshogs kyis 'gro drug gang bstan pa// sems can dmyal dang dung/
162b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro yi dgas dang // lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams// mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad// rigs dma' de bzhin mtho bo'i rigs rnams dang // phyug po'i khyim dang dbul/
162b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i khyim rnams dang // bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs// bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang // 'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung // mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig
162b4(dkon brtsegs): rten bstan mdzad pa/ / kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas// 'jig rten phan pas mi la de bstan to// de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na// 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi byung
162b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ thob dang ma tho ba snyan dang mi snyan dang // bstod dang smang dang de dang sdug bsngal lo// thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed// ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur// gang gzhan ma bstan
162b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'dis shes par bya/ / nad rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur// kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba// de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya// mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang /
162b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang // mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing // de ltar dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na// 'jig shing
163a1(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar bgyid/ / de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas// sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong // de dag tshul min bde ba chol/
163a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyang // sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis// ma log blo sa ni rnam par rtogs gyur na// sbrul gyi pags pa rnying ltar rab spangs te// srid//
163a3(dkon brtsegs): pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste// stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes// gang gis thos nas dga' ba skyed 'gyur ba// de dag bla med byang chub thob par
163a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol// byang chub blo can rnam das
163a5(dkon brtsegs): blo can rnams/ / skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol// de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
163a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ / de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
163a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ / 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des// khyod kyi 'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur// mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// des na 'khor 'di rab tu dag
163b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ / lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na// 'khor 'di shin tu dka' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur//
163b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod// 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad slad du// snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas
163b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na/ / skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na// mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur// mi yi dam pa smra
163b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mchog gis 'dir/ / the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol// 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdod// lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang
163b5(dkon brtsegs): rim gror gus par rna blags te/ / khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan// 'jig rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs// de nas
163b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan// sangs
163b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na/ / skye bo tshogs can rnams kyi don du 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing // 'dod chags po dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang // tshe rabs
164a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang / / gti mug blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur// gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon
164a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dris dang / / gang rnams snying rje chen dang ldan pa dag/ de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong gyur te// mi yi seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa//
164a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na// ut+pal 'phreng bzhin mgo la 'khyer bar 'gyur// nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' gyur pa// sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon byas te// de dag sangs rgyas
164a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yid 'ong 'di/ / me tog 'phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta// 'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la// bsnyen bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste// nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas
164a5(dkon brtsegs): blo ldan gyur/ / snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan// rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang+gA yi// bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bkur byas// byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing // dge ba mtha'
164a6(dkon brtsegs): yas 'di dag kun gyis byas/ / sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje bskyed// de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la// chos tshul mtha
164a7(dkon brtsegs): yas yongs su dris par gyur/ / gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa// rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur// mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas// de dag rnams la rgya
164b1(dkon brtsegs): rjen chos kyang 'chad/ / rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chang // de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs/
164b2(dkon brtsegs): cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong // rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med par smra// rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas// kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas// de dag nga
164b3(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa rgya chen byas/ / bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas// skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pa la// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs mnyam pa
164b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa bye ba phrag/ nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur// blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/ sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam
164b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams/ / rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa// rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis// lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'// 'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug
164b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / // de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan
164b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang thos nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ ci gzugs sam 'on
165a1(dkon brtsegs): te tshor ba 'am/ 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
165a2(dkon brtsegs): tu lung bstan snyam nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
165a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang
165a4(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes pa na/ ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ba skyes pa ra/
165a5(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya// gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub
165a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med
165a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ rnam
165b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med ga
165b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa nas/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa sa 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs
165b3(dkon brtsegs): su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ de ltar chos thams cad ni mi dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / byang chub ni gang / lung bstan
165b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo
165b5(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams
165b6(dkon brtsegs): cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming tsam/ brda
165b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba mi cha'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan
166a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing rtse rtse ba las/ de nyal ba las sad na 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rjes su dran yang mi rnyed cing / de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin
166a2(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// de ci'i
166a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu nor pa ste/ chos de dag gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la/ so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to// chos de dag ni de ltar shes par bya ba yin na//
166a4(dkon brtsegs): de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo'ang
166a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas
166a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang
166a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang dmigs su med do// bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma ma mchis so zhes
166b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol nas/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos de dag la the tsom med cing / nem nu ma med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/
166b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
166b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab
166b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ rnam thar sgo gsum de ni rnyed gyur pas// mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis
166b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa// chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags// mi yi seng ge phung po dben la dgyes// skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi byang chub
166b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis/ / phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas// sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan// de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing // byang chub sems
166b7(dkon brtsegs): la'ang de dag mi smod de/ / dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par// bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod par bgyid// bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs// de la
167a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams/ / yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing // mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod// gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par
167a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhig bgyis shing / / mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs te// srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smon// dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid// phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs
167a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / / lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes// de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis// skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan
167a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ / de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te// mi yi seng ge de lta gang 'tshal ba// de ni khyod sras khyod ni de yi ya ba// gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing // khams dang skye mched
167a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos/ / byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa// bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang // gang rnams byang chub 'tshal zhing spyod bgyid pa// 'jig rten mkhas
167a6(dkon brtsegs): pab de dag 'gag ma mchis/ / 'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na// de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub rnyed mi dka'// phung po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang // byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras mi gtse/
167a7(dkon brtsegs): bar/ gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te// de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags// phung po sems med de bzhin skye mched dang // khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang // lung
167b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par/ / gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste// khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang // byang chub dang ni lung
167b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan rgyal sras rnams/ / ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spyod dang // phung po spros 'ang de bzhini khams rnams dang // skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang // lung bstan spros pa med
167b3(dkon brtsegs): par gang spyod cing / / de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te// mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yong ma lags// 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma
167b4(dkon brtsegs): byas ma la gos/ / de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing // ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur lags// de ltar bgyis na gang zag mcho
167b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod cing / / 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags// rnam par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi// dge ba de yis 'gro ba rang
167b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba/ / rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan par grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//
167b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'dren pa'i rgyu yi stobs ni gang zhig gis// stobs can brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i
168a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu de 'dzin pas bka' stsal gsol/ / des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur// shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzub mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'di snya mthong the tshom 'tshul gyur te/
168a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par// kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta// 'di ltar dper na nad pa nang skyo ba// sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di
168a3(dkon brtsegs): lus bstan thos 'tshal zhing / / rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta// 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan// rgyal bas lung bstan/
168a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thos 'tshal te// kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod// de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang // sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa
168a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhog 'gyur ba ra/ / ye shes stobs kyis the tsom gcad du gsol// mi yi khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom bsal du gsol// sangs rgyas slar sngo'i dgra
168a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mi mnga' na/ / rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul
168a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'jig rten smon mdzad la/ / 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na// de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas// 'jig rten pan phyir 'dzum pa
168b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ba da pa/ gang kri ma 'di dag shes supa// nga la mchod pargyan 'di byas pag+h+ri/ dga' ldan mi d+d+ha mkhyen na myang// 'amo ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du yod/
168b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes par gyur// gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas/
168b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus// de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms// sngan chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan// de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing // skyes bu
168b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas/ / stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas// de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas// 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung
168b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan dang / / gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang // byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ba// de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes// lha rnams gang yang de la the
168b6(dkon brtsegs): / com med// byang chub sems kyi rtag par de ltar spyod// de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag sod ji bzhin du// lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i blo ldan te// mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na// de phyir 'di dag
168b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rang byung 'gyur/ / gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas// g.yo ba med pa de la nem nur med// 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa// de la'ang lha rnams the tsom yong med do//
169a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang // thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// de la'ang lha rnams the tsom rnams
169a2(dkon brtsegs): par dag/ blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams// kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te// de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'// rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pa
169a3(dkon brtsegs): skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la/ / 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grel par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni// rang byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o// de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnam
169a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ / bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa// de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang // yi rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par gyur// dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
169a5(dkon brtsegs): / de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong // lung bstan

169a7(dkon brtsegs): stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
169b1(dkon brtsegs): to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang /

169b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ / tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas
169b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ / 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ro gcig pa'i slad du mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa

169b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni/ byang chub lags par rig par
169b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ / tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa
170a1(dkon brtsegs): lags pas/ de'i drung du marnams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das cung pos smras pa'i myang ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pan+de/
170a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ mtshabs med pa rnams kyang de'i nga
170a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ / bcom ldan 'das gang su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni/ mya ngan
170a4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'ang 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na/ de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni

170a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan
170a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis/ de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun cu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i
170b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te/
170b2(dkon brtsegs): rab byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang // rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas// khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa// mthong nas lhar bcas 'jig rten the tsom 'tshal// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang

170b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur/ / rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag/ sdig pa yongs spangs byang chub sems dang ldan// lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na// rgyal ba'i go 'ang
170b6(dkon brtsegs): / rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de bas rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // the tsom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs brtse bas// lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thams
170b7(dkon brtsegs): cad dga' bar mdzod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/
171a1(dkon brtsegs): rta thul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa// lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par// bstan par ngas byas dang bas kun kyang nyon// 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di
171a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis/ / thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bstan te// mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'i ngo ro chen po bsgrags// gnam
171a3(dkon brtsegs): du rdo 'a phangs sa la ltung bltar/ / de la the tsom za bar mi 'gyur te// de ltar the tsom med pa'i tshul thob pa// bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// nyi ma nub gyur nam smos gyur
171a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ / mi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// skar tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni/
171a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tsom med// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe// nyi ma
171a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong sems can de dag shes/ / de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes// chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing /
171a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// byang chub rgya chen 'thob par 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar gnam du bong ba 'phangs pa ni/
171b1(dkon brtsegs): sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tsom med// de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang // 'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug/ gang thos nas ni the tsom med 'gyur zhing // sangs/
171b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la// rang gi sar nye la ga stong ma yin par// mkhas pa rnams kyis chos nyid rab tu mthong // gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag/ sangs rgyas gzugs
171b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur bar chad smras byas kyang / / chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba// de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing // bdag gis bdag nyid
171b4(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan rjod byed pa/ / de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad// de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog mngon shes shing //
171b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang smra la// 'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad// rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams// bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa// de dag tshul
171b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i/ / 'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la brten par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab mthong zhing // mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba// de
171b7(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal/ / tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du dkara' thub spyad// sha khrag pa gas la mi lta byas pa bas// gang gis/
172a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na// de ni khyad 'phags dka' thu ba de lta min// 'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang // ma 'ongs sems can pan bzhed gang 'byung nga
172a2(dkon brtsegs): daltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa/ / kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob// rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub po'i tshul shes pa// 'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing // 'dren
172a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas/ / tshul gyis su ni rang byung thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams// de dag
172a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul ba/ / tshul tho ba rnams kyis sngon bsten myur du thob// de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med// sangs rgyas tshul
172a5(dkon brtsegs): la sems can rnams brtse ba/ / tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod// de ltar tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te// brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min// rtag tu dge ba shes mkhas pa
172a6(dkon brtsegs): bsten byas na/ / bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni// 'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yi rangs te// rjes su yi rang the tsom med gyur nas/
172a7(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyir tho gros la ni zhugs par gyur// 'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// bam po bdun pa/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal
172b1(dkon brtsegs): po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong // lung bstan pa'ang thos nas//
172b2(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa
172b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag cag gis ni yang dag pa'ang ma dmigs na/ de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigs na ni
172b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te/ de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o// de lta bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyospyod yul ma lags so// bcom
172b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni gnyis su med do zhes mi spyod mi mos na/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems
172b6(dkon brtsegs): su lags kyang / de ni lam log par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni lam log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
172b7(dkon brtsegs): gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
173a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ / bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags
173a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi bam
173a3(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba de'ang chos gang gis gnyen po'ang ma lags la/ chos gang yang chos de'i
173a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de'ang rang bzhin gyis
173a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs la/ gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag
173a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
173a7(dkon brtsegs): gzug ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas/
173b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de'ang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de'ang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma
173b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'ang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi ma
173b3(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba'o/ / 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba'am/ skye ba dang 'gag pas bzung ba 'am/ 'das
173b4(dkon brtsegs): pas bzung ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba'am/ 'dus byas kyis bzung ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/
173b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags
173b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes
173b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ / de nas gzhan 'phrul dang dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
174a1(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan srid pa mtha' 'byin legs par gsungs// 'dzin pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes na// skye bo ma/
174a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol bzod phyir rab tu zhugs// phung po rnams ni kun tu mi dmigs te// phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos gang
174a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gi gnyen por 'gyur ba ni/ / mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang // yongs shes bya dang spang bsgom mngon bya ba// gang yang ma mchis gang
174a4(dkon brtsegs): du'ang mi dmigs te/ / dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung // byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no// sangs rgyas gang yang
174a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mar mi dmigs te/ / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mar rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa// de dag byang chub 'tshang rgyar sems bskyed kyang // mtshan
174a6(dkon brtsegs): mar spyod cing spyod yul log pa ste/ / blo gros dran pas byang chub lam mi spyod// mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la// spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas// mtshan ma de
174a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mtshan mo med spangs te/ / stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med po// mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod// de dag byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob// phas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min/
174b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis bzod bya min// rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste// rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med// dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang // de bzhin/
174b2(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal skyob par gyur ba dag/ mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med// go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spod pa dang // nyi tshe stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang // gang rnams stong pas stong zhes stong smra
174b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / / chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus// sangs rgyas ma smad rnams kyi bslab pa la// slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams// mkhas de rtogs pa med pas byang
174b4(dkon brtsegs): chub rtogs/ / ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed la// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pas na// bdag cag bsod nams mi chung gang tho ba des// 'gro ba byang chub
174b5(dkon brtsegs): dam par 'tshang rgya zhing / / mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shogade nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul
174b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag zhig zag brgyad rngu bo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam bzugs su chud nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ de'i rje 'dzum pa mdzad do//
174b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha mi bsam mkhyen nas/ rgong gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa/
175a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni ma gsungs na// rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol// 'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces// rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas/
175a2(dkon brtsegs): de skad gsungs// 'jig rten don spang 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu// 'dren pa bka' stsol the tsom bsal du gsol// drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas// thub chen khyod
175a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams the tsom 'tshal/ / go'u ta ma rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag la// 'jig rten sman slad 'dzum rgyu lung bstan gsol// 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud la rgyab phyogs te// mya ngan 'das pa'i
175a4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis thal sbyar sdod/ / 'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems la the tsom 'tshal// don yod grags mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol// bde gshegs bstan la the tsom ma mchis te// phyir zhing
175a5(dkon brtsegs): da bskyed rim gro cher bgyid de/ / the tsom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur bar// rgyal bas skye bo'i the tsom legs par lum// bde gshegs bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing //
175a6(dkon brtsegs): gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa// lam de nas ni the tsom ma mchis mchi// de bas skye bo'i the tsom gcad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang
175a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas// tshigs su bcad de dus su gang smras shing // 'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus
175b1(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin/ / dpral dri ba de yi don dris pas// skye bo tshogs chen 'di la don byas gyur// khyod kyis de rjes skye bo tshogs chen dag/ byang chub mchog tu yang dag rngu
175b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te// rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni nges bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan pa'i lam de nas// don du gnyer ba de dag de
175b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'dong / / gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong // byis pa rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas
175b4(dkon brtsegs): bslab/ / mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang phyir mi rnams gang // rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'jigs 'gyur zhing // mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dong // mtshan ma med pas byang chub
175b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog thob 'gyur/ / med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam btags nas// ji ltar btags pa de ltar 'ching ba yin// mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi// zhi ba dag ni grags ldan dam pa
175b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob/ / 'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis// sdig pa brgyad dag mi mkhas de dag byed// 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mi chung myong // de ltar mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag par byas// mtshan mar
175b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pas ni phung po dang / / sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong // de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na// byang chub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan ma
176a1(dkon brtsegs): can la nyon mong sa 'phel/ / mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyor baspyod// mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de// kun tu sbyor ba de nyid mtshan med min// gang rnam
176a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob par bya rtog pa/ / rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yin// mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam pa thob byed na// longs spyod de nyid mtshan mo med par 'gyur// chos rnams gang yang
176a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin nyid kyis med/ / rnam par rtog pas chos byung kun kyang stong // rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur// de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra// rgyal ba'i gsungs
176a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thos gyur nas/ / mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tsom bsal// dper na tsam pa'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs la legs shes 'dzin// 'jig
176a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis/ / mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rab shes nas// 'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen 'gyur// gzhan
176a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o/ / / de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar
176a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mchod pa'ang mthong / / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags
176b1(dkon brtsegs): padang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni
176b2(dkon brtsegs): snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa'ang ma yin/ ma byas pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa'ang ma
176b3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ ma skyes pa'ang ma yin/ byung ba'ang ma yin/ ma byung ba'ang ma yin/ grub pa'ang ma yin/ ma grub pa'ang ma yin/ 'gags pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'gags pa'ang ma yin/ gnas
176b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'ang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa'ang ma yin/ khong khro ba'ang ma yin/ rmongs pa'ang ma yin/ ma rmongs
176b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma yin/ shes pa po'ang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa'ang ma yin/ mthong ba po'ang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa'ang ma yin/ tshor ba po'ang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa'ang ma yin/ ston pa po'ang
176b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ ston pa po med pa'ang ma yin/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ dngos po'ang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'ang ma yin/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin/
176b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'ang ma yin/ 'ong ba'ang ma yin/ song ba'ang ma yin/ ma song ba'ang ma yin/ stong pa'ang ma yin/ mi stong pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa'ang ma yin/
177a1(dkon brtsegs): smon pa yod pa'ang ma yin/ smon pa med pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag de ltar chos thams cad la song mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la'ang
177a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas tha snyad la'ang mi gnas/ brjod pa la'ang mi gnas te/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/
177a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i
177a4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyis 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/
177a5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes
177a6(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/
177a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma
177b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang //
177b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams
177b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing gos pa med par gyur nas/ de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir// de'i tshe dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das kyi
177b4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon// zhi ba sten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston// zhi ba'i spyod yul
177b5(dkon brtsegs): dgyes shing byang chubazhi la dri bral 'khrugs ma mchis/ / khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du bsnyes// zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag
177b6(dkon brtsegs): bsten/ / yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs glong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton// sngon gyi rgyal bas bstan pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god// de sten sangs rgyas
177b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsung / / 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan// gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal
178a1(dkon brtsegs): snyam 'thob/ / bslabs nas ni 'di yid zhi ba'i lasadong dbang po zhi bdag/ 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba'i byed mthu chen ni bshes par 'gyur// badren pa khyod kyi
178a2(dkon brtsegs): sras mchog zhi ba 'gro bzhi bgyid gang dag gis/ / 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis bachod par
178a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das// thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de
178a4(dkon brtsegs): dag nyon mongs 'gyur/ / rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs ma mchis// gang dag phung po bor te
178a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub zhi chol de la zhi bar rtogs/ / phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags// dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi chol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi
178a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni bston pas gsungs/ / thams cad mkhyen pasazhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba zhi pa 'di dag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnam pa kun tu mtshan
178a7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnyed/ / de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'// de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ma mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur// bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal na
178b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob/ / rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa// chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes/
178b2(dkon brtsegs): ni mkhyen gyur pa// des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa// zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang 'byung sdig med shog
178b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag
178b4(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni// log pa rmongs byed chang pa stong 'dra zhing // ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'phrul 'dra bar mkhyen
178b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen/ / ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas// kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa// de la bkres med zas med sems can
178b6(dkon brtsegs): med/ / rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs// skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na// chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang // ngoms med tsha ba zhi
178b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur te/ / de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs// 'di la byed med tsher med sems cad med// byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med// 'bras bu myong bar
179a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'gyur ba de med ces// 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the com yong mi mnga'// mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sman// dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med/
179a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig nyid med cing dgar gyur dngos kyang med// de mkhyen de la the tsom yong mi mnga'// pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min// de ltar mkhas pas
179a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po 'di gzigs na/ / phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa// gos kyis drung gzhig sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur// de ltar rang
179a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang / / log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur// tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang // rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur// de dag rang bzhin
179a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs dag chos rnams kyang / / so so rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin// ji ltar mi yis dung gi sgra thos te// sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang // rang bzhin stong pa'i
179a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos te de mi dmigs/ / mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la// yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na// dngos med
179a7(dkon brtsegs): yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te/ / drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na// yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med
179b1(dkon brtsegs): cing song / nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na/ thong
179b2(dkon brtsegs): khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs/ / grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs
179b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyis na/ / dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong // ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar
179b4(dkon brtsegs): de brdungs pa'i tshe/ / sgra de phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med// phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar nga
179b5(dkon brtsegs): de brdungs pa'i tshe/ / thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyi yan lag rta sgra de dang 'dra// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs
179b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ / sgra de 'jig rten dga' byar rtog pa med// ji ltar smra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs
179b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ / g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med// ji ltar rnga bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bu so ji ltar rnga nge brdungs pa'i tshe
180a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min/ / ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// de nas
180a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing / zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod
180a3(dkon brtsegs): pas/ 'khor de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur par gzigs nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/
180a4(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas// lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the
180a5(dkon brtsegs): tsotshom 'tshal/ / bde gshegs zhal bzangs de la lta zhing thos par dga' ste snod// rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tsom dgum du gsol// rnam par 'dzin pa thub mchog
180a6(dkon brtsegs): kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams/ / rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na// bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tsom rgyu de gsungs// rgyal
180a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ / 'khor 'di the tsom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems// bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tsom gcod pa nyan 'tshal
180b1(dkon brtsegs): na/ / rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de dag rnam la gsungs// thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tsom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog mang sungs rgya
180b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan 'tshal/ / ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dral lta// 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsgrags gsol// de thos 'khor rnams the tsom chad
180b3(dkon brtsegs): cing chos la gnas par 'gyur/ / khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas// skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim// de dag
180b4(dkon brtsegs): dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du smrag/ brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan brtson par bgyid// de ltar lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan
180b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad gsung ba sgrags gsol/ / rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni// dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar// stobs bcu mnga'
180b6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgongs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rnga thul nga yis phan byed 'dzu
180b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa/ / rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos// de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa// pan
181a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus com/ / tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di das dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tsom med// bskal pa khrag khrig gaN+DI/
181a2(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed du dka' ba legs par spyad// kun tu rnam par dag la ma chags yid gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste// de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems pa
181a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed/ / 'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal yas pa// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas// de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa che
181a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba/ / srid pa sel cing 'gro ba stong par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur// skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur// bde gshegs mtha'
181a5(dkon brtsegs): yis grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba grel cing gnas par 'gyur/ / de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te// 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig
181a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa du mar ni/ / sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod bzad mi nus// de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur// g.yo ba med ci
181a7(dkon brtsegs): sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur/ / de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbyangs pa'i// sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung sring po de la phal cher mya ngan
181b1(dkon brtsegs): 'da'/ / de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te// mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o// de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal//
181b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing slob pa'i lam la myur bar 'gyur// de na mi rnams dag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur// mi sdug mi/
181b3(dkon brtsegs): rtartog de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang // zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'tsho med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi// sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rnal gnas par 'gyur//
181b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur// bla gab med dang gtsug la ga khang dang gnas khang rnams
181b5(dkon brtsegs): na med/ / de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung // de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang // gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams
181b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnar ni dge ba'i slar zag 'gyur/ / 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur// de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar
181b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas// drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bsags te// zhing mchog de na sems
182a1(dkon brtsegs): can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur/ / tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur nas// ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal
182a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsnyen gyur pa/ / de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams can thogs pa med pa'i 'dzin par 'gyur// de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston
182a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa sten par gyis/ / tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad
182a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis lha ma yin rnams nas/ / tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / ming
182a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung
182a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slang du gang la bslabs pas chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur
182a7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do// de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa
182b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i skyo bas dang / dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs bdud
182b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs
182b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la
182b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i slad du/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de// de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med de/ rnam par rtog pa yongs
182b5(dkon brtsegs): su chad pa'o/ / gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du
182b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis bde la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing de dag a'i sgra
182b7(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a zhes bgyi ni mtha' yas pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa yongs su ma grub pa
183a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba/ 'du ba ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma
183a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ yongs su thug pa ma mchis pa/ ma brtags pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba/ bsam
183a3(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma smos pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma mchis pa/
183a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ nye ba ma lags pa/ ring ba ma lags pa/ ma btags pa/ gdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa
183a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa/ 'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ brtag tu ma mchis pa/ mi zad pa/ gnyis su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ sho be ma lags
183a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma skyes pa ma lags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma bskyod pa/ ma gzung ba/ ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/
183a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtang du ma mchis pa/ yongs su gtang du ma mchis pa/ ma gtang ba/ yongs su ma gtang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis pa/ chos
183b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi byed pa po'angs lags so/ / san ma skyes pa ste/ sa gang sa n+de bar bcing pas lags so// sani bskyes pa ste/ rdos ga r+dz+dza d+hAr 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so//
183b2(dkon brtsegs): ma'agags pa ste/ chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni ma 'gag pa'ang ma lags pa skye/ chos gang gi mi 'gog pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so//
183b3(dkon brtsegs): a ni gnas pa'ang ma lags/ mi gnas pa'ang ma lags/ a ni btags pa'ang ma lags/ ma btags ma lags/ a ni spangs pa'ang ma lags/ ma spangs pa'ang ma lags/ a ni
183b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'ang ma lags/ ma shes pa'ang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa'ang ma lags/ ma dmigs pa'ang ma lags/ a ni stong pa'ang ma lags/ mi stong pa'ang ma lags/ a ni dmis
183b5(dkon brtsegs): su mchis pa'ang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma'ang ma lags/ mtshan ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ a ni smon pa'ang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis
183b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste/ a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig
183b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ a'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste/ a la 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste/ as gdags pa'o// chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig
184a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ a'i tha snyad do// chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste/ as brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis
184a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ / chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyis
184a3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ma 'gag pa de dag ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul rtogs par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'du ma bgyis pa de dag ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par
184a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du
184a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsungs so//
184a6(dkon brtsegs): debazhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa'ang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na thag cha la tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o//
184a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa mchi ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdags par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsiH
184b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyam chab tu gdags pa'i bskang mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyib skad blta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta/ dper nam song gi dkyil 'khor la byung ma
184b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'i slad du/
184b3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi yi/ rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / zag kyi
184b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste/ brag cha la bya ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
184b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de skad ces gsol nas/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dgra
184b6(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs// thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de
184b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ / de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud// bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong // sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis
185a1(dkon brtsegs): la rgyab kyi 'du shes can/ / byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid// de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la rten kyang
185a2(dkon brtsegs): 'cha'/ / de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal// 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das// gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug
185a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis/ / blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la// nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang // 'dod
185a4(dkon brtsegs): chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang / / blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal ba// de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa
185a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhas gnod pa'i khur yang khyer/ / de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos na// skyes bu dran pa blo zhan de dag bstan ngag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs// bde gshegs
185a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis a yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan/ / de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing // bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas thul byang chub zhi pa mngon 'tshang
185a7(dkon brtsegs): / rgya/ yan lag brgyad pa'i gru bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol// bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des// myur du nyon mongs drug bsal byang chub
185b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag sa sazhi ba tho gyu/ / zol nam drug med zla bzla bo gzhan pong nges pa'i masnyen pa ste// ba sa sgyur byin drug myed zhing gdug pa rnams cad 'ad+mo
185b2(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ / bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnam tshul min tog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslabs pa dag/ grol nas
185b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grol ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos/ / de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur// 'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar
185b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med/ / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon mi mongs// nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang
185b5(dkon brtsegs): med/ gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur// grol zhing grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// bcom ldan lhar ba#
185b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste/ / kun rtog bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems
185b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems kyang ni/ / las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong ci myong gang gyur de yang med/ bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal// des na da ltar bde/
186a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing des pa ste// dge ba'i blo mnga' dgu gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par gyur// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i
186a2(dkon brtsegs): gcol bstod pas bsod nams gang byung ba/ / ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bos rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i// bdag cag dag rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid
186a3(dkon brtsegs): thob shog/ bsod nams 'di kun kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yong
