186a4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / tshul gyis rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang thugs su chud la/ 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par 'thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum
186a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa
186a6(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ / rgyal ba dpal spyug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol// 'jig rten 'das
186a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci spang 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs/ / gtso bo de thes 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing // rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhal
186b1(dkon brtsegs): yas bgyid par 'gyur/ / des ni lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di nas sgrol bar 'gyur//
186b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos na// 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur// the tsom bral gyur rnam dag
186b3(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing / / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun byung sras su 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'di dag rten pa gzhan ma mchis
186b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/ / 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan
186b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal/ / gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char pho ba gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di drag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du
186b6(dkon brtsegs): song ba'i mal bu blta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta/ / bde gshegs lnga rnams lung bstan bka' stsol bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol// skyob pa'i gsung mchog bos na 'jig
186b7(dkon brtsegs): rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur/ / thub pa de ring sa ni ga dge ba 'phel zhing grags pa don du gnyer// su zhig 'dzin pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal/
187a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shing dgar gyur nas// tshul 'di skyon cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur/
187a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs// bde
187a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing / / spobs pa che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa// de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang
187a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis/ / 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste// 'jig rten mgon med yid can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs//
187a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad spyod pa// byang chub 'gro bdod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur// tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos
187a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ / sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi 'thob 'gyur// de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges 'gyur// bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu
187a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag smon lam btab/ / 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan to// bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas na// sems can skar ma'i grangs
187b1(dkon brtsegs): pas rjes mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te/ / de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya pa grangs par
187b2(dkon brtsegs): yang shing shin tu dag la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste/ / kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses
187b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur/ / zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrogs
187b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'gyur/ / de na rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi// sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya bgrangs gang+gA'i bye snyed 'gyur// rta thul 'jig rten
187b5(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan 'das pa bas/ / gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na// bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi
187b6(dkon brtsegs): nus so/ / de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min// de ni u dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes
187b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs/ / de phyir bla na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis// shin tu blo phra sten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya// de bzhin
188a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur nas/ / 'khor rnams thams cad mi rangs mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dka' bar gyur// khrag khrig lha
188a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed/ / dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung // zhi ba thugs ni skye bo nyon mong nod pas rgod gyur zhi bar
188a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzod/ / bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol// khyod kyi ye shes thob nas skye dgu dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur// sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'dren
188a4(dkon brtsegs): las tshul thos mi bzang srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol/ / 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // bam po brgyad pa// de
188a5(dkon brtsegs): nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi
188a6(dkon brtsegs): rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'ang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
188a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha
188b1(dkon brtsegs): stag myong bar 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang mi myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde
188b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang lag bcad dam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ rna ba dang
188b3(dkon brtsegs): sna ga tu bas kyang / bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / spa lcug gis gzhus sam/ spa lcag phyed tsal lam/ lhag gis gzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur
188b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog tu bcug gam/ mtshon cha dam po la rgyas btab bam/ byis pa'i gtsug pud ltar bcings sam/ dugs kyi snod ltar bdugs sam/
188b5(dkon brtsegs): bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu gzhom pa ltar bcom mam/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/ mar gyi mar me dang / zho bskol ba ltar 'bar
188b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar btabs sam/ stag gi khar btabs sam/ skam ril bya ba bzhin dril tam/
188b7(dkon brtsegs): byi bo'i chang pa lta bus bcad dam/ nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kar sha pa Na tsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phye bco ba ltar bcos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom
189a1(dkon brtsegs): yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / mig phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rje mo la gzhag gam/ bsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo/
189a2(dkon brtsegs): gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba'ang ma lags/ mi bde ba'ang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar
189a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur
189a4(dkon brtsegs): cig/ gang gis bdag la sgrom blud pa de dag dang / gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar
189a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi bde bar byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du
189a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab te/ de yid la bya ba
189a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan zhing / de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la rten cing snyen la sgom zhing mang du byed de/
189b1(dkon brtsegs): de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge
189b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang /
189b3(dkon brtsegs): las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o// de 'tshal na tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs
189b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya'o/ / de 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag
189b5(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang / 'gro ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang /
189b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bsgrubs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / bdud kyi las las rnam par rgya
189b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de
190a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ / de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das
190a2(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod pa/ dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste// ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi// de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sa
190a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba brgal gyur pa/ / thub pa mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod// 'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te// sgyu
190a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen/ / yan lag sna tshogs sgra brnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lha
190a5(dkon brtsegs): mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs/ / 'di na sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te// mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshig cing stong par rnam gzhag la// rkang
190a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad/ / rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byams pa dge bsgoms sems can dmigs
190a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la/ / sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan/
190b1(dkon brtsegs): des na bde gshegs rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang // lha yi ltar gyur khyod
190b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi ba gsungs/ / de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal// des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la
190b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'tshal/ / thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs la// dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal// de ltar
190b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal/ / des na mi mchog khyod la mchod gnas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi// skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal
190b5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das ma dmigs/ / 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed// sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis// /
190b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan// gang zhig der dul ma gzigs gang yang
190b7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs/ / thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod ming yang ma gzigs te// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod pa bgyi// thub pa
191a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzad nam brnyes kyang / / de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma bsrungs ma lags bsgyel ba yong mi mnga'// bde bar gshegs pas lus pa/
191a2(dkon brtsegs): song ba'i bsgom pasgom par gyis zhes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par
191a3(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur la/ / tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te// de ltar gang zhig dran bsgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma gzigs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di btsal
191a4(dkon brtsegs): nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis/ / thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal nam brnyes la// gang gi nye bar gzhag pa de yang dran pa med pa ras mkhyen kyang // thar
191a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod par bgyis// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas
191a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs/ / bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes
191a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs/ / sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyo ba la mchod pa bgyis// gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis// gang gnas su
191b1(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te/ / de bas gang gi bde ba 'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis// ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod
191b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'tshal/ / ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin pa gyid na// 'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings
191b3(dkon brtsegs): ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs// 'di dag
191b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ / yang dag tu na rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang pa bsgom pa mi dmigs te// chad par mi 'gyur byang ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs pa//
191b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te// de dag de la nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis 'gyur// 'di ni mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sarba
191b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ / des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thar par mdzad sbed 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsung//
191b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgoms shes bstan// thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te// 'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad
192a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po// de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pa thub
192a2(dkon brtsegs): pas gsungs/ / de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te// thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod// byang chub yan lag bdun
192a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs// 'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang
192a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis te/ / sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom mchis khyod la mchod/ rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan// brtson 'grus
192a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal tha mar 'byin pa sgoms zhes gsungs/ / mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis
192a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod/ / 'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems
192a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la bstan/ / 'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag min nyon mongs min// 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson// sdug bsngal
192b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang sgoms zhes gsungs/ / bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi// thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams
192b2(dkon brtsegs): cad stong pa ste/ / 'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de// gsod dang
192b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang / / gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams// mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan
192b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan/ / sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra// gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste// bde
192b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong / / rnam 'dren the tsom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang
192b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig spyod pa 'di ston pa/ / mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar long myi 'gyur// bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis//
192b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la lha tshogs the tsam ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'chil// de ltar dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do//
193a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cad mi zer bar 'khod pa'ang mkhyen/ de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa'ang thugs su chungs/
193a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil
193a3(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas/ / bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan// rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum
193a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol/ / ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal sdug khyod la bstod pa
193a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing nyan par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas/ / sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos na yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te// chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur/
193a6(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed// de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis// su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal
193a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dren pa dpag tu med gyur pa/ / de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod// rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes//
193b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas// sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol
193b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro 'di the tsom ma mchis mdzod/ / bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dang bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cing // byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas/
193b3(dkon brtsegs): gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tsom khum// 'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag
193b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na/ / bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren// de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni
193b5(dkon brtsegs): sras la gnas par 'gyur/ / 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul
193b6(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ / nga yis 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing // skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa//
193b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur// de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon// dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos nyid la ni
194a1(dkon brtsegs): / the tshom med// kun kyang mi rangs rab gi med kyi mtshigs bcad dag gis nga la bsngags// sngon gyisangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong bgrangs mchod thos mchod byas te/
194a2(dkon brtsegs): the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur// de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod// bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang
194a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bstod par 'gyur/ / 'di dag bskal pa ut+pal la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur// 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs
194a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba/ / de yang bstan gyis dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spongs te nyon// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal
194a5(dkon brtsegs): yas 'gyur/ / 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur// de yi tshe na bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te// de tshe zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i
194a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur/ / thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na// thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig
194a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas rnams kyis de tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te/ / ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi med thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/
194b1(dkon brtsegs): slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'dus// ji ltar bye ba brgya bgrangs ngal legs par spyad pa byas nas su// byams pa lta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams
194b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor du 'dod gyur pa/ / de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa byi phyir 'dod// bde gshegs
194b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa de thos shing / / dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub
194b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang bskyed/ / bdag nyid chen po de tshe shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs// dge rgyas ris kyi lha lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// /
194b5(dkon brtsegs): / de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus/ lha ma yin rnams nas/ dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong // lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/
194b6(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang / chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par
194b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing / tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / mi mchod pa'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang /
195a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / nye ba'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang /
195a2(dkon brtsegs): 'brel ba'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes na/ bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te/ chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha'
195a3(dkon brtsegs): yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa 'thob cing / mi chod pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang
195a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / de la dmigs pa gang yang gzungs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//
195a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur// khams la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la 'jug pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang /
195a6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos po la
195a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / stong pa la
195b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas la 'jug pa dang /
195b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang hUM'i tshul mam mas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad sa
195b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu thob bo//
195b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni sar yongs su ma grub/ de bzhin du chu dang / me dang / rlung ni rlung du yongs su ma grub
195b5(dkon brtsegs): bo/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// chu dang / me dang / rlung ni rang bzhin ma
195b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa
195b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du
196a1(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa'o/ / gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de na gdags su ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pas
196a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung po'i gzugs gang ci'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal te/ gzugs kyi rang
196a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ni dmigs su ma mchis na/ 'das pa lta ga la 'gyur/ ma 'ongs par yang ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na gzugs kyi phung po ni gdags su ma mchis
196a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so// phung po dmigs su ma
196a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pas gzungs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro// gzungs de'ang ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun
196a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs te/ 'di la phung po'ang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs
196a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'ang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos te/ chos gang yang ma
196b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa de la spungs pa'ang ga la mchis te/ phung po ni spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o// dper na khyim dang / khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa
196b2(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa dang / skar khung khol ma dang / ba gam dang / dra ba dang / stegs bu dang / kha khyer dang / skar khung dang / blta ba dang / ra ba dang / shing tags dang / 'obs
196b3(dkon brtsegs): dang chos mang po bsogs pa la grong khyer zhes bgyi ba'ang de bzhin te/ gzugs de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na/ de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis/ spungs pa ma mchis pas
196b4(dkon brtsegs): na gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi phung po'ang ma mchis so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis
196b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su ma mchis na/ de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis te/ spungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa'ang ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po'ang ma mchis
196b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni/
196b7(dkon brtsegs): mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba ni/ ci'i skye mched ces bgyin/ sdug bsngal gyi skye mched do// de la mig gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ sa'i khams dang
197a1(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang ba'o// de la sa'i khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa
197a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmig
197a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ / de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags
197a4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi skye mchod ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis
197a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis pa ste/ gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// de ltar na mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma
197a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa'o/ / gang ma skyes ma 'gags po de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzogs tsom dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gdags su ma
197a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ste/ ming de'ang ming gis ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang la mi ga ce'am/ skye mched ce 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su
197b1(dkon brtsegs): mtsham paste/ ming yang ming du brjod dum mchis so// nab da / dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / g+ha dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya da / ro sgra rnams kyung/
197b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo// de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob pa ni mig gis ma mchis
197b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ khams ni khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig rang bzhin dang bral ba/ khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis
197b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ / gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma
197b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis so/ / gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba
197b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// ming de'ang ming gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de'ang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/
197b7(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i slang du skye ba mi
198a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'o/ / gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags
198a2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ / gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/
198a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba
198a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po
198a5(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
198a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon du bgyis pa ma lags pa/ sngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi sa ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems
198a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma lags pa ste/ sa'ang ma legs/ sa ma lags pa'ang ma lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
198b1(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhi ba dang / mtshan nyid ma lags pa ste/ tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o// des tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/ don dam par ni ma lags
198b2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi
198b3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
198b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/ khams dang / skye mched dang / dbang po dang / bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi
198b5(dkon brtsegs): dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis btags kyang / de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i khams
198b6(dkon brtsegs): ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis kyang / de dang des sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gi tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang
198b7(dkon brtsegs): des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni ming gang dang gang
199a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nad du 'arji de da ste/ rludang / dang / rlung dang / rnam pa pa'i kham pa nyid mi 'dugyur// bcom ldan 'das de zhin ma bang kyi sa
199a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi bde dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo//
199a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni/ dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i
199a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang /
199a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang
199a6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang
199a7(dkon brtsegs): po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig ni mig gis ma mchis/ dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang
199b1(dkon brtsegs): thal ba/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mtshas pa du ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa ngan yongs sum grub pa'o/ gang yongs su su grub pa don pastub/ gang
199b2(dkon brtsegs): pabapa de ni mi 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus
199b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags/ dbang po ma lags so// gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chad pa
199b4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa ni brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni stong par yang mi dmigs/ chang pa'ang mi dmigs so//
199b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du mig dang dbang po'ang chad pa stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la/ yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ gso ba/ gsog/ log pa slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa
199b6(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par yang bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par byas kyi/ don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs/ dbang po'ang mi dmigs na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen
199b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/ ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gzud pa'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyis/ don dam par ni ma lags so// dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral
200a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang chos gang gis stong pa de la des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni brdzun pa/ ma mchis pa/ gsob/ gsog/ log pa slu ba'i chos
200a2(dkon brtsegs): can byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni mi skye mi 'gag go// gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/
200a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ brdzun pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis
200a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa
200a5(dkon brtsegs): thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/ rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma
200a6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o//
200a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' dgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran la/ de dran yang rnyed par mi 'gyur
200b1(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rmi lam na'ang mi des dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' dgur spyad pa de dag ma thob ma rnyed na/ nyal ba las sad
200b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa dang rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa
200b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' dgur spyad pa de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes
200b4(dkon brtsegs): gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes
200b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang
200b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o/ / de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug par chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun
200b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ mtshan ma med
201a1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ som nyi ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du
201a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i
201a3(dkon brtsegs): slad du kun 'byung ba'ang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba ma mchis
201a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i
201a5(dkon brtsegs): slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma lags la/ gang spang ba'i 'gog
201a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/ 'gog pa dmigs su ma mchis na lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis pas/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa
201a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i po de dag ni btags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa de/ / gang btegs shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so//
201b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa// mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ ma bta/
201b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gdags par mi bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa

202a2(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ lam gol ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi gzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba med pa ma
202a3(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ sems

202a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/ mtshan ma
202a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ gnas ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/

202b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis pa ma lags
