202b3(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so som
202b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
202b5(dkon brtsegs): yul ma legs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul yang ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa/ bgyis pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lag pa/ dag par
202b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lag pa ste/ de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa
202b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam
203a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ snas thun kyi ma chen po sa rna pa chums rgya / rgan cwa pa gyu // ma sa
203a2(dkon brtsegs): mag pan ma gapasam mchis so/ / de ci'i srad du na 'dig ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral baH/ chos gang parang bzhin ma mchis pa deni dngos po mamachis pa'o// gang 'des tham mchis
203a3(dkon brtsegs): drid mongs su mthung ba'o/ / dang sos su mthub pa de ni gi stsu 'o// gang mi ba do mi grug pa'o// gang sa skyes ma gags pa da 'das ba shes gdags par bgyi bam lags mdzes pa dang /
203a4(dkon brtsegs): dkar byung ba nas gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis
203a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du ming ma dang/ ba dang / thamad cam dang / kun rdzo btsam dang / yod ba cam dang / gdags pa tsham du sems cad rnams gzung ba'in
203a6(dkon brtsegs): du bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmigs su ma mchis so/ / chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma mchis pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa/ tha snyad du bgyir ma mchis pa
203a7(dkon brtsegs): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/ gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ btsun pa/ log pa/ btags
203b1(dkon brtsegs): rnas par brdzub/ yos su bdags pa/ rnam par bdags pa/ rnam par dbyung ba/ mnab/ rab tu smos pa'o// marig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes
203b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'du byed skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rig pa ni ma mchis pa'o// de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa'o//
203b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
203b4(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga la mchis te/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'das pa dang /
203b5(dkon brtsegs): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ ming tsam du bas kyi don dam par ni ma lags so// ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub bo//
203b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
203b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/
204a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyang ma 'gags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dmigs su ma mchis
204a2(dkon brtsegs): pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjes su chags pa ma mchis pa/ khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid
204a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin
204a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis pa ste/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin
204a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i
204a6(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas/ gnyis su ma mchis pas ni gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs
204a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i
204b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zlog pa 'am skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la
204b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchin de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ / de ci'i
204b3(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
204b4(dkon brtsegs): gang le la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad
204b5(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la'ang phan pa 'am/ gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
204b6(dkon brtsegs): gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon
204b7(dkon brtsegs): bar zhen pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci'ang 'dor ba 'am len pa ma mchis so//
205a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
205a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon parazhen pa'o//
205a3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba'am
205a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
205a5(dkon brtsegs): las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni 'gyur ba mchis kyang ganga'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
205a6(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba ni mi gda' 'o/ / bam po dgu pa/ de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad nus
205a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges par 'gro bar brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
205b1(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs
205b2(dkon brtsegs): mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa// 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang
205b3(dkon brtsegs): dag nyid du yang dag bstan/ / mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu/
205b4(dkon brtsegs): bgrod pa bstan// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi g.yo brnyes// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa/ mtha' yas
205b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ / phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnam dang bral/ byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar
205b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis yongs su btags/ / shes pa mig ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre'u thogs bzhin// grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par
205b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dong / / khams rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// dper na brag cha rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra// des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag
206a1(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings/ / grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis// skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams
206a2(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pas bstan/ / yang dag ma lags brdzun zhing byis pa slu ba chang pa stong pa 'dra// mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po 'di la chags// dper na 'gron pa rgya mtsho
206a3(dkon brtsegs): chen por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung / / 'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste// thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong // mi
206a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags/ / bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin// sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral
206a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong / / thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na// mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags// mkhas
206a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgro nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol/ / rten byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis// rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du
206a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ / mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings// mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol/
206b1(dkon brtsegs): thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab// thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid dang bral ba// thub pa khams gsum mi chags
206b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos kun gan pa ma mchis te/ / de slang tshul cig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med//
206b3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun btags ma lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di
206b4(dkon brtsegs): ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis/ / mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes shes smra ba dang // gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang /
206b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba// de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs por yongs su dkris// gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du
206b6(dkon brtsegs): byed btang bzung smra ba dang / / gang dag stobs bcur 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba// de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chang bdud kyi lag tu mchis// khyod kyis de
206b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid ma 'chas te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'chal bar bgyi/ / gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal// de dag rkang gnyis gtso bo dpal sdug 'jig rten thugs
207a1(dkon brtsegs): brtse rgyal bar 'gyur/ / de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan ter cing tsham nyid lags// de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi ma mchog tu 'gyur// desar
207a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa/ / ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas// kha cig yi rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du
207a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag mthong nas/ / 'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa
207a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thugs su chud nas/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis
207a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dpal sdug 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te// rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum re
207a6(dkon brtsegs): skad thos/ / 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyung de gsungs// de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum
207a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bsil mthong nas/ / 'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lha// mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs// de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog
207b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ / 'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa// de dag su zhig gang gis ci thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'khrul pa gsungs// mi
207b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs sgrogs te the tshom kun tu bsal du gsol/ / de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob// bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po
207b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad gzhan du mi sems par/ / 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal las zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis// thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum/
207b4(dkon brtsegs): des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste// bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du
207b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur/ / de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol// des ni yi rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar
207b6(dkon brtsegs): phyin par 'gyur/ / 'dren pa chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing // rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste// tshul la zhugs shing
207b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur/ / 'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
208a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang chod shes
208a2(dkon brtsegs): ngal dris pa shin tu legs/ / gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi rgyu yi tshul dang rgyu// de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi
208a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing / / rgyu la gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang //
208a4(dkon brtsegs): kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhang rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang // kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te// skye bo sdug bsngal lhung bsgrol zhes zhugs pa'i
208a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas/ / 'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya// 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung nang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya// 'dzum mchog ngas gang
208a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya/ / rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te// kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di
208a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas/ / des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa
208b1(dkon brtsegs): gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur/ / 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur// de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis/
208b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub// sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis// 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rnam
208b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum yang bshad kyis/ / kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni ngal legs par mnyan par gyis// dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub// 'bring gi don ni dus
208b4(dkon brtsegs): tshochotsho cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur/ / blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas// rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis
208b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis// gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la skor ba byed pa ni// de dag ngal skyen par bskor nas myur
208b6(dkon brtsegs): du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ / 'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis skor bar byed par 'gyur// dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur/
208b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra ba'i bde gshegs mthong gyur na// de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum
209a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya/ / gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren te 'gebs pa dang // gang tshe me tog 'dral 'dren pa'i steng gi
209a2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la lding ba dang / / gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum skor byed pa// de ni 'jig rten 'das pa de yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya// bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams
209a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan/ / rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis// des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren
209a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad/ / de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tsom med par gyis// 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad du zam pa 'di dag ni// zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin
209a5(dkon brtsegs): tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ / mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur// de phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan//
209a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong // bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyad// da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med
209a7(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa drug tu/ / gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas// thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtog rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod
209b1(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas/ / de dag de yi 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog/ 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung /
209b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te// sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya// de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa
209b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs med de/ / de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni// gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang // legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos
209b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin grangs mi 'gyur/ / 'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs med 'dus pa de ni ci 'dra ba// de las nyis 'gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// de tshe /
209b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal por zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin// de dag thams cad yongs ngag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams
209b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur/ / 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos// de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur// de dag 'das nas
209b7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa/ / gang+gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni/
210a1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi// bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang /
210a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing // yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin// mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dang gyur nas// rkang gnyis dam pa
210a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te/ / thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'// bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas
210a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ / de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar zhing spyad spyod de// rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byos la// yang dag mthong ba'i spyod pa
210a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba 'di la rab tu rten byos te/ / dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis// 'bras bu cheb pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//
210a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe/ sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tsom med par gyur par rig nas/
210a7(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do//
210b1(dkon brtsegs): de la lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol ba/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang // btsun mo dang ni srog 'phangs btang // rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te// sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/
210b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa// rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'// shin tu bslabs pas mthar phyin pa// khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang
210b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas// yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad// zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te// bzod mthar phyin la
210b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal/ / lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa/ brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te// stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa//
210b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa// de la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
210b6(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa/ / bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo shes rab pha rol phyin// yang dang yang du bsgoms pas na// thams cad mkhyen
210b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid brnyes pa/ / shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang // don spyad mthun pa'i don dag gis// 'jig rten
211a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag khyod kyis btul/ / 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ byams chen thugs rje chen po dag/ yun rings dus nas bsgom mdzad
211a2(dkon brtsegs): de sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral/ / gangos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing // thub chen dul ba'i
211a3(dkon brtsegs): sems mnga' bas/ / ma dul thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol pa/ sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba// sems
211a4(dkon brtsegs): dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba/ / sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen pa// sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can//
211a5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs// thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo// mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sems ni rnam par sbyangs//
211a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad// sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa// kun dag khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyis
211a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi dpung yang bcom/ / khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur// lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar mkhyen// sems
211b1(dkon brtsegs): can myur bar rnam par sbyangs/ / zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la// myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsol pa/ hral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa// chu bo rgal
211b2(dkon brtsegs): zag pa spangs/ / pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs// brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs// gti mug
211b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa zag med pas/ / sbyin nas bsod nams zhir gyur pa// 'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi dam chos shin tu bstan// 'jig rten
211b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum du rab tu mchod/ / gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes// de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri// rlung gis bskyod par
211b5(dkon brtsegs): mi nus te/ / de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis// bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so// lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam// mtshan rab sum cuH
211b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis can/ / shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zab pa'i zla gros kyis gsol pa/ sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'// de bzhin nyid la rab tu bzhugs/
211b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mtha' yas rab tu ston// khyod mtshungs gang zag yongs ma mchis// lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa/ gnyis su med pa yang dag ston// dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon/
212a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag zab la zhum ma mchis// de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/ mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyis slob la bslabs pa'i
212a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ / sbrul rnams pags pa rnying 'dor bzhin// srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor// lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar mar me mar zad cing // snying po zad pas zhir 'gyur bzhin//
212a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bstan pa myur thos na// shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'// lha'i bu zhi gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i// mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa
212a4(dkon brtsegs): yang shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la spyod// cho ga spyod yul rab
212a5(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi nyon mongs thams cad zhir gyur pa/ / dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis zhi gnas bslabs pa yi// byang chub sems
212a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' grags chen dag/ zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing // sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni// dpa'
212a7(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan/ / shes rab chen pos de 'tshal na// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par lta bas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs/
212b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams// ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing // byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa/
212b2(dkon brtsegs): thub chen khyod las gang slob pa// de dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing // sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron pa khyod kyi gsung // ye shes
212b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho de thos na/ / de dag dri med bde ba thob// bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung // lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog/ thabs la mkhas pas
212b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gsungs/ / de 'dra'i ye shes rten bgyid pa// de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis// chos rnams thams cad
212b5(dkon brtsegs): sems ma mchis/ / bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba// de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par// rnam par
212b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/ / de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste// sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis/
212b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can ma mchis phan tshun min// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams//
213a1(dkon brtsegs): bar snang lta bur snang ba ste// skye dang 'gag pa med par gzigs// de slang 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bung yir 'dzin pa med pas gsol ba/ khyod kyis 'gro ba 'ja
213a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag kun/ / lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni// g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med// spyod med rtsol ba med par gzigs// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa/ sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis
213a3(dkon brtsegs): pa sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na/ / de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'// thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa/ gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long
213a4(dkon brtsegs): la/ gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs// de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu yid gnyis rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas
213a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ / de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams// de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen// lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa/ chos nyid
213a6(dkon brtsegs): la ni khor zug tu/ / spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing // chos nyid de ni brnyes pa na// de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan// lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos 'di thams
213a7(dkon brtsegs): cad ni/ / rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par// yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen// de bas thub pas rab rib bsal// lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa/ mya ngan med cing nyer len med//
213b1(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med cing rnyog pa med// chos rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams yang dag ma lags/
213b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa// de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen// de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa/ lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa// rmongs
213b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing shes pa med/ / chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud// lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/ snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis// gzugs med
213b4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags gzugs can min/ / gzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud// lha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol pa/ yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa// yod dang
213b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa ma lags par/ / rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa/ byis pa rnams kyi blo rmongs pa// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags
213b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa/ / de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang zag sems can ma mchis pa// ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis
213b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi// mtshan ma de dag ma mchis/
214a1(dkon brtsegs): te chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing // smon pa
214a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su ma mchis dang / / su la smon lam mchis gyur pa// de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen// lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/ rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing // gang zhig 'grol
214a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur de ma mchis/ / de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod nams thams cad
214a4(dkon brtsegs): bsags gyur te/ / bde gshegs khyod la smad mi mnga'// su spong de dag mkhas ma lags// lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs// char gyis sa chen ngoms
214a5(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid/ / de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis// 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad// lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa/ thub mchog gsung ni don mchis te// chos kyi 'khor
214a6(dkon brtsegs): lo rab tu bskor/ / shin tu brtags te mdzad pas na// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i bu blo phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis// ma skyes
214a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa ma lags te/ / de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu seng ge'i nga ros gsol pa/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrag
214b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas/ / mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa// seng ges ri dgas phra mo bzhin// lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gsol pa/ bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de// khyod kyi spyod pa spyad bgyis pas// sangs
214b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod/ / bag yod pas ni nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab gnas te// khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang sbal// stobs bcu gzhal
214b3(dkon brtsegs): yas sangs rgyas chos/ / bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu spel// lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la brtson pas na// byang chub phyogs rnams yongs dag skyes// thub chen rang
214b4(dkon brtsegs): yang grol gyur nas/ / de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel// lha'i bu bag yod nges par byung gis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag/ ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams// kun
214b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste/ / bag yod pas ni nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa/ bag yod yongs su ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba
214b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ma chags par/ / thams cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu bag yong bsrungs kyis gsol pa/ byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing // khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na//
214b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis// byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing // mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pas//
215a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras// yab kyi dkor yang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ bag yod dga' ba'i bstan pa rnams// de dag sangs
215a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ye shes kyis/ / dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jig pas// nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil// lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'tshol mdzad tshe// khyod ni bag gis
215a3(dkon brtsegs): bzung bas na/ / bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// khyod kyi thugs ni sbyor ma gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi// de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// /
215a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang // thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs// lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhug pa ste/ 'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'// sems can nyon mongs
215a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar mdzad/ / rdul 'thul ba la char pa bzhin// lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol ba/ sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu bzhugs// sus kyang mi skyong ri bo bzhin// khyod la gnod
215a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyir mi nus te/ / sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis sras rnams ma smad pa// zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul// bdud rnams bye
215a7(dkon brtsegs): bas mi tshugs te/ / 'dod chags kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhi gnas la// dpa' bo chen po sgom mdzad pas// ci la
215b1(dkon brtsegs): / gnas te bsam gtan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa/ ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon du ni gnas 'gro zhes gsungs/
215b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i// chos gzhan de yi rjes su 'brang // lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma zhi gnas ni// sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyid/
215b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'char// de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad// lha'i bu zhi gnas kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas
215b4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs/ / de la chags med spyod pa ni// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te// shes rab kyis ni sems
215b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas/ / de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes// de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren// lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang // lam
215b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan bdag gis ma mthong ste/ / zhi gnas ye shes che thob na// rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni//
215b7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste// de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing // rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing /
216a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po sten pa ste// de ni lhag mthong dge ba lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa// chos rnams
216a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad brtsal bgyis te/ / yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na// brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob// byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong // lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa/
216a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu nges par byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye mi 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas
216a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ / yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu// chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong la
216a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/ mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing // dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa// de dag zol tshogs thams cad kyis// 'pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus// g+ha'i
216a6(dkon brtsegs): bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du// rgyal sras gang dag bzhugs pa'i rnams// chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal zhing // rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur//
216a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lhag mthong la rten pas gsol pa/ rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du// ye shes la ni brten mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas ni// srog chags bye ba krol bar mdzad/
216b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen// 'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi// 'jig rten de yis sgrol bar
216b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ lha'i busartag mthong gnas kyis gsol ba/ lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing // chos kun rnam par gzigs pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te// sa bzang
216b3(dkon brtsegs): n+ya glo d+ha skyes 'dra/ / lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol ba/ rnam par 'dren pa khrod kyi sras// ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste// byang chub mchog ri theb bgyis shing // skye bo ma
216b4(dkon brtsegs): po 'brel pa bgyid/ / lnga'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// zhum pa ma mchis dngang mi
216b5(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ / thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po chos kun ni// lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du// rang
216b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med par rnam mthong na/ / de ni rang byung byang chub lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa/ sangs rgyas lhag mdzod snying pa ste// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mngar
216b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing / / thubs rje chen po shin tu bsgred// lha'i bu lngag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa/ byang chub phrim ni shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten mangs pa
217a1(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung / / de dag byang chub mchog kyang 'thong // grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'grel// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rten gyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos sten
217a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i/ / mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// sems can bcings las krol bgyid cing // 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid/
217a3(dkon brtsegs): la mos gyur pas// 'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs// dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la ston// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/
217a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste// srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' bos de la spyad par mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis bsam
217a5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la// 'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs// chos rnam kun la mi gnas shing // nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas
217a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ stong nyid chos la rten bgyid cing // sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa// de dag ston pa mchod pa ste// mchod pa de ni bla na med// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par babs kyis gsol pa/ gang gi badren pa 'phags gyur pa// de ni yang
217a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' phags shes gsung / / stong nyid chos la rten bgyid pa// ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi 'dren gyi gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po chos rnam gang // mya ngan 'das min ston mi mchis// kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren//
217b1(dkon brtsegs): drang zong chen po'i byang chub lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ stong nyid zhil brten nas ni// khyod kyi slob ma yang dag bshad// stong pa nyid la gang rten pa/
217b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag rim gro ba gyid pa lags// lha'i bu spyong pa nyid la rten gyis gsol pa// gang rnams stong pa nyid rten pa// ma lnga pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur// nyon mongs med cing lha med rnams/
217b3(dkon brtsegs): chub rdul med thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ gang rnams stong nyid sten bgyid pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs// rang byung bam
217b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'gyur/ / 'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te// stong pa nyid la gang
217b5(dkon brtsegs): rten pa/ / de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag/ stong gis dkrug par mi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma med la dga' bas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la mngon dgyes te// dngos po thams
217b6(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam bshig nas/ / sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung // mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la spyod
217b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / / zhi bzhi la spyod pa rnams// mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyi// tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/
218a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyam kun gyis spyon salal// 'dren partsod ni spyon ma de/ mtshan ma mi mang rtogs dka' zhing // spyod stong cu kyang 'as/ sacanapa ma/
218a2(dkon brtsegs): bas sgrom gyis gsol pa// thub pa'i 'khor 'dri thams cad ni// mtshan ma med pas skom gyur te// yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid// lha'i bu mtshan ma med
218a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ / mtshan ma med la nyid mtshan du// gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pas// lha dang dri za mi dag kyang // khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par
218a4(dkon brtsegs): grol gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig shing // dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron mkhyod// mtshan ma med la gnas pa mdzad// de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med
218a5(dkon brtsegs): pal rnam par brtse bas gsol pa/ thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod// mtshan ma med la rnam par ro// 'gro ba yongs su smin mdzad cing // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la bzhugs/
218a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs su grub kyis gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa// de dag byang chub grub pa ste// yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs
218a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyam mchod/ / lha'i bu mtshan ma mid pa la dga' bas gsol pa// gang gis mtshan ma rnam pa shig pa// ded gi sangs rgyas chos la dka'// bla ma'i min sa la gnas paste// sems cam
218b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchod rten lags/ / lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rten pas gsol pa/ zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba// sangs rgyas 'jim ten bla na med// 'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten// dpung gnyen/
218b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gnas kyang lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing // zhi ba dgra las rgyal gyur pa// sangs rgyas rgal ba 'gro sgrol ba// de dag
218b3(dkon brtsegs): tshan ni ga la mchis/ / lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/ mgon po gang dag smon lam ni// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa// de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste// sangs rgyas 'jig rten
218b4(dkon brtsegs): nang nas byung / / lha'i bu smon pa med pa la rten pas gsol pa/ zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa rnams su smon mi mdzad// srid pa yongs su chad pas na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten
218b5(dkon brtsegs): yong mi gos/ / lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ gang gis sred pa yongs bcom pa// de dag gzi mchog skyes pa ste// de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras// rang gi yab
218b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu ston pa med pas bskyed kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis sras rnams ma sAdA pa// sred pa yongs su bcad pas na// srid pa 'jig bgyid srid pa la// de dag
218b7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa mi bgyid do/ / lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/ gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa// gzi ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba// de dag
219a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ / lha'i du smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa// gang gis sred parab bcom pa// de dag mya ngan dkon pa rgol// de dag mi gom zang dza /
219a2(dkon brtsegs): med// dpa' chen khyod la de phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med la nges pas gsol pa/ gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang // bde ba dngos po med bsgoms la// mgon khyod de dag
219a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi yab/ / de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags// lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// de dag khyod kyi bstan pa dul// la lo sgyur
219a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing srid sel ba/ / sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ srid pa'i dgon las byung ba'i rnams// bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te/ nyon
219a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs dgra rnam pham mdzad pa/ / 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/ g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste// khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi
219a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ / bdud kyi dpung rnams pha ma mdzad cing // srid pa kun tu smon mi mdzad// lnga'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/ thar pa'i chos la stobs ldan pas// bdud kyi zhags
219a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs bcad cing / / khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag la// brgyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do// lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ lus med 'chi ba med tshul du// lus 'di gang
219b1(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong gyur pa/ / de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul dgar/ 'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs// wa'i du lus nges par sems pas gsol pa/ mi bcang rul pa'i rnag zag pa// zas 'dim
219b2(dkon brtsegs): bzad nges bsams te/ / yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas// rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/ lus la mi gtsang brtags bgyis te// lus la dran
219b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam spyad cing / / lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nas// des pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/ sbrul gyi pags pa rnying bzhin du// rnag can lus 'di
219b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs na ni/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bo che// sku mi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lu sa la smod pas gsol pa/ mi ka tsang dri nga rnag zag cing // rul pa'i lus la rnam smad de/
219b5(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyo bas gsol pa/ gang dag rul pa'i lus skyo zhing // rgyal sras gtsang mi'i tshal ba rnams//
219b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rab tu bskyed pa'i sras// de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur// lha'i bu lus kyis skrag pas gsol pa/ 'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'drar// gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa// de dag
219b7(dkon brtsegs): lus las 'das pa ste/ / rkang gnyis gtsol phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa/ lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste// ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' bas// sangs
220a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag/ srid gsum thams cad yongs su gzigs// lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsol ba/ sras kyi 'du shes 'dod chags thas/
220a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas// kun sbyor kun las 'das pa ste// rnam 'grol sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol ba/ srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad
220a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes mkhyen// khyod kyi sras rnams sgom bgyid cing // mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/ srid pa rnams kyi nyes
220a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs mthong / / mya ngan 'das la 'jigs med mthong // khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir// byang chub spyad pa spyod par bgyid// lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spungs kyis gsol pa/ gang
220a5(dkon brtsegs): gis srid pa rnams spangs shing / / 'jigs la mngon par mi dga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa// mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa
220a6(dkon brtsegs): mi yi dam pa khyod kyi srag/ srid par khrid par rab bsal te// khyod kyis bslab la bslabs pa dag/ stong gsum 'drin rnam par mdzes// lha'i bu srid pa las brtul bas gsol pa/ sring
220a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtshol btsal ba yi/ / 'jig rten mngon mchog skyob rnams so// zangs kyis rgyud du bzang ba mi// grangs ni 'jig rten 'di na med// lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/
220b1(dkon brtsegs): spyo ba bam sa nga po sa 'aso / na tus spyo/ rdzogs pa'i byu sa sto// phyo nasas na su rlo s+ho// di 'i snyid dus su g
220b2(dkon brtsegs): sol pa/ brid pa'i rgyun las rab tu rol// rnam par 'dren pa srid pa banal// srid pa mthar phyin sangs rgyas te// srid pa sel la phyag cing 'tshal// ng+ge'i bu srid pa rab tu ni bying sa
220b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sbrid par khrid par rab zhi zhing // srid pa phamya pAr mdzud nas gshegs// brtan pA srid pa mthar 'byin pa// khyod la do bla ma mchis so// lha'i bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas
220b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi bas// mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'// srid pa phyir log thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu sring ba
220b5(dkon brtsegs): tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ / srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs te// srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa// gang gis srid pa len gyur pa'i// khyod kyis kun tu sbyor ma mthong // lha'i bu srid
220b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te// srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no// zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'// mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid
220b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i pha rol brgal ba ste// srid par khrid pa yang dag bsal// rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas// skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad//
221a1(dkon brtsegs): bam po bcu pa// lha'i bu tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/ tshor ba bdag tu bsti ma mchis// sems pa ma mchis rtsol ma mchis// bsam gtan
221a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa che khyod kyis/ / tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen// lha'i bu tshor ba ston pas gsol pa/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par// tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// rmi lam sdug gu'i dga'
221a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba/ / de la so so'i skye bo chags// lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/ shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na// tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing // 'ong ba med la dngos med par/
221a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa/ tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo bstan dka'i tshig de yang // khyod kyis sems
221a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la bstan/ / lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol pa/ tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du mi dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can der btul bas// 'gro ba the tshom ma mchis
221a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po// mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid na// de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs//
221a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa// rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa// mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis// tshor ba bdag med rab tu
221b1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ / lha'i bu tshor ba las brgal bas gsol pa/ rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod// brgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las brgal// 'dam las brgal cing sdig med pa// byang chub mchog
221b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di sangs rgyas 'gyur/ / lha'i bu tshor ba las 'byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du// tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas// tshor ba'i phung po rab brgal te// sangs
221b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ / lha'i bu tshor ba rigs pas gsol pa/ mi rnams dag la gang 'ching ba'i// tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur
221b4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ / de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pa ma// bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste// sems de rang bzhin//
221b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin// sems ni bde gshes
221b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mkhyen/ / de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag rtog pas gsol pa/ sgyu ma mkhan nam slob ma bzhin// gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems ni khro kyis
221b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag brtags/ / de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa/ sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na// ji ltar
222a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du/ / byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid pa gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ dul gyur las su rung ba yi// sems kyi
222a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin rtog med pa/ / gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// mtshan nyid bstan pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa/ gang gis sems la sems med shes//
222a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa// de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi// lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang dag sems
222a4(dkon brtsegs): la sems med shes/ / de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la// skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags// lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa
222a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa/ / sems can de dag zhi rab zhi// bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi// lha'i bu sems mnyen pas gsol pa
222a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing / / bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang // khyod kyi bstan la gang mos pa// de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/
222a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing // yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na// zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas gsol pa
222b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi yid ni chos nyid la/ / rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa// de dag mi dbang sras po ste// zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags// lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams/
222b2(dkon brtsegs): cad chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams// chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spyod yul ma yin med// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings las nges par byung gis gsol pa// mi mchog
222b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ / chos kyi dbyings las nges byung ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag/ mtshan nyid gcig gi nges byung lags// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/
222b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos kyi dbyings zhes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i// ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol
222b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / chos kyi dbyi la gong zhugs pa// de dag ye shes bsam yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med// sems can bsam la de dag mkhas// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa/
222b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig/ chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams// de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa// bsam gyis mi khyab thos par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la
222b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ gang la de dag gnas pa yi// 'jigs pa med pas thob med pas// de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs// de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung // lha'i bu chos
223a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol bu/ khyod na chos dbyings ma bstsu pa b+he// chos rnams kun la shin tu na lug/ lag sani la sku rur gzhag bzhin// chos kyi dbying ca/
223a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par ston// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs// mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te// bzung
223a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis btang ma mchis/ / lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de// bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi//
223a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la ston pas gsol pa/ keng dang gang gi sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa// de yi sgo nas chos dbyings spyon//
223a5(dkon brtsegs): de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol ba/ mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// brtson pas rdzogs
223a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ / ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi tshim gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyi skye bo 'di// chos kyis rab tu tshim par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings
223a7(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam mkhyen pas/ / 'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol ba/ gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun// 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta// chos
223b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa yi/ / 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pa ga stsol pa/ mi masgrog 'dran pa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes gnas 'di chos dacing /
223b2(dkon brtsegs): te// rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po// gang la spyod pa de lags so// lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te// thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i
223b3(dkon brtsegs): lam/ / de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen//
223b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyi gcig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang // rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi
223b5(dkon brtsegs): sras/ / gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes// gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams// rang byung nyid du nges par byung // lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings
223b6(dkon brtsegs): la gang bslabs pa'i/ / skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/
223b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba// de dag bde gshegs dgong sil mos// bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang // de dag rmongs par yongs mi nus// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mngon par shes
224a1(dkon brtsegs): pasag sol pa/ banas med kyang gis ris gyun pa/ de dag padag rnyag bdu rdzogasaskyebs kyang chu mi baspyod ces/ mams pang+ge dag tu swAhA/
224a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ gnas med 'du shes mabs pa ni// chos nyid la ni rab kAnas te// sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni// ji lta ru rta phris
224a3(dkon brtsegs): shing rta bzhin/ / lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas med de/
224a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/ gan sa dang de bzhin gnas min pa// byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan// rang gi
224a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni thugs chud nas/ / sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol ba/ sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang // las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i// rgyu de khyod kyis
224a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud/ / las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol pa/ chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni// las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen// gang gis rgyu yis
224a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis de yang / / gang zag mchog gis thugs su chud// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag na// mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba// de mi
224b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang len pa dang / / gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bus gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las//
224b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang las kyi len pa rnams// kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i// las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te//
224b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang skye ba'ang ma mchis so// de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas// dus la nam smin rnam gsum
224b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / / ji ltar de yi len pa yang // khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod// lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas//
224b5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med// lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang // rnam
224b6(dkon brtsegs): smin so so yang dag rig/ thams cad spyod par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la dka' bos gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ khyod
224b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rang gis mngon mkhyen te/ / rang bzhin med par bsan par mdzad/ lha'i bu tshobs kyis rnam par rtse bas kyi rol pa/ chu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyem dang rgyang kyi rnams//
225a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro med dbang phyug med pa ste/ rten cing 'byung ba khrod kyi sa mkhyen// khwa'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol du/ rtswa da n+ten+d+ra dang las rnams dang // nam/
225a2(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa sten pa rnams// de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes// song ka'i nga rol khyod kyis kusungs// lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol ba/ 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis/
225a3(dkon brtsegs): khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pa// de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen// de bas khyod ni do zla med// lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing /
225a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang // de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba// de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten
225a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyis shing / / ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi// sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni
225a6(dkon brtsegs): brten bgyis shing / / bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas// 'du 'dzi ci 'dra bgyid gyur pa// de kun bla na med pas mkhyen// klu'i zla stobs kyi sa byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/
225a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing // 'dren pa de yi khams dang ni// 'du 'dzi ba shes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol
225b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ khams de dang ni de len dang // bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa// de la khyod kyis mkhyen pa nges// de phyir the tshom yongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu khams la rten pas gsol pa//
225b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i// 'khor ba de dang khams de dang // spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/
225b3(dkon brtsegs): ye she gang gi khams de ni// 'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi// mkhyen te mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes// blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstan// lha'i bu khams nas nges par byung gis gsol pa//
225b4(dkon brtsegs): khams gang la ni brten bgyis na// 'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// khyod la do bla ma mchis so// lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su song bas gsol pa/ khams
225b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la ni brten bgyis pas/ / yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang // rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag/ de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol ba
225b6(dkon brtsegs): khams gang la ni rten bgyid cing / / 'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa// de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen// de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsolapa/
225b7(dkon brtsegs): khams gang la ni brten btsudan pas// 'gro ba ci drar mchis mi// sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang // ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa
226a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can log pa nyid nges shing / / mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa// phung po gsum po de dag la// khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam gyis de bar byung gis
226a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sems can yang dag nyid nges te// ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal med pa// de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug/ lha'i bu la mA la mos pas
226a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ ma nges phung por gyur pa la// gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams// de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa/
226a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te// de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang // mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du// kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs// lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol
226a5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnam med// ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med// don dam nyid du bsten to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la kun
226a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas// des na de la 'jigs med de// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// ji ltar 'dod dgur rnam par 'phrul// lha'i bu chos
226a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang // kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // brda yang dmigs su ma mchis so// lha'i bu mo
226b1(dkon brtsegs): gyu sa kyis gso pa/ / 'dod thathams ca na b+hA(// chos kyim ca nas r+m+ma/ yang rgyas bdu dod du sa/ khyo ma chos kyi ts+tsha/
226b2(dkon brtsegs): wA'i nu'am la brtson pas gsol pa/ nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams// gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis// log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror// drang srong chen po khyod
226b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzigs/ / lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol ba/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis te// gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags khams la sdug lta ga/ de dag zug
226b4(dkon brtsegs): chen khyod kyis gzigs/ / lha'i bu mi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// 'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba/
226b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba/
226b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu rkyen 'dis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// gti mug khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung
226b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ / de dag khyod kyis zi bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu gtong ba nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag/ ser sna mngon par 'phel 'gyur te// de la mos po nges
227a1(dkon brtsegs): / byung ba// de dgas kyu chen khyod kyis gzigs/ lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol b+ha/ rig pa'i thogs dang 'grogs bstan// mab+hUn
227a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i khams ni rab tu byung / / de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba// de dag 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen// lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/
227a3(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang // mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag/ khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu nan tAn snying por byed pas gsol pa// 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/
227a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi rgyu 'byung nan tan dang // mos pa de la 'byung ba yang // smad pa med de khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa/ sems can gang gis khams gang la/
227a5(dkon brtsegs): brten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi// rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/ sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang // gang gis rgya chen
227a6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang / / dmigs pa dang no zhing rnams dang // dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol ba/ 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang /
227a7(dkon brtsegs): sring par mngon par 'jug pa dang // srid pa'i bar bgyi ba'i don// de dag smra ba'i mchog chos mi byed// lha'i bu dab bar spyod yul gyis gsos la/ dbang po nyim rlung na mongs ni
227b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal/ / sbed pa rnam par gzhig pa yang // rkang gnyis dam pas bstan pa mdzad// grwa'i bu dbang po rnam par rdul bas bsol pa/ dbang po rtul po
227b2(dkon brtsegs): dur khrod brten/ / rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas// sed dang bcas pas khyod la lnga// lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags
227b3(dkon brtsegs): can dang 'dod chags dang / / zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang // sred pazhi dang dbang po rnams// rnam par gzigs na sngon mi dmigs// lha'i bu dbang po la gnus pas gsol pa
227b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/ / gnod sems med dang dben pa dge/ dbang po rdul po sten pa'i tshe// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol
227b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ zhe sdang gnyen po byams par gsungs// sems can shes pa rjes su skye// zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa/
227b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems med dang byams pa dang // zhi ba ngo bo nyid ma gzigs// bdag dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te// des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags// lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis
227b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ log par rnam par rtog pa dang // log par nye bar ston pa yang // nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te// bzlog pas thar par 'gyur ba gzigs// lha'i bu ye she yang dag
228a1(dkon brtsegs): shwar gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste// bskyog pas snang ba chen por 'gyur// de ni grags chen khyod kyis
228a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ / lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // sun pa snang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te// de ni rlung
228a3(dkon brtsegs): gtso bos gzigs/ / lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa// sems can gang gis shes pa gang // ji tsam yongs su bsgrub bgyis dang // snod du gang rung ji snyed pa// de dag mi mchog khyod
228a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen/ / lha'i bu dbang po dang zhes 'gras pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs spangs phyir shwe gang gis// shes pa de la rtogs bgyid pa// de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen// de bas
228a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mngon par dka'/ / lha'i bu dbang po la dka' bas gsol pa/ yul dang dus dang gnas drug dang // spyod pa rnam par bsgoms pa dang // nyon mongs nyon mongs rnam dag drang / rngub
228a6(dkon brtsegs): pakhyod kyis stong par gzigs/ / lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang // gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang // bcings dang thar dang zad dang shes/
228a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen// lnga'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rab 'bring rtul ba dang // nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang // gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag
228b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ca nyid med par gsungs/ / khwa'i bri dbang po rnam par brtags kyis ga so p+na pa/ sems pan+danam+b+ha b+hi bas m+b+ha gdun dang // rnam par kun nas rtson mongs dang // sgom pa 'jug '
228b2(dkon brtsegs): dzin ldang ba dang / / rnam byang thub pa byed kyi ma khyed// d+hung du stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin brten te// chos kun jo bo nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin med par byed kyis
228b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ / des na thams cad ma byin ces ba// lha'i bu snrubs kyi k+Sho rgyus gastsol ba/ rgyas rnams kyang dang rang bzhin kyang // chos gang gi sa nI brjod bgyis pa// rang dag ji bzhin drug
228b4(dkon brtsegs): su chud/ / des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol ba/ log par btags pas kun nyon mongs// rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar 'gyur// las las skyes par ni
228b5(dkon brtsegs): dag mkhyen/ / des na khyod kyi ro zla med// lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi// gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang // bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen//
228b6(dkon brtsegs): des na khyod kyi do zla med// lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar ldan pa dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag
228b7(dkon brtsegs): ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan/ / lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa// bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin// bag yod pa las byung ba ste//
229a1(dkon brtsegs): de la khyod kyi mi shes 'jug/ wa'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gsol ba/ dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// bsam bdun la sogs de dag dang // ljang dang rnam pa
229a2(dkon brtsegs): byang la 'jug/ de ni rlung ltar chags pa me// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs te// srid pa'i skyon dang yongs ma
229a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dres/ / des na khyod la do zla med// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol ba/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing // 'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na/
229a4(dkon brtsegs): des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtog pas gsol pa/ sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag/ blo mchog gsung tshe gsol pas na// spobs pa sna tshogs rab mnga' bar// rnam
229a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa des nges byung / / lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la byang bas gsol ba/ sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe// tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa// 'jig rten smon rnams khyod kyis gzigs
229a6(dkon brtsegs): des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas/ / lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa// sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la// dpa' bos sngon chad sbyong mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyen du nges par
229a7(dkon brtsegs): byung / / sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir// bskal pa bye ba zangs med du// sangs rgyas
229b1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba mtha' yas pa/ / de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye bar brtag mdzad pas// chos kun sems can med pa zhes// chos
229b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen/ / 'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gnas dang gnas min
229b3(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen par/ / rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas// des na 'jig rten 'di la gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa/ gnas dang gnas min brten bgyis nas//
229b4(dkon brtsegs): las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na// khams dang dbang po mos pa dang / bas mnyan pa sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen// lha'i bu sngon mtha' la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis
229b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas/ / stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po// dpa' bo chen pos rnam par snrel// des ni 'jig rten 'di la gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyon yul
229b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyi// sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang // dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams// mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad// lha'i nr-i
229b7(dkon brtsegs): mdza'i spyod pal po sor tom pas gsol pa/ thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi// sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing // khams dang mos pa mkhyen pas na// de phyir sems can gsob mang
230a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis sa sol pa/ brgal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// sngon gyi mtha' la bdag bkyis kyang // khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mi mang// des
230a2(dkon brtsegs): nA mgon la bdag mos lags/ / lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// sngon mtha'i sbrid pA bas mu bgyis kyang // rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yon tan
230a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ / pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ skye dgu sna tshogs las ldan pa// shi 'pho skye bar
230a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dag/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la nges par byung gyis gsol pa/ rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig/ bgyis shing rgyud drug mchis gyur pa/
230a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen// des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi// lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsol ba/ khams gang gis ni sems can gang // bsgos par
230a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing las bgyid pa'i/ / bag chags las dang sems can dag/ khyod kyis g.yo ba med par mkhyen// lha'i du shi 'pho dang skye bu rig pas gsol pa/ bshes gnyen ci 'dra bsnyen gyis
230a7(dkon brtsegs): shing / / las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas// 'gro ba gang du mchi 'gyur ba// thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ las de yi ni gyi/
230b1(dkon brtsegs): bkang // dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// gang gi slad du las bgyis pa// de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dngos po gang dag dmigs/
