364b5(dkon brtsegs): skyoslong mang po de dag khyim pa rnams dang mthun par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde zab mo rnams dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod lam zhib mo gya
364b6(dkon brtsegs): nom pa'i chos rnams ni phal cher spangs nas su'ang klog cing 'don pa med par gyur to/ / gang po de'i tshe dge slong rnams 'dod pa mang po gang la spyod par mos shing bza' ba dang
364b7(dkon brtsegs): btung ba'i ro la chags par gyur pas/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu da ma shi r-i zhes bya ba rgyal po shin tu byams shing gces par byed pa zhig yod do// des gnas dben pa zhig tu
365a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa me rogan das chos ji lta bu zhig brnyes na/ deng de'i nyan thos rnams bag med par spyod cing / khyim pa rnams dang
365a2(dkon brtsegs): bye brag med par gyur ces de snyam du sems shing the tshom du gyur pa dang / de'i tshe lha zhig de'i thad du 'ongs nas lus mi snang bar byas te 'di skad du/ kye rgyal bu de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na das
365a3(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa'i chos ni shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa yin no zhes smras so/ / de nas rgyal bu des lhas de skad smras pa thos pa dang / 'di skad du kye de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan ngas
365a4(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges par gyur pa'i chos kyi dngos po de ji lta bu zhig yin/ lhas smras pa/ rgyal bu chos de ni gzugs kyang med/ tshor ba dang
365a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang med/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyang med 'dod pa lnga'ang med/ 'dod pa'i sems kyang med de/
365a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ga shegs pan sngon dus de lta ra chu na nu pa cing yongs su gas rnas par ngas pa rjes pa sems can rnams la'ang dag par rab tu ldan to// den rgyam da
365a7(dkon brtsegs): ma smras pa/ bdag gis de wA bu'i chos thos shing khong du chung par gyur nas ji skang bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub tu rung ngas/ was sbas pa/ tse rgyal bu kyang sems rtse gcig tu nan ngan brtson
365b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus byos shig dang / thob par dka' ba med do// gang po de'i tshe rgyal bu de 'di snyam du nges par lhas kyang bskul te/ bdag gis khong du chud par byas nas/ bdag rab tu byung ste chos
365b2(dkon brtsegs): zab mo de rab tu yongs su gnyer bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ pha ma ga la ba der song ste mgos gtugs te phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum deng bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
365b3(dkon brtsegs): me rog na da'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lo/ / pha mas smras pa/ khyod deng nged spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ci dgos da ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la
365b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba rnams ni khyim pa rnams dang bye brag tu gyur pa ci'ang med do/ / de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ da ltar dge slong mang po rnams// bag med 'dod pa lnga yang spyod//
365b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing rmo da nyo 'tshong byed pas na// khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med// dbul po sdug bsngal rab mang zhing // bdag nyid gso bar mi nus pa/ de 'dra'i skye bo mang po rnams// lus
365b6(dkon brtsegs): gso'i phyir ni rab tu byung / / khyod ni rgyal rigs khyim du skyes// byug cing 'dod lnga'i bde ba myong // nor dang rin chen rab mngan// rab tu byung bas ci zhig bya// de nas rgyal
365b7(dkon brtsegs): bung ma shi ris/ pha ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni dbang phyug mi 'chol te// gal te thob kyang spong bar bgyid// deng bdag sangs rgyas chos zab dang // rnam
366a1(dkon brtsegs): dag tshul khrims 'ba' zhig 'chol/ / lha zhig bdag ni go gyis te// rab tu byung bar bskul bas na// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i zab mo chos// bdag ni rab
366a2(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs par 'tshal/ / lhas smras bdag gis thos pas na// sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa nub tu nye// bdag ni grogs bgyi bsrung bar sems// de nas
366a3(dkon brtsegs): pha mas tshigs su bcad de da ma shi ri la smras pa/ mdo sde zab mo zad nub pas// kha ton 'don pa'ang yong med na// di ring khyod kyis su las ni// sangs rgyas chos zab thos par
366a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / gal te 'khor ni bzhi po las// don zab 'don pa yod gyur na// de las khyod kyis sngar mnyan nas// de 'og rab tu byung ba'i rigs// da ma shi ris tshigs su bcad de
366a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma la smras pa/ / deng bdag nan tan brtson 'grus kyis// tshul khrims bsrung zhing sbyangs pa spyod// thag ring ri dang nags tshal nas// sangs rgyas chos zab rnam dag 'chol// gang po
366a6(dkon brtsegs): da ma shi ris tshigs su bcad de pha ma la smras nas/ mgo bos phyag byas te rab tu byung bar gsol ba btab pa dang / pha ma gnyis kyang cang mi smra bar gnang ngo // de nas de dge slong rnams
366a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi thad du song nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas rab tu byung ste/ bslab pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par blangs nas gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong
366b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan das rdzas su bstan pa 'i wA bu log gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad/ bdag gis thos parab+harAn/ dza skad bstan pa bzhin du bcu
366b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / gang po dge slong mang po rnams kyis/ dge sbyong dam shi rol 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las chos
366b3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa ni med kyi/ mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams kyi rjes su spyod par zad pas/ deng khyod kyang 'di lta bu'i chos la spyod cig/ de nas dge slong dam shi ris/ dge slong rnams la
366b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ khyod ni gdon mi za bar dbul po smad rims las rab tu byung ba yin pas/ de'i phyir deng khyod gos zas 'ba' zhig lhur len pas spyod pa rnams khyim pa dag dang bye brag tu gyur pa
366b5(dkon brtsegs): ci'ang med pas na/ deng khyed bdag dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yongs su dag pa btsal bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de
366b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dam shi r-i la smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni gang bsgrubs pa// dngos po de ni thob gyur pas// gos zas dag ni 'byor cing ldan// rgyal pos bkol ba las kyang
366b7(dkon brtsegs): thar/ / shin tu bde zhing rab tu spyod// brnyas shing nga rgyal byed pa med// khyim pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa// de dag da ltar gang yang med// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das
367a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ / mchog tu bde bar gyur pa yin// dngos po 'di las lhag pa ni// bdag cag la ni dgos pa med// khyim pas rtan du sbyor 'bul bas// @
367a2(dkon brtsegs): cag chos gos lhung bzed mang / / sman dang nor zas shin tu mang // sbyin bdag khyim yang rab tu mang // gang po de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ris/ dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su
367a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad de de skad smras pa thos pa dang / sems la rab tu gdung ba skyes nas mtsham brags te dus nas/ gtsug lag khang gzhan dag tu song ste/ yang dngos po des dge slong mang
367a4(dkon brtsegs): po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro ga na das rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad/ bdag gis thos par gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa
367a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / dge slong mang po rnams kyis kyang snga ma bzhin du lan btab par gyur to// de nas dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong mang po de dag spangs
367a6(dkon brtsegs): nas gcig pu ri dang nags tshal dben pa'i gnas su song nas/ sems rtse gcig tu chos zab mo gnyer ba la 'dun par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe sngon de bzhin gshegs pa me ro ga na
367a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na nyan thos chen po shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba rab tu dben pa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa/ gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas pa/ 'dod pa nyung zhing
367b1(dkon brtsegs): chos shes pa/ yongs su spong ba la sems mngon par sngo ba/ bya ba byas pa/ mngon par shes pa drug dang / rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa chen po zhig byung bar
367b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ ji ltar da ltar nga'i bstan pa las 'od srungs chen po ji lta ba bzhin no// de'i tshe dge slong shin tu brtan pa des bdag nyid gnas pa'i ri drug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bdud
367b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag yi ger bris par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i ro ni myangs pa'i phyir// 'khor ba dag ni rgyun mi gcod// dgra na gsos nas dur khrod 'jug
367b4(dkon brtsegs): med sdug bsngal mang po myong / / lus 'di mi gtsang ro dang 'dra// bu ga dgu nas mi gtsang 'dzag/ srin bu mi gtsang myos pa bzhin// blun po sa lus sred de dang 'dra//
367b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ma yin kun rtog pa// des ni 'dod lnga'i rtsa ba yin// mkhas pa dag ni mi rtog pas// 'dod lnga dag ni 'gag par 'gyur// log rtog las ni 'dod
367b6(dkon brtsegs): chen skye/ / 'dod chen las ni nyon mongs skye// yang dag dran la zhen med pas// nyon mongs lcug ma'ang zad par 'gyur// / bram po bzhi pa//
367b7(dkon brtsegs): gang po dge slong shin tu brtan pas ri phug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di yi ger bris pa/ dge slong dam shi ri ri phug dben par song bas yun
368a1(dkon brtsegs): ring zhig lon nas ri phug gi breg ngos la tshigs su bcud pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa mthong na smra kha ton du bsgrubs te/ de'i don gang yid la byas bdung
368a2(dkon brtsegs): ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gnad sngon zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su phyin nas/ phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba
368a3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas 'di skad ces/ bdag gis gnas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma mthong / chos gzhan yang ma thos kyi bar du 'di las mi ldang ngo zhes yi dam bcas
368a4(dkon brtsegs): so/ / gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gnadas gsungs pa'i mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa zhes bya ba brgya byin lha'i dbang pos mdo sde de kha ton du shes pas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang pos
368a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong da ma shi ri'i lhag pa'i bsam pa sems kyis rtogs nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs te/ de'i drung du phyin nas/ de la mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa de yang dag par
368a6(dkon brtsegs): bshad do/ / gzhan yang mang du thos pa'i dngos gzhi'i tshig bzhi dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bdun dang / sgo'i tshig bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang byin no// dge slong du ma shi
368a7(dkon brtsegs): ris thos nas kyang kha ton du bton te yong su bzung bas chos rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan das gsungs pa'i mdo sde yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid
368b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa/ zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang rang gi ngang gis sems la snang bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na
368b2(dkon brtsegs): da'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i gnas dri gtsang khang dang / gdan khri dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / rdo
368b3(dkon brtsegs): dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to//
368b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dam shi ri'ing chos rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur pas/ 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas mthar gyis rang yul du song ste/ pha ma'i drung du phyin nas// pha ma
368b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa/ zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bshad nas/ sangs rgyas dang / chos
368b6(dkon brtsegs): dang dge 'dun gyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rab tu brjod pas/ gang po de'i tshe dge slong dam shrI ro'i ya mdang / nang gi btsun mo dang / blon po chen po dang / 'khor
368b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis chos de thos nas shin tu mngon par yid ches par gyur pas/ gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong dam shi rol 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa bdag cag yongs su bskyab
369a1(dkon brtsegs): cing de bzhin gshegs pa me rogan da'i bstan pa la rab tu dbyung du gsol zhing / gang po de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyal po dang btsun mo rab tu byung ba'i rjes sungs
369a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu rab tu byung bar gyur to/ / rab tu byung nas thams cad kyi ming da ma shi ri'i tshogs kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to// gang po dge slong dam shi ros de ltar de bzhin
369a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me rog na da'i bstan pa slar rgyas par byas nas/ sems can mang po de dag bde ba la yang dag par bkod do// sngon gyi tshe rabs kyi byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems kyis
369a4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos bsrung bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri ljongs gcig nas gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas
369a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gnad dang / de'i nyan thos kyi bsngags pa'ang brjod/ gzhan yang yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa
369a6(dkon brtsegs): z ab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri 'ang skye bo mang po kun gyis mchod cing rim
369a7(dkon brtsegs): zo dang / kur sti dang / bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pas snyan pa'i grags pa'ang kun tu grags par gyur to// gang po dge slong dam shi ris de ltar sems can mang
369b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i don rgya cher byas nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de'i slob ma dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams lhan cig 'dus te/
369b2(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gnyis yod pa brtsigs te/ me tog dang spos dang // byug pa dang
369b3(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis gus par mchod cing/ rim gro dang bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po

369b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa me ro ga na da yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo sum brgya lon pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ sngon gyi smon lam
369b6(dkon brtsegs): dang tshe rabs dran pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis sgo rnams kyi tshig ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyang rang gi ngang gis slar thob par gyur to/ / gzungs thob pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis sngon
369b7(dkon brtsegs): ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams sems can la rgya cher yang dag par bstan gyi/ tshe rabs snga ma la sngar bshad par gyur pa dag ni ma bstan to// gang po de'i tshed ma shi ri'i dge
370a1(dkon brtsegs): slong mang po rnams las gang shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun stug po gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde rnams thos par/

370a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'brang bar don la rton pa'i phyir/ sems kyis 'gal bar mi byed do// 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na da'i bstan pa la'ang yang dag par srung bar byed la
370a7(dkon brtsegs): gus pas dge slong dran pa thob pa la'ang srung bar byed do/ / gang po de'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor khrag khrig phrag brgyang cung dge slong dram
370b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde'i chos kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur to/ / gang po de'i tshe da ma shi ri'i slob ma 'khor rnams logs shig tu sde gnyis su gyes par gyur te/ gcig gi ming ni da ma
370b2(dkon brtsegs): shi ri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to/ / gcig gi ming ni dran pa thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur kyang / de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pas bdag ni da ma shi ri yin no/
370b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes ma smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri ni mang po kun gyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no zhes zer bas/
370b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag nyid kyis smras par gyur na mang po kun the tshom za bar gyur pa dang / dge slong dran pa thob pa ni de'i tshe mang po kun gyis 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi/ dgra bcom
370b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ma yin no zhes zer bas so/ / gang po dge slong dran pa thob pas de ltar rgya cher sems can rnams la phan btags nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang / de'i slo
370b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mang po rnams kyis spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs so/ / 'khor bzhi po rnams 'dus nas ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
370b7(dkon brtsegs): ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsigs nas/ spos dang / me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
371a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / bdun sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong dran pa thob pa'i chi ka'i dus kyi
371a2(dkon brtsegs): tshebadag slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ smon lam btab pa bzhin du khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur gyur te// de'i ming ni ya sha
371a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur to/ / sngon gyi smon lamagyi dbang gis sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu
371a4(dkon brtsegs): lo brgya pa'i bstan pa las lo bdun lon te/ rab tu byung nas gzungs rnams thob par gyur to// gzungs thob pa'i mthus skye bo mang po la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams yang
371a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par bstan to/ / de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams dang / da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams las gang dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun sdug pa de dag ni ye shes bstan pa'i chos rnams
371a6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas sems rab tu dga' zhing / thams cad kyis chos kyi bde ba thob par gyur to// gang po dge slong mang po de dag yang dag pa'i don la rton cing tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar
371a7(dkon brtsegs): cang mi byed pas/ de'i phyir dge slong ya shas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab la/ don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa dag yang dag par
371b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa thos par gyur na/ mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed/ 'gal ba med par yang dag par len cing kha ton du 'don par byed de/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rjes su
371b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs par gyur to/ / gang po dge slong de dag las gang dbang po nul zhing mi gsal ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ldan mi sdug pa de dag ni dge slong ya sha las sngon ma thos pa'i ma
371b3(dkon brtsegs): sde don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab pa dag thos par gyur na/ mngon par yid ches shing dang du len pa'ang mi byed/ 'gal
371b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byas nas 'jig cing sbed par byed de 'di skad du/ 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni bdag cag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon las kyang ma thos/ sngon ston pa chen po byang chub
371b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dran pa thob pa las kyang ma thos so zhes zer ro/ / gang po de'i tshe dge slong ya sha las chos thos nas/ rab tu dga' ba dang sems kyis mngon par yid ches
371b6(dkon brtsegs): shing dang du blangs pa de dag thams cad ni/ da ma shi ro'i dge slong rnams dang / dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sdang zhing phrag dog gis smad nas lhan cig gnas
371b7(dkon brtsegs): su'ang mi ster/ lhan cig klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang // chos bshad du'ang mi ster te/ skur pa btab nas 'di skad du// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang
372a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ ston pa chen po'i bstan pa'ang ma yin no zhes zer ro// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ya shas de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na da'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par
372a2(dkon brtsegs): spel nas/ grong khyer gcig nas grong khyer gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan cing phan pa mang po byas pas/ srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na
372a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur ro/ / dge slong ye shas de ltar phan pa mang po byas nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / dge slong la
372a4(dkon brtsegs): sha'i rjes su phyogs pa'i skye bo bdun khri yod pa de dag gis dge slong ya sha'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten 'dun khri brtsigs nas/ spos dang / me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang
372a5(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bi dan mang po sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas/ tha mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to//
372a6(dkon brtsegs): gang po dge slong ya sha 'chi ka'i dus kyi che slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu smon lams lnga pa bzhin du yang rgyal
372a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs su skyes par gyur te/ de'i tshe lha mang po rnams kyis sgra chen po phyung ste/ 'di skad du kye deng rgyal po'i bu btsas pa 'di ni sems can la phan pa mang po byed pa yin no zhes
372b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pas/ sgra de'i rjes su mang yang rab tu 'dren pa zhes btags so// de la bcu bani lon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me rog nad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
372b2(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu lo brgya pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bar sbyar to/ / dge slong rab tu 'dren pade'ang mdo sde dang bstan bcos mang po rgya cher kha ton pa 'don pa dang / mang du thos shing tha
372b3(dkon brtsegs): mo la 'jug pa dang / tshig 'bru dang / spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos bstan pa'i thabs la rab tu mkhas par gyur to/ gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de grong
372b4(dkon brtsegs): rdal gcig nas gcig tu grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan nga'i bstan pa rgya cher spel nas
372b5(dkon brtsegs): ban pa mang po byas so/ / de'i tshed ma shi ri dang / dran pa thob pa dang / ya sha'i dge slong gi tshogs rnams ldan cig tu 'dus nas rab tu 'dren pa'i thang du 'ongs te
372b6(dkon brtsegs): dedes bstan pa dag gzhig cing skur pa gdab par bshams so/ / de nas de'i tshe dge slong rab tu 'dren pas dge slong mang po 'ongs par rig nas/ 'di skad du kye dge slong
372b7(dkon brtsegs): mang po khyed dngos po ci zhig gis ni rgol bar sems/ dngos po gang zhig gis ni 'dri bar sems zhes smras pa dang / dge slong mang po rnams de smras pa thos nas mya ngan
373a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis non cing mi bde bar gyur pas cang mi zer bar gyur to/ / dge slong rab tu 'dren pa la bgegs bya bar yang ma nus so// khang po byang chub sems dpa' de ji spyod du
373a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na gnas bde srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'ang rgyas shing rab tu 'phel bar gyur to/ / de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'ang nub par gyur to//
373a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de ma 'ongs pa'i dus thu ma la dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ba'i tshe/ grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu yul gcig nas gcig tu
373a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu zhing song nas/ sems can mang po'i ched du yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde zab mo yang dag par bstan pas/ srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad nus
373a5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu thams cad kyang mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// gang po
373a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rab tu 'dren pas de ltar phan pa byas nas/ de gang gi nub mo 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i phyi de nyin par sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'ang nub par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs
373a7(dkon brtsegs): pa me rogan da'i bstan pa nub par gyur pa'i phyir/ mdo sde zab mo yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang nub par gyur to// gang po de ltar na byang chub
373b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mdo sde zab mo de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing / bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyang phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin
373b2(dkon brtsegs): gang po byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dren pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu zhing de nyid kyi stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu par skyes par gyur te/ de'i tshe zhing
373b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan no/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs pa'i spyan zhes bya ste// de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshe rabs snga
373b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang / spobs pa gtugs pa med cing myur la thogs pa med par gyur to// dge
373b5(dkon brtsegs): slong rab tu 'dren pa de de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i spyan gyi bstan pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / slar yang de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'phel ba'i dpung ba zhes bya ba dang phrad par gyur nas/
373b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par
373b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu slar yang zhing de nyid du skyes nas/ de bzhin
374a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi za ba'i spyod pa dang phrad par gyur te/ sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ lo
374a2(dkon brtsegs): bdun khri'i bar du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to// deni tshe de'i ming
374a3(dkon brtsegs): ni shu la zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i spyod pa des 'di skad du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong shu la 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
374a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur
374a5(dkon brtsegs): rozhes lung bstan to/ / gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro//
374a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zab mo yis// rnam dag des
374a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos thos na/ / bdag nyid de la gnas byed cing // gzhan dag la yang ston par byed// 'jig rten gting na mo bogs kyang // byang chub sems dpa' bying mi 'gyur/
374b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam dag rab gnas nas// rgya cher sems can pha na yang 'dogs// gleng gzhi dang ni rtogs pa brjod// sangs rgyas lam zhes 'khor ba ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyis//
374b2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pas na// 'di ni nges pa'i chos yin no// byang chub sems dpa' phan spyod pa// sems can la ni phan yang 'dogs// sangs rgyas chos rnams srung byed cing // 'khor
374b3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub 'dems par byed/ / sems can dag gi chos bzhin don// byang chub sems dpas thams cad byed// 'khor la sangs rgyas lam ston pas/ byang chub sems ni
374b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas lam ni srung byed cing / sems can rgya cher phan 'dogs pas// lnga dang klu dang 'dre srin dang // gang zag chen pos bkur bar 'gyur// de'i
374b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir rnam par dag pa yi/ / stong zab gya nom chos thos nas// rtse cig sems shing gnyer byed na// shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan yang gang
374b6(dkon brtsegs): bopo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par byed de/ spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
374b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / de la spyod pa gang zhe na/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen nas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong
375a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par byed/ shes rab
375a2(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs mkhas pa sgom par byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas gang las mdo sde de lta bu dag rjes su ston pa'i thabs
375a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa thob par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub don du gnyer bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni/ byang chub sems
375a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro//
375a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams// spyad par bya ba'i chos dag ni// sbyin pa btang bas rab dga' zhing
375a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa med pa yin zhes bshad/ / de la dga' ba gang zhe na// dga' bas lus kun khyab pa yin// rtag tu dga' sems 'di yis ni// byang chub lam ni spyad par bya// byang
375a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas sbyin btang nas/ / byang chub tu ni sngo byed cing // sems can rnams la phan 'dogs na// rang don dpag med thob par 'gyur// spong bdag ni mthong gyur /
375b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'du shes rab bskyed de// de ring 'dir ni 'di 'ongs pas// bdag la byang chub lam yang byin// bdag ni 'di yi dbang gis ni// rnam dag zhing ni thob par 'gyur//
375b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di yis bdag la sangs rgyas bstan// bdag la sangs rgyas lam ston byed// deng bdag 'di dang phrad pas na// rnyed pa chen po rab rnyed ces// dga' bas lus kun khyab nas ni// /
375b3(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gzhan la mos mi byed// dga' zhing drung du 'ongs gyur na// rgyang nas gsong por smra bar byed// khyod ni dngos po ci zhig 'dod// bdag gis zad par sbyin zhes zer/
375b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te dgos pa med zer na// byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' zhing // 'dis bdag gdul bar 'dod pa'i phyir// dgos pa med ces zer bar zad// 'phags pa 'dis ni gang
375b5(dkon brtsegs): mos pa/ / 'dod nyung chog shes chos kyis ni// 'dir 'ongs bdag la go byas nas// byang chub rkyen ni thob par byed// deng bdag gang zag 'di yi rgyus// rjes su bstan
375b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyang thob/ / khyod kyis dgos med gang zer ba// tshig 'di legs pa yin zhes zer// dngos po 'di ni 'dod zer zhing // bdag la byin cig zer na yang // byang
375b7(dkon brtsegs): chung sems dpas ci bdog pa/ / dga' bas khyod kyis khyer zhes zer// gal te sbyin pa btang nas ni// phyis kyang 'gyod pa med gyur na// sangs rgyas lam ni dran pa'i phyir//
376a1(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rtag tu dga' ba thog// sems can kun la skal yod pas// thams cad 'phongs pa med 'gyur zhing // ma lus thams cad tshim bya zhes// sbyin pa
376a2(dkon brtsegs): gtong tshe sngo bar byed/ / byang chub lam ni spyod pa'i tshe// sems can bdag gi ming thos pa// rang gi ngang gis chog shes shing // ser sna rlugs sems med par shog/ bdag
376a3(dkon brtsegs): gi yul gyi sems can kun/ / lam spyod thams cad chos shes shing // 'dod lnga chags pa kun spangs nas// thams cad rab 'byung mos par shog/ de 'dra'i spyod pa tshad
376a4(dkon brtsegs): med dang / / sbyin pa yongs su bsngos pa yis// rtag par sbyin pa rab gtong zhing // sems can bdag rjes slob par shog/ byang chub sems dpas sbyin gtong tshe// byams
376a5(dkon brtsegs): sems sems can khyab pas na/ / 'jig rten dag ni thams cad na// de 'dra'i bde ba yong med do// dper na khyim bdag phyug po zhig/ nor dang rin chen shin tu mang // bu ni gcig
376a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig yod pa las/ / lo ni mang por lam ring song // khyim bdag bu 'ongs thos gyur nas// dga' bas lus kun khyab 'gyur zhing // sun rings lon nas de 'ongs shes//
376a7(dkon brtsegs): dgadong btsas bzhin rab tu dga'// byang chub sems dpas spong mthong na// de yi sems ni rab tu dag ra// khyim bdag de yi dga' bas na// bcu drug char yang mi 'od
376b1(dkon brtsegs): do/ / sbyin pa gtong bar thos gyur na// de yi sems ni rab dga' bas// byams sems las byung dga' ba yi// dpe zla dag ni yong med do// ji ltar rgyal pos nyes byung na// yan
376b2(dkon brtsegs): lag gtubs zhes bsgo bas na/ / gsod pas bsad gnas khrid nas ni// mtshon gyis gdab par gzas pa dang // rgyal pos longs spyod thabs byin na// mi de rab tu dga' bas
376b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang / / byang chub sems dpas 'phongs pa la// sbyin btang dga' ba tsam mi 'od// byang chub sems dpa' lam sgom tshe// bsod nams zhing ni mi 'tshal gyi// spong ba yod
376b4(dkon brtsegs): na gtong byed pas/ / de phyir dga' ba chen po thob// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang // dgra bcom rang rgyal mthong gyur na// gus sems phrad dka' rig pas na//
376b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir drung 'gro mchod par byed// byang chub sems dpa' gzi byon ldan// gsapa rno sems ni dul bas na// yon tan mos shing lam gnyer phyir// sangs rgyas dge
376b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun mchod par byed/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang // de yi nyan thos ma gtogs par// lhag pa'i bsam dang gus sems kyis// lha 'dre gzhan ni
376b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod mi byed/ / gal te rang rgyal 'ga' zhig gis// rang byung mya ngan 'das thob pa// de 'dra'i yon tan ldan mthong na// de la yang ni mchod pa byed/ byang chub sems
377a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bsod nams zhing / / dge dang mi dge rig pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pa gang yin pa// mu stegs sdig can mchod mi byed// rdul khrims phyogs la
377a2(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas shing / / byams sems sems can kun la khyab// brtson 'grus dag kyang dpe zla med// bzod shes mang thos rgya yang che// de 'dra'i yon tan ldan pas na// 'jig
377a3(dkon brtsegs): rten kun gyi gtsor gyur nas/ / sangs rgyas byang chub mngon byas te// bla med 'khor lo skor bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra yi// chos bzhi dag ni sgrub byed na/
377a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa// thams cad kun ni mngon du gyur// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// yon tan rnams ni gang bsgrubs pa// de kun byang chub sems dpa'i lam//
377a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni bsdu bar bya ba yin// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rtag tu byams sems bsgom par bya// rang byung ri dang tshal gnas shing // dgon pa'i gnas
377a6(dkon brtsegs): la mos par bya/ / rtag par shin tu rnam dag cing // zab mo nges pa'i chos btsal te// byang chub spyod dang ldan byas nas// de yis bdag nyid 'phel bar bya// dge ba'i
377a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus su'i bu gakun nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma bkye'o//
377b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang spu'i bu ga re re kun nas me rab tu 'bar ba'i phung po ri rib lhun po dang mnyam pa dag byung bar gyur ro// gzhan yang spu'i bug re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston
377b2(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pa ga tA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung bar gyur to/ / 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis kyang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu bstan pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
377b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gang mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i bu ga nas byung ba'i
377b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pas rgyun
377b5(dkon brtsegs): chad pa med pa yin na/ deng nyan zlos rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di 'ba' zhig tu bzhugs nas chos 'chad par mthong ste/ nga ni yang dag par na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
377b6(dkon brtsegs): khams kang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kun tu chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad cing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du de bzhin du chos ston par mdzad du/ gang po
377b7(dkon brtsegs): g al te 'ga' zhig yang dag pa'i tshig gis 'di skad du mtshungs pa med cing dpe zla med pa rkang gnyis kyi mchog bsod nams kyi zhing shin tu zab cing dadag par 'da'ab spyod pa dpag tu
378a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang ldan pa/ gom pa gcig bor na'ang sems can thams cad kyis sems gang dang spyod pa gang gis rkang pa bteg cing bzhag pa shes par yang mi 'gyur la
378a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhal bar yang mi nus pa de gang yin zhes zer na/ de ni nga yin no zhes smra bar bya ste// gang po sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa gang dang / bsam pa gang
378a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / spyod pa gang gis zhabs bteg pa dang / zhabs bzhag pa gzhal bar mi nus pas so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i
378a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan dgongs pa gang dag dang // spyod pa gang gis zhabs bteg bzhag/ g.yo dang mi g.yo sems can gyis// dngos po
378a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rtag mi rig/ rdzu 'phrul mthu yang tshad med de// spyod pa dag kyang tshad med do// yon tan dag ni tshad med phyir// mchog tu mthong zhing gtso bor gyur// blo gros chen po tshad
378a6(dkon brtsegs): med pas/ / sus kyang mthar thug shes mi 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad kun// shes rab dang ni rdzu 'phrul stobs// thams cad shA ri'i bu dang no// mo'u 'gal lta bur
378a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang ni/ / nga yis rkang pa bteg bzhag pa'i// dngos po dag ni rig mi 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad kun// rang rgyal byang chub grub gyur kyang // da yi gom gcig mi
378b1(dkon brtsegs): rig na/ / chos zab gzhan lta spos ci dgos// nyi zla tshad med ji snyed pa// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig gyur kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu khung gcig/ 'od zer tsam yang mi bod do// gal
378b2(dkon brtsegs): te 'jig rten khams bye ba/ / khrag khrig phrag ni bdun khri yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kun tu yang // zhing ni tshad med snang byed pa// de 'dra'i nyo ma chen po dag/ phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//
378b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad nyi ma gcig tu gyur// 'od zer gcig kyang ri rab tsam// de 'dra'i nyi ma chen po dag/ rtag par phyogs bcugs la byed pa// sangs rgyas 'od dang spun gyur na// sdong po tshig bzhin
378b4(dkon brtsegs): snang mi 'gyur/ / sim chen po de yi 'od// ljon shing lo ma mi thal zhing // ri dang klung dang brag rnams la// thams cad du ni thogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od
378b5(dkon brtsegs): zer ni/ / r-i rab dang ni lcags ri ding // rdo rje ri ni thams cad la// thal bar 'gro zhing thogs pa med// 'od zer rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs dang // gzi byin dag ni tshad med pas//
378b6(dkon brtsegs): yid ches med pa ma gtogs par// mthong ba su zhig sems mi skyed// sems can de 'dra'i 'od zer dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu chen thob 'gyur na// bdag cag kyang ni thob 'gyur
378b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes/ / phal cher bla med sems kyang bskyed// de tshe bcom ldan 'dzum mdzad nas// kun dga' bos ni 'di skad gsol// gang slad bcom ldan 'dzum pa mdzad//
379a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs med mkhyen pas bkas bshad gsol// bcom ldan kun dga' bka' stsal pa// sems can rnams kyi deng nga yi// rdzu 'phrul mthu ldan mthong bas na/
379a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed sangs rgyas grub par smon// 'khor 'dir srog chags sum khri yis// chos 'di bsrung bar dam yang bcas// bdag cag sangs rgyas 'das 'og tu// mdo sde 'di ni gdon bya sems//
379a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag nga ni 'das pa'i 'og/ mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas// bar dang tha mi'i dus kyi tshe// ji skad bstan bzhin bsgrub par 'gyur// byang chub sems bskyed shin tu dka'//
379a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos mos pa yang dka'// tha ma'i dus tshe mdo sde 'di// 'dzin cing 'don pa de bas dka'// bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du// sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon// ma 'ongs tha ma
379a5(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe/ / mdo sde 'di bshad de bas dkon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo ngas khyod la mdo sde 'di yongs
379a6(dkon brtsegs): su gtad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling na ji srid du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gnas par 'gyur bas so// kun
379a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo 'di nub par gyur pa'i phyir/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur ro// ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs
379b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'ang nub par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo deng khyod kyis mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par bya'o// ji ltar na nyan thos
379b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par 'gyur zhe na/ khyod kyis 'di snyam du me tog dang / spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug spos dang / gdugs dang
379b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / na bza' dang / rol mo'i sil snyan mchog dam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsngags pa brjod pa ni mchod pa mchog dam pa yin no snyam du
379b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam par mi bya ste/ kun dga' bo de lta bu de dag ni mchod pa mchog dam pa zhes mi bya'i/ gang gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu thos nas/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa
379b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byas
379b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / bla mar byas pa dang / bsngags pa brjod par byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang chos la mchod
379b7(dkon brtsegs): cing rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mdzad kyi/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams la ni btsun par mi mdzad pas so// de lta bas na kun dga' bo deng mdo sde 'di nan tan
380a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis khyod la yongs su gtad pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ngas kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas/ deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
380a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba yin no// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
380a3(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor to// ma byon pa'i
380a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor
380a5(dkon brtsegs): lo rab tu yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs
380a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ deng chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su skor bar mdzad pa yin pas/ de'i phyir kun dga' bo
380a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ / ngas yul wA rA NA si ri dgas rgyu ba'i tshal du'ang nyan thos rnams la 'dis
380b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor to/ / kun dga' bo ngas deng 'od ma'i tshal 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'di yongs su bskor nas sems can thams
380b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi the tshom yongs su bcad do/ / kun dga' bo 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang nam mkha'i sa mtshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par gsung
380b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i sa mtshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par gsung par 'gyur ro// ngas deng bla na med pa yang
380b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang nam mkha' sa mtshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par bshad pas/ de'i phyir sa
380b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhi 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod rten chen po lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa bya ba'i gnas su gyur par rig par bya'o/ / kun dga' bo sa gzhi 'di
380b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dir mdo sde zab mo 'di yang dag par gsungs pa dang ldan pas/ kun
380b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'di ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'od ma'i tshal 'dir zhugs par gyur na/ 'dod chags dang
381a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug slong bar mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug lag khang gzhan na'ang bzhugs par gyur mod kyi/ de dag gang la'ang
381a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i yon tan med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ka lan ta ka 'od ma'i tshal 'dir dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag zhugs par gyur na ni 'dod chags skye bar mi 'gyur la
381a3(dkon brtsegs): bya mang po zhugs par gyur na ni dus ma yin par sgra mi 'byin pas so/ / ji lta zhe na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas dang po rgyal sar zhugs pa'i tshe
381a4(dkon brtsegs): b tsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te skyed mos tshal 'dir zhugs nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byas pa las zhugs ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags kyi rtsed mo bya ba'i bsam pa med par gyur par tsher
381a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to/ / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang so so nas 'dod chags kyi sems kyi rtsed mo bya ba'i bsam pa med par gyur par tshor bar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe rgyal po rab tu dga' bar gyur nas
381a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du 'jig rten na sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bdag gi yul du byung bar gyur nas bdag gis mthong bar gyur cig/ mthong nas kyang sems kyis mngon par yid ches par gyur rtsen
381a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par yid ches par gyur nas kyang mchod pa byed par gyur la/ skyed mos tshal 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dir bzhugs par gyur nas
381b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis chos thos par gyur cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyed mos tshal 'di ni mchod gnas su gyur pa dag gi gnas yin gyi/ 'dod pa lnga dang ma bral ba rnams kyi gnas ni ma yin no//
381b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems pas so// kun dga' bo rgyal po gzugs can snying po skyed mos tshal 'dir zhugs pa na/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i sems bskyed pa'ang 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa
381b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams skyed mos tshal 'dir zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di gsungs pas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal 'di'o yon tan ji snyed yod pa de dag ni gzhan dag dang thun
381b4(dkon brtsegs): mong du ma gyur pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi gus pas phyag byed pa yin no// kun dga' bo skyed mos tshal 'di na sbrul gdug pa dang /
381b5(dkon brtsegs): rnangs pa dang / spang ma dang / sbrang bu mchu rings la sogs pa med do// gal te gnas par gyur na'ang gdug pa'i sems med do// 'di'ang 'od ma'i tshul gyi thun mong ma yin pa
381b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tAn yin te/ gal te lo brgya'i bar du tshal 'di'i yon tan brjod na'ang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi dro gtsang khang 'di ni yon tan
381b7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa snyed dang ldan gyi/ gzhan ni de lta bu ma yin pas so// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon 'od ma'i
382a1(dkon brtsegs): nal 'di 'du lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par ma 'tshal lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thar bcom ldan 'das kyi sam ring bgyi bar ma mos pa'i sdig pastsu
382a2(dkon brtsegs): 'as bdeng bdag bshags par 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dang po chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur pa ni nyid kyi che/
382a3(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa de dag byung bar gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// bam po lnga pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa o'u 'gal kyi su chen mo 'du snyas
382a4(dkon brtsegs): du/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'di ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpar spyod pa rnams legs par bstan par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu ngo mtshar che bayin no//
382a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci 'byor zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs par spru cing // kye 'gag med pa'i don sems can gyis khong du chud par byed pas so snyam mo// de nas bcom
382a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyis bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal de de bzhin
382a7(dkon brtsegs): no/ / de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa yin no// gal te nga'i nyan thos gang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i don thos par gyur na
382b1(dkon brtsegs): sems gyo myo por 'gyur zhing mos par yang mi 'gyur ro/ / mo'u 'gal de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po lta re zhig zhog gi/ ngas gal te sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po ji snyed
382b2(dkon brtsegs): cig dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs pa brjod par gyur na yang / khyod kyi sems myo myo bor 'gyur zhing mos par yang mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
382b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / legs so bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ thugs rje chen po las phyogs cung zad tsam zhig bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan
382b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / khyod la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po las
382b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs cung zad cig dpes bstan par bya'o/ / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na snying rje chen po ji snyed cig spyad pa brjod kyis mi long mod kyi/ snying rje chen po de ni dngos
382b6(dkon brtsegs): bopo rnam pa bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du snying rje chen po la gnas pa de tsam du sangs rgyas
382b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ / mo'u 'gal nga ni sngon sems can rnams la 'di lta bu'i snying rje chen po dang ldan// 'di lta bu'i smon
383a1(dkon brtsegs): lam chen po dang ldan pas sems can ji snyed cig sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na sdug bsngal rnams myong bar gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po thig
383a2(dkon brtsegs): nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / yang sos dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dag na sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa dag 'a'ang / ngas rtag tu
383a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi ched du sems can dmyal ba chen po na sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa dag sdig pa'i las ma byang ba de srid du sdug bsngal rnams myong bar gyur kyang / sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur
383a4(dkon brtsegs): to/ / mo'u 'gal gal te sems can gyi don du gyur pa'i rgyu dang rkyen zhig yod par gyur na/ ngas de dag thams cad dang du blangs nas sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po las thar par byas
383a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ nga nyid sdug bsngal dang du len par byed pas/ sems can gcig gi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang sems can rnams kyi sgrib pa'i las mthar thug pa'i bar du dang du blangs kyang de'i tshe nga'i
383a6(dkon brtsegs): sems la 'gyod pa ci'ang med do/ / mo'u 'galangs ni 'di lta bu'i smon lam dang / brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas blo dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang de'i nyan thos dag la 'di ltar rigs
383a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul 'dri ba'i rgyu dang rkyen yod par gyur na/ sdug bsngal dang du blangs nas sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba las thar bar byed pas/ mo'u 'gal mkhas pa dag gis thos par
383b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ nga'i mang du thos pa'i bsngags pa brjod de/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sbyin pa gtong bar byed/ tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom
383b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed do// mo'u 'gal ngas de lta bu thos nas/ brtson 'grus chen po bskyed de/ chos yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ lhag
383b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa chen po thob par bya ba'i ched du brtson 'grus brtsams so/ / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i ched du
383b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa yongs su bsgoms so/ / mo'u 'galangs sngon ji ltar bzod pa yongs su bsgoms she na/ sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed de phyogs
383b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na yod pa'i sems can ji snyed pa gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med
383b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes min yang rung ste/ sems can de dag thams cad ma lus par mi'i lus thob par gyur nas thams cad bdag gi drung du 'ongs te 'di skad du/ kye khyod ni bla na med pa yang
383b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yin la/ bdag cag ni 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis mang du 'phongs pa yin te/ khyod gal te bdag
384a1(dkon brtsegs): cag la sbyin par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro// zhes sems can de dag gis de'i tshe tshig badrang pos rgyud bkagasam//
384a2(dkon brtsegs): mi bden pas skyon smos sam/ yid dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ral gri dang / dbyig pa dang / gyo mo dag gis bdag gi lus la gnod pa byas kyang / bdag de'i tshe zhe sdang dang 'gyod pa mi skyed par bdag
384a3(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di ltar sems rab tu gdul bar bya'o/ / sems can 'di dag ni glen zhing gti mug pa dang / shes pa med pas gti mug las byed pa yin na/ gal te bdag gis kyang sems can glen zhing
384a4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug mug pa 'di dag la zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa bskyed par gyur na/ 'o na ni bdag 'di dag dang tha dad pa'ang ci yod/ 'di dag ni lam du ma zhugs pa yin la/ bdag ni dge
384a5(dkon brtsegs): baba'i lam du zhugs pa yin pas/ deng bdag gis sems can 'di dag las sdug bsngal dang du blangs te/ zhe sdang gi bsam pa mi skyed par/ sa chen po bzhin du bzang po dang ngan pa
384a6(dkon brtsegs): shong bar bya'o snyam nas/ mo'u 'gal ngas sngon bzod pa 'di lta bu yongs su bsgoms so// gzhan yang mo'u 'gal ngas ni yun ring po nas rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu
384a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa bzhin du bltas so/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na khyim bdag shin tu phyug cing nor mang ba/ rin po che rab tu mang ba/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang ldan
384b1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig yod la/ des brtul zhugs rnam pa brgyad spyad de/ bu gcig pa rnyed par gyur pa nas/ sems la sdug cing blta bas mi ngoms par gyur na/ mo'u 'gal khyim bdag de ni rtag par bu de'i legs pa'i
384b2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'chol bar byed de/ rtag par legs pa'i dngos po sbyin par byed/ rtag par phan pa sbyin par byed kyi/ gnod pa dang phan pa ma yin pa sbyin par mi byed do// de bzhin du mo'u 'gal
384b3(dkon brtsegs): nga'ang yun ring po nas rtag par sems can rnams la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta bar byed pas/ ngas yun ring po nas rtag par sems can rnams la legs pa'i dngos po yongs su btsal
384b4(dkon brtsegs): nas phan 'dogs par byed kyi/ gnod pa dang phan pa ma yin pa sbyin par mi byed do// mo'u 'gal ngas ni yun ring po nas lam nor ba'i sems can rnams dang / lam log par zhugs
384b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan nas yang dag pa'i lam la yang dag par rab tu bkod do/ / mo'u 'gal rgyu dang rkyen des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas sems
384b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas bu gcig pa brtse zhing 'phangs pa la blta ba bzhin du gzigs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / mo'u 'gal sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ tshong pa phal po che zhig
384b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo lam du zhugs te song ba las/ lam stor nas la mgol bar zhugs pa dang / mtshan mo mun nag tu gyur pa'i phyir gar 'gro bar ma shes nas thams cad kyis 'di skad du bdag
385a1(dkon brtsegs): @cag ni la ma sbyor te/ mgon byed pa'ang med/ skyabs byed pa'ang med/ gnas byed pa'ang med na/ sems can rnams las su nig lba'am/ grwa'am/ gnod sbyin
385a2(dkon brtsegs): nam/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa gang zhig gis bdag cag lam bstan nas lam ma nor ba thob par 'gyur/ su zhig bdag cag la snying brtsebs phan 'dogs shing mtshan mo mun nag lam gol
385a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing nyamang bar zhugs pa 'dir snang ba sbyin par 'gyur zhes smras so/ / mo'u 'gal de'i tshe dkon pa'i nags tshal zhig na mu stegs can gyi drang srong gcig rtswa'i spyil lo'i nang na 'dus
385a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las/ mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na rlong pa mang po rnams snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa'i sgra thos nas/ de 'di snyam du deng tshong pa mang po rnams mtshan mo mun nag tu gyur pas dgon pa'i gnas nags
385a5(dkon brtsegs): tshal 'dir lam stor bar gyur te/ gal te bdag gis skyabs ma byas na tshul yang ma yin la/ tshong pa mang po rnams kyang stag gam/ seng ge 'am/ spyang ki 'am/ glang po che'am/ wa 'am/
385a6(dkon brtsegs): gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis gtses shing srog 'phrog par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ mo'u 'gal de'i tshe drang srong des sgra chen po phyung ste/ tshong pa rnams la smras pa/ kye tshong pa rnams khyed ma
385a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shig/ deng bdag gis khyed kyi skyabs bya zhing snang bas khyed la lam yang dag par bstan par bya'o// zhes de'i tshe drang srong des tshong pa rnams tshig gis spro ba bskyed de/ ras kyis
385b1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa gnyis dkris nas/ 'bru mar gyis kun tu khyab par blugs te/ me spar nas sgron me byas te/ tsheng pa rnams la lam bstan to// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe tshong pa rnams so so nas 'di
385b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du drang srong 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar che ba yin te/ bdag cag gi phyir lus dang srog la'ang 'phangs pa med par gyur to snyam mo// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe drang srong des lag pa bsregs pa'i snad
385b3(dkon brtsegs): bas tshong pa rnams la lam bstan nas kyang sems can la snying rje cher skyes par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du na mang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
385b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba byas nas yang dag pa'i lam ston par gyur cig snyam mo// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe de'i dus na lag pa gnyis bsregs
385b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur kyang lus dang sems la 'gyod par gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi don yongs su gnyer
385b6(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ lus dang srog la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pas so// bsam pa rnam par dag pas sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis de'i lag pa'ang snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur cing
385b7(dkon brtsegs): rma'ang med par gyur to/ / tshong pa rnams kyang lam rnyed par gyur te/ nam langs nas drang srong gi lag pa gnyis la rma'ang med par mthong ba dang / ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa bskyed nas
386a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du drang srong 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang ldan pas mtshan thog thag lag pa gnyis sbar nas bdag cag gi snang ba byas te/ lam yang dag par bstan kyang
386a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i lag pa la tshig pa cung zad kyang med pas/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni spyod pa chen po grub cing yon tan chen po dang ldan pa yin no snyam nas/ mo'u 'gal de'i tshe tshong pa rnams kyis
386a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / drang srong khyod kyis mchog tu dka' ba'i dka' ba spyad par gyur pa ni shin tu legs so// deng spyod pa 'das dngos po gang zhig thob par smon
386a4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ / drang srong gis smras pa/ kye tshong pa rnams bdag ni dngos po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas khyed la sogs pa khor ba'i sdug bsngal las
386a5(dkon brtsegs): bzlas te/ lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan par smon to// de'i tshe tshong pa rnams sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis
386a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du bdag cag gis dngos po ji lta bu zhig gis drang srong 'di la lan blan par bya zhes smras pa dang / drang srong gis smras pa/ khyed rnams rtse gcig tu dge ba'i chos spyod
386a7(dkon brtsegs): la bag med par ma byed cig/ tsheng pa rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ tshong pa rnams rab tu dga' zhing gus pas phyag byas te/ de nas
386b1(dkon brtsegs): gyes par gyur to/ / mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i tshe dus na mu stegs can gyi drang srong tshong ba rnams kyi ched du lag pa sbyar nas/ lam snang bar byas pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi
386b2(dkon brtsegs): blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong pa rnams ni da ltar gyi dge slong spyong nyis brgya lnga bcu po 'di deganyid yin no// mo'u 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas
386b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin pa dang / lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang / mig med pa'i sem
386b4(dkon brtsegs): can dag yongs su dag pa'i mig thob par byas pa dang / nad tshabs che ba'i sems can rnams gsos nas sos par byas pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas sems can rnams
386b5(dkon brtsegs): la thugs rje chen po rab tu mnga' ba yin par rig par bya'o/ / gzhan yang mo'u 'gal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nad kyi bskal pa chen po byung bas sems can
386b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams nad kyis nyon mongs par gyur to/ / de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dbang phyug gi sde zhes bya ba grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed cing mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung
386b7(dkon brtsegs): pabar gyur to/ / de'i tshe rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de'i lus kyi yan lag gam/ lag pas sems rnams la reg pa tsam gyis nad thams
387a1(dkon brtsegs): cad sos par gyur to/ / zla ba tshang nas bu khye'u zhig btsas pa dang / btsas ma thag tu 'di skad du bdag ni nad pa rnams gso bar nus so zhes smras so// gzhan
387a2(dkon brtsegs): y ang bcas pa'i tshe 'jam bu'i klong gi lba 'dri rnams kyis mthun par 'di skad du deng rtsal ba'i du bcas pa 'din mo'i sprin len no zhes smras pas de skad ces smras pa'i sla kun tu
387a3(dkon brtsegs): grags pa'i phyir ming yang mi'i sman zhes btags so/ / de'i tshe mi rnams kyang gang nad kyis btab pa rnams khrid nas rgyal bu de la bstan pa dang / nad pa gang rgyal bu'i drung du/
387a4(dkon brtsegs): byin pa de dag rgyal bu'i lag pas reg par gyur tam/ lus kyis reg par gyur kyang rung ste/ thams cad nad sos nas bde ba thob par gyur to// de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i
387a5(dkon brtsegs): gling ga na sa pa kun gyis nad pa khrid nas rgyal bu la bstan pa dang / rgyal bu'i lag pas reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos nas mchog tu bde ba thob par gyur to// mo'u 'gal
387a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu mi'i sman gyis lo stong gi bar du de ltar nad gsos nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ / 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu nad pa rnams der 'ongs nas 'tsho ba'i des byas pa thos
387a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags bton te ngus nas su zhig bdag cag na ba'i sdug bsngag las thar par byed ces smras so// nad kyis btab pa rnams rgyal po ma'i sman gang du bsregs pa
387b1(dkon brtsegs): rmas nas/ gang du bsregs pa shes par gyur pa dang / bsregs pa'i gnas der rus bablangs te phye mar btags nas lus la bskus pa dang / thams cad nad sos par gyur nas
387b2(dkon brtsegs): skad du rgyal bu mi'i sman gyis da dung yang na ba rnams gso bar nus so zhes smras so/ / mo'u 'gal de ltar nad pa rnams gsos pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis rus pa rnams kyang mthar gyis zad par
387b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ / rus pa rnams zad pa'i 'og tu bsregs pa'i gnas der song nas sa dang / thal ba dang / sol ba rnams blangs te mo so nas lus la bsdus pa dang nad thams cad sos
387b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / mo'u 'gal de ltar rgyal bu mi'i sman gyis nad kyi bskal pa chen po byung ba na thabs mkhas pas nad kyis btab pa rnams gsos pa yin no// mo'u bgal khyod
387b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu mi'i sman ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin te/ ngas nad kyis sdug bsngal mang ba'i sems
387b6(dkon brtsegs): can mgon med pa skyabs med pa dag gi nad gsos so/ / ngas deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang shes rab chen po'i sman gyis
387b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams gsos nas sdug bsngal las thar par byas so/ / mo'u 'gal nga ni sems can dag gi ched du lus gang blangs pas phan 'dogs par gyur pa de bzhin len cing phan 'dod/
388a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pas/ mo'o 'gal rgyu dang rkyen des na ched du sems can gyi phyir lus blangs nas phan 'dogs pa yin par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang moru
388a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ nga gcig pu grogs med par song ba las gcan gzan ma rungs pa gcig 'ongs te nga'i srog bcad nas/ nga'i sha bza' bar 'dod pa las/
388a3(dkon brtsegs): nga 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe sems bskyed nas 'di skad du ba dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu dgon pa'i nags tshal 'dir dud 'gro lus po che zhig tu skyes nas gcan gzan ma rungs pa gang
388a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi srog gcad pa de dag 'grangs shing tshim par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa de dag ni rtag par srog chags phra mo
388a5(dkon brtsegs): gsod cing sha za bar byed pas srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba mang du bskyed kyang 'grangs shing tshim par mi 'gyur bas/ ngas 'di snyed du bdag 'dir dud 'gro lus po cher skyes nas sha za zhing
388a6(dkon brtsegs): khrag 'thung ba'i sems can rnams 'grangs shing tshim par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na/ 'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag tu der dud 'gro lus po cher rdzus te skyes nas
388a7(dkon brtsegs): gcan gzan ma rungs pa sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba rnams 'grangs shing tshim par byas pa yin no/ / de bzhin du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed du ched du lus blangs nas sems can rnams
388b1(dkon brtsegs): la phan pa byas te/ mo'u 'gal ngas gal te bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa las lhag par sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can bkres shing skom pa rnams
388b2(dkon brtsegs): la rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa dang brjod na'ang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ / mo'u 'gal de lhur na ngas sngon sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje'i sems rab tu bskyed
388b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ / gzhan yang mo'u 'galangs mngon par dran/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi ngas sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa mthong ba dang / 'di
388b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bdag gis spangs te yongs su mi bskyab pa'i mi rigs so snyam du bsams nas/ de dag gi thad du song nas 'di skad du/ kye khyed la sdug bsngal ji lta bu zhig yod/ ci zhig 'dod/
388b5(dkon brtsegs): ces dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ deng bdag cag ni shin tu bkres shing sgom mo// ngas de skad smras pa thos nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed bza' ba dang btung ba ji lta bu
388b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'dod/ / de dag gis nga la bdag cag ni sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba yin pas/ gal te lus kyi sha dang khrag bdag cag la byin na ni bdag gdod pa de zhing nad med par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /
388b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas de dag la de bzhin du gnang nas/ rang nyid kyi sha ba cad khrag phyung nas sems can de dag la byin yang / mo'u 'gal de'i tshe nga'i sems la 'gyod pa med cing 'phangs pa'ang med
389a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan yang med/ bying ba'ang med kyi 'di snyam du deng bdag gis lus kyi sha ji tsam du bcad pa de tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phyogs kyang de tsam zhig 'gag par
389a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ ngas yun ring por rtag par de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba la mos par gyur to// de ltar sbyin pa btang yang rab tu dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur pa yin te/
389a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab tu mang ba yin par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon
389a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba yon tan gyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsags pa zhig byung ngo / / de'i tshe rgyal po stobs po che 'di snyam du deng bdag gis ci'i phyir mchod
389a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin chen po bshams nas sems can rnams tshim par mi byed snyam mo/ / de snyam du bsams nas mchod sbyin chen po bshams te/ bza' ba 'dod pa la bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa la
389a6(dkon brtsegs): btung ba/ kos dang / mal cha dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che'i dngos po dang / shing rta dang / bzhon pa dang / nor dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / she dang
389a7(dkon brtsegs): bai nurma dang / byu ru dang / man shel la sogs pa'i rin po che dang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
389b1(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / bu mo dang / bram po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / lug dang / zhing gi dngos po 'dod pa dag 'a'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' mgur
389b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar nas thams cad yongs su btang ngo / / mo'u 'gal rgyal po stobs po ches de ltar sbyin pa rgya cher btang ba dang / de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'di snyam du bdag gis ci'i phyir rgyal po 'di
389b3(dkon brtsegs): 'a bar chad byas te 'bras bu mo thob par bya snyam du bsams nas/ de nas bram ze zhig tu sprul te/ rgyal po de ga la ba der song nas/ rgyal po de la 'di skad ces dris so// kye mchod
389b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin chen po'i 'dus pa 'dir dngos po ji lta bu zhig yongs su gtong / / rgyal pos smras pa/ bram ze bdag la nor ci bdog pa thams can yongs su btang bas 'phangs pa ci'ang med do//
389b5(dkon brtsegs): bram zes smras pa/ khyod kyi yid ma de lta bu yin na deng bdag gis slong ba gang yin pa de sbyin par nus sam/ rgyal po stobs po ches smras pa/ bdag gis ci bdog pa thams cad zad par gtong
389b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes ma smrasas sa/ bram ze smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te de lta na reng bdag ni rgyal po'i lus kyi yan lag 'dod do// rgyal pos bsams pa/ bram ze 'di ni nor zas 'dod pa ma yin gyi/ deng 'dir
389b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs nas bdag gi mchod sprin chen po gzhig par 'dod pa yin te/ / gal te bdag gi lus kyi yan lag ma byin na ni/ bdag nyid kyis rang gi mchod sbyin chen po bshig par 'gyur ro snyam du
390a1(dkon brtsegs): bsams nas/ bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod la lus kyi yan lag sbyin gyis chod la khyer cig/ bram zes smras pa/ rgyal chen po dang de skad smras pa 'dil 'arjod par
390a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa lta med dam/ rgyal po stobs po ches smras pa/ bdag gi sems la 'gyod pa med de/ deng slong ba mang po phyogs bzhi nas 'dus te 'ongs na'ang bdag gis thams cad tshim par bya'o snyam mo//
390a3(dkon brtsegs): bram zes smras pa/ deng bdag gcig pu tshim par bya ba'ang dga' na gzhan mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas rgyal po stobs po rjes mtshon rnon pos rang gi lag pa bcad nas/ bram ze la
390a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis lag pa 'di gcig khyer cig ces smras so/ / mo'u 'gal rgyal po stobs po ches rang gi lag pa bcad pa'i tshe sems la gyur cing 'gyod pa med par gyur te/ de ltar sems rtse gcig tu sbyin
390a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su btang ba'i phyir dang / thams cad yongs su btang ba'i phyir lag pa'ang snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po stobs po ches mtshon gyis lus kyi yan lag bcad nas bram ze
390a6(dkon brtsegs): la byin yang slar skyes par gyur to/ / mo'u 'gal de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang rgyu dang rkyen des na lha'i bsod nams zad nas sems yongs su gdung zhing sdug bsngal bas 'o dod chen po bos
390a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ lus de nyid kyis mngon du sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par lhung bar gyur to// mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po stobs po ches lus yongs su btang ba de gzhan zhidi
390b1(dkon brtsegs): min snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta / / de ning nyid min no// de'i tshe de'i dus nubargya byin lnga'i dbang po mchod sbyin chen po'i bar chang bya bar 'dod pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar
390b2(dkon brtsegs): blta ste/ de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no// mo'u 'gal de'i 'tshe'ang lnga sbyin blun po phrag dog dang zhe sdang gi bsam pas nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad bya bar 'dod pa las gzhig par ma nus te/ ma
390b3(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur to/ / ngas dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi mchod sbyin bshams pa na'ang lha sbyin blun pong dung
390b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang phrag dog gi bsam pas rnyed pa la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir 'khor mang po kha bsdus nas nga la gsod par 'dod pa yin no/ / nga sngon bya rgong phung po'i ra'i shod du 'chag
390b5(dkon brtsegs): pa las lha sbyin bdag nyid ri'i steng du 'dzegs nas 'khrul 'khor gyi rdo 'a'angs te bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bshig nas ngal ngan sems bskyed pas/ bdag nyid kyi rnyeng pa dang 'byor
390b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthu nyams par byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung ba yin no/ / mo'u 'galangs ni lha sbyin blun po la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis
390b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byas pa med kyang yun ring po nas nga la dazar 'du shes so/ / tshe rabs thams cad du ngas dge ba'i chos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bar chad bya bar brtsams kyang / dge ba spyod pa'i
391a1(dkon brtsegs): bar chad bya bar ma nus so/ / ngas ni yun ring po nas rtag par byams pa dang snying rjes ngan btags kyang / nga la nyes pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed do// mo ru 'gal
391a2(dkon brtsegs): lha sbyin ni tshe rabs thams cad du ngas byas pa'i drin mi gzo bas/ ngas deng lha sbyin dang 'dra ba dag la'ang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na drin mi shes
391a3(dkon brtsegs): par bstan te/ de lta bu'i skye bo de dag ni log pa nyid du nges pa'i gnas su zhugs pa yin no// mo'u 'gal lha sbyin phyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar
391a4(dkon brtsegs): med par 'jug pa'i tshe/ gdod pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po skyes par gyur te/ 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu yin no// lha sbyin pa'i drin mi shes pa'i
391a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu gyur pas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par 'jug tu nye ba'i tshe/ sgra chen po 'di skad du lha sbyin blun po khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhe sdang gi sems
391a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / gsad par bya ba ma yin pa la nan gyis gsod sems bskyed pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis deng sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung ba yin no//
391a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bsgo ba thos pas shin tu skrag nas gdod dul bar gyur te/ 'di skad du deng bdag sha dang rus pa gtubs te sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi
391b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras pas/ sems bde ba thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par yid ches pa bskyed nas sgra chen po phyung ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar
391b2(dkon brtsegs): med par zhugs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na/ phyis sems can dmyal ba chen po las thar nas mir skyes te/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas lam yang dag par bsgoms
391b3(dkon brtsegs): pas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ ming yang rus pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal bas deng lha sbyin la rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung
391b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa nyid kyis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bzlas pa yin no/ / mo'u 'gal ngas lha sbyin yongs su bzlas pa ni nga'i sngon gyi smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa yin no//
391b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyin zhe na/ ngas tshe rabs snga ma la lha sbyin yongs su bzla bar dam bcas pas/ ngas khyod yongs su bzla bar bya'i/ gzhan gyis bzla bar bya ba med do zhes smras
391b6(dkon brtsegs): bas so/ / mo'u 'gal lha sbyin ning 'ba' zhig las mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dang rkyen bskyed pa yin gyi/ gzhan las bskyed pa ma yin pas/ lha sbyin ni deng phyin chad kyang
391b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan las dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par mi byed kyi/ nga 'ba' zhig la yongs su dang ba'i sems skyed par byed do// sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// zhes smras pa'i dge
392a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis na byis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par 'gyur ba yin no/ / mo'u 'galang ni yun ring po nas rtag par sems can rnams la pha ma
392a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i 'du shes kyis gang mgon med cing skyabs med pa rgud cing nor dang mi ldan pa/ / 'khor bar yang dang yang kha brgyud cing lam ngan par zhugs pa/ glen zhing gti mug pas
392a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa med pa rtag par dmus long du gyur cing mig dang mi ldan pa dag su zhig bdag cag gi 'dren par 'gyur/ su zhig mgon dang skyabs byed par 'gyur snyam du sems pa dag lang gcig
392a4(dkon brtsegs): bus snying brtse ba'i bas mgon dang skyabs bya bar dam bcas pas na/ mo'u 'gal ngas de rjes su dran pa'i phyir sems can gang la la zhig ngag rtsub mos nga la kha mi snyan pa brjod
392a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ngas slar lan mi byed do/ / tshig na bsang la smos kyang ngas slar lan mi byed do// khros sam brdegs kyang rung ste/ nams kyang ngas lan mi byed do// de rtsi'i
392a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ nga ni rtag par sems can thams cad la nges pa'i bde ba sbyin zhing sdug bsngal gyi mi bde ba thams cad yongs su bsal bar bya ba'i rigs kyi/ ngas de dag la gnod
392a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams sbyin pa mi rigs pas so/ / sems can rnams las su zhig bzod par nus pa yin zhe na/ de ni nga gcig pu kho nas bzod par nus pa yin pas/ ngas deng sems can
392b1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i chos dang / shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i chos dang / rab tu dul ba'i chos bslabs nas/ glang po che cang shes lta bur dul bar bya'i// glang po che ma dul ba lta bur mi bya'o snyam du
392b2(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ mo'u 'gal 'di lta ste/ dper na glang po che shin tu dul ba ni g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i tshe/ sems la nur ba med cing rnga bo che'i sgra dang / dung gi sgra dang / rab tu
392b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bod pa'i sgra dag bzod pas/ 'di lta bu'i 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra dag thos par gyur na skrag cing 'jigs pa med la/ zang ba dang / tsha ba dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sha sbrang
392b4(dkon brtsegs): gradug pa za ba dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dag kyang bzod par nus/ ral gri shin tu rnon po sna tshogs btab pa dang / mda' dang / mdung dang
392b5(dkon brtsegs): mdung thung dang / lcags kyi 'khor lo 'phangs pa dang / lcug gis gzhus pa dag kyang bzod cing skrag pa dang 'jigs pa med par thad kar g.yul ngor mchong zhing nur ba dang 'gong ba
392b6(dkon brtsegs): med pas/ mo'u 'gal glang po che shin tu dul ba ni 'di snyam du bdag dgra'i g.yul du 'jug par mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi/ bdag dgra'i g.yul 'di las rgyal bar bya'o snyam
392b7(dkon brtsegs): du sems pa kho nar zad do/ / mo'u 'gal de bzhin du nga'ang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems kyis smon lam rgya chen po btab nas/ sems can rnams
393a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dul bar byed pas/ gal te sems can rnams kyi ngag rtsub pos nga la mi snyan pa brjod na'ang ngas lan du gnod pa mi byed do// nga dang rtsod par byed na'ang
393a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas lan mi byed do/ / gal te mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa dang / gyo mo dang / rdo dag gi nga la gnod pa byas nas nga'i srog 'brog par byed na'ang / nga de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par
393a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nur bar gyur pa'ang med la/ 'di ni dang du blang ba'i rigs so// 'di ni dang du blang ba'i mi rigs so// 'di ni bsten par bya ba'i rigs so// 'di ni
393a4(dkon brtsegs): bsten par bya ba'i mi rigs so zhes rnam par rtog par yang mi byed pas/ dngos po de la mya ngan dang 'gyod pa'ang med/ khong khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa'ang med// byang chub sems dpa'i lam
393a5(dkon brtsegs): la yongs su skyo ba'ang med pas/ 'di snyam du deng bdag dgra'i g.yul 'dir 'jug par mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi/ bdag gis sdig pa'i dgra'i g.yul yang dag par bcom ste
393a6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas nas/ khams gsum gyi sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su bzla bar bya'o snyam du sems pa kho nar zad do// mo'u
393a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ga'ang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa ji snyed spyad pa dang / sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje ji snyed bskyed pa gal te tshig gis brjod par gyur
393b1(dkon brtsegs): na nams kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ mu stegs can gyi drang srong bzod pa'i stobs zhes bya ba zhig
393b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ des bdag gis sems can la zhe sdang mi skyed do snyam pa'i chos yang dag par blangs so// de'i tshe sdig pa'i yid ces bya ba'i 'dud cig yod de/ de 'dra
393b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bdag deng ci'i phyir drang srong de'i drung du song nas bzod pa'i chos bshig ste/ / khong khro ba bskyed nas bzod pa dang du len pa'i bsam pa las ldog par bya snyam du bsams
393b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de nas spro ba la mkhas pa'i mi stong bkye nas/ de yongs su bskor te ngag rtsub pos smyos nas mi bden par skyon nas smos/ 'byung bar mi 'os pa'i rlig ngan pa na
393b5(dkon brtsegs): pab sna tshogs kyis spyos te/ 'gro ba'i tshe'ang tshig gis smyos// grong khyer du phyin pa'i tshe'ang spyos/ grong khyer du 'jug pa'i tshe'ang spros/ zan za ba'i tshe'ang spyos/ zan
