393b6(dkon brtsegs): zos zin pa'i 'og tu'ang smos/ stan las langs pa'i tshe'ang spyos/ grong khyer nas 'byung ba'i tshe'ang spyos/ rang gi gnas nags tshal dag tu phyin pa'i tshe'ang spros/ 'greng
393b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe'ang spyos/ 'dug pa'i tshe'ang spyos/ nyal ba'i tshe'ang spyos// 'chag pa'i tshe'ang spyos/ than dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba'i tshe'ang spyos te/ rtag par rjes su 'brangs
394a1(dkon brtsegs): nas tshig ngan sna tshogs kyis rgyun chad pa med par spyos so/ / de'i tshe mi stong po de dag bdud kyis bsngags pas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du ngag rtsub pos drang srong bzod pa'i/
394a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs la spyos so// de nas bdud sdig pa'i yid kyis drang srong bzod pa'i stobs grong khyer du 'jug pa'i tshe bdag nyid kyi gcin gyis de'i mgo'i steng du blugs/ lhung bzed kyi nang du blugs
394a3(dkon brtsegs): chos gos dang lhung bzed la'ang bskus/ lus la'ang bskus/ phyag dar gyis kyang mgo la'ang gtor to// de'i tshe drang srong bzod pa'i stobs lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du skyo ba la
394a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba'i mi stong gis ngag rtsub pos spyos shing smad par gyur kyang / de'i sems la zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa'ang med la/ tha na sems la nur zhing zhum par gyur pa'ang med do// bdag nyid
394a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di skad du bdag gis nyes pa ci byas zhes kyang mi zer la/ khon du 'dzin pa'ang med do// lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du snga mig gis bdud sdig pa'i yid la bltas pa'ang
394a6(dkon brtsegs): med la/ bdag la nyes pa ci yod ces smras pa'ang med do// mo'u 'gal spyo ba la dpa' ba'i mi stong po de dag gis drang srong bzod pa'i stobs la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong las 'das pa'i bar
394a7(dkon brtsegs): du spyos kyang gzhig mi nus par rig nas shin tu dang ba'i bsam pa bskyed de/ kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang bshags nas// 'di skad du khyod kyis dngos po 'dis chos ji lta bu zhig yongs su
394b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chol/ bdag cag kyang chos de thob par 'tshal lo zhes smras so// mo'u 'gal spyo ba la dba' ba'i mi stong po de dag drang srong la shin tu dang ba thob pas gus pa'i sems kyis mchod cing
394b2(dkon brtsegs): rim gro byas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// drang srong yang de dag gis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas pa nyams su blangs kyang sems la mngon par zhen cing chags
394b3(dkon brtsegs): bci'ang med par gyur to/ / mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i de'i dus na/ drang srong bzod pa'i stobs zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi
394b4(dkon brtsegs): blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin no// ngas de'i tshe bzod pa'i chos de lta bu yang dag par blangs pas 'dud sdig pa'i yid kyis mi stong bkye ste// rgyun chad pa med par ngag rtsub pos spyos shing
394b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag par nga la smad par gyur kyang nga'i sems la g.yo zhing gyur pa ci'ang med do/ / mo'u 'gal spyo ba la dpa' ba'i skyes bu stong po de dag drang srong bzod pa'i stobs la shin tu dang ba skyes te/
394b6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa bshags nas/ drang srong bzod pa'i stobs kyi rjes su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas de'i tshe ngas yongs su btul nas/ sangs rgyas
394b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa la yang dag par bkod de/ skyes bu stong po de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug phun sum tshogs par spyad pas mthar gyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// thams
395a1(dkon brtsegs): cad lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/ / mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i du'an/ bdud sdig pa'i yid/
395a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis skyes bu stong bkye nas nga la sbyor bcug pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no// bam po drug pa ste tha
395a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'o/ / gzhan yang mo'u 'gal bas mngon par dran te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ngas rang gyi lus sems can rnams la yongs su btang nas
395a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi skye bo rnams kyi bran dang g.yog byas pas/ de'i tshe skye bo mang po de dag giseng las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug ste/ kha cig gis ni bshang gci 'dor du bcug
395a5(dkon brtsegs): go/ / kha tsog gis ni nga lung 'dor du bcug go// kha cig gis ni nga sa 'dor du bcug go// kha cig gis ning rtsa len du btang ngo // kha cig gis ni nga 'bru dang / zho dang
395a6(dkon brtsegs): 'o ma dang / mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi len du btang ngo // ba cig gis ning shing dang / sol ba dang / me dang / chu len du bcug ste/ 'di lta bu la sogs
395a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug kyang / mo'u 'gal nga de'i tshe gang gis bshang gci 'dor du bcug pa de'i rjes su mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa mi dran no// gang gis pa
395b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug spos dang / spos kyi bye ma dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'bras bu len du btang ba las de rdo rjes su ma song ba mi dran
395b2(dkon brtsegs): no/ / mo'u 'gal gang gis legs pa byed du bcug pa'i rjes su ni 'gro bar bya/ legs pa ma yin pa byed du bcug pa'i rjes su ni 'gro bar mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pangs
395b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi dran no/ / mo'u 'gal ngas de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi rjes su ni 'brang bar bya/ bram ze'i rjes su ni 'brang bar mi bya/ bram ze'i rjes su ni 'brang bar bya
395b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal rigs kyi rjes su mi 'brang bar mi bya/ dmangs rigs kyi rjes su ni 'brang bar bya/ gdol pa'i rjes su ni 'brang bar mi bya/ bdol pa'i rjes su ni 'brang bar bya
395b5(dkon brtsegs): dmangs rigs kyi rjes su ni 'brang bar mi bya/ rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs kyi rjes su ni 'brang bar bya/ dmangs rigs dang gdol pa'i rjes su ni 'brang bar mi bya'o snyam du
395b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par yang mi dran la/ gang zag 'di ni rje'o// gang zag 'di ni chung ngo zhes de dag gi khyad par dang / gang zag 'di'o rjes su ni 'brang bar bya// gang zag 'di'i rjes su
395b7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'brang bar mi bya'o snyam du sems pa'ang med kyi/ mo'u 'gal gang gisang sngar bos pa'i rjes su dga' ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba kho nar zad do// mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ nga sngon
396a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa'i tshe/ gang gis chos bzhin gyi bya ba dgang byed du bcug pa las nus bzhin du ma byas pa yod par nam yang madren no// mo'u
396a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gal ngas mngon par dran te nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bya ba'i dngos po dag nges par mthar ma phyin pa'am/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i dge bgang
396a3(dkon brtsegs): yang mthar ma phyin pa yod pa rjes su mi dran no/ / mdor na ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yang lus la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'ang med na/ nor gyi
396a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ longs spyod kyi dngos po dag la/ 'di ni bdag gi longs spyod yin no snyam pa'i 'du
396a5(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed pa med kyang / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis longs spyod dang ldan par gyur par zad pas/ longs spyod kyi dngos po dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ dngos
396a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag no sems can rnams dang thun mong du longs spyad par bya ste/ dngos po 'di la bdag gi skal ba yod pa bzhin du sems can rnams la'ang skal ba yod do snyam du sems so//
396a7(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos dang nye bar gyur kyang / bdag gi longs spyod la bdag kyang skal ba yod/ sems can
396b1(dkon brtsegs): la'ang skal ba yod do snyam du mi sems kyi/ longs spyod 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi yin pas bdag la skal ba ci'ang med do snyam du sems pa kho nar zad do// mo'u 'gal sangs rgyas
396b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos dang nye bar gyur pa rjes su thob par gyur kyang de la mngon par zhen pa'ang med/ yongs su sdud cing len par yang mi byed pas chos rnams yongasu spong ba la mos par byed kyi/ cho
396b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang du len pa la mos par mi byed do/ / stong pa'i chos thams cad la mos par byed kyi/ yod pa'i chos thams cad la mos par mi byed do// nye bar zhi ba'i chos thams cad
396b4(dkon brtsegs): la mos par byed kyi/ chos rnams kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid la mos par mi byed do// gzod ma nas med pa nyid la mos par byed kyi/ gzod ma nas yod pa nyid la mos par mi byed do//
396b5(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// tshe rabs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na rang gi lus me spar nas
396b6(dkon brtsegs): lam lhor ba'i sems can rnams snang bar byas te lam bstan to/ / mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rabs brgya stong
396b7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa snyed du sha za ba'i sems can rnams la rang gi sha bcad nas sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo / / mo'u 'gal bas mngon par dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
397a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i tshe/ / tshe rabs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du khrag 'thung ba'i sems can rnams la lus las khrag phyung ste/ byin pa yongs su btang nas rab tu tshim par byas
397a2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / mo'u 'gal mdor na 'jig rten pa'i nor rdzas sam/ longs spyad par bya ba ci'ang rung ste/ sems can rnams la nam yang 'phangs shing ser sna byas ma myong ste/ thams
397a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang sems can rnams la 'tshe ba med pa/ banod pa med pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis gnang ba/ 'phags pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par gyur pa de ltar ngas yun ring
397a4(dkon brtsegs): bor brtags te sems can rnams la snying rje'i bsam pa rab tu bskyed nas btang ngo / / gzhan yang mo'u 'gal bas mngon par dran te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe tshong
397a5(dkon brtsegs): dpon legs par rnyed pa zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas rin po che len du song ba las bde bar slar log sde/ rang gi yul du phyin nas grong khyer
397a6(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs te khyim gyi sgor phyin pa dang / de'i tshe grong khyer na gnas pa'i tshe/ slong mo pa mang po rnams kyis de yongs su bskor nas/ de'i mdun du 'di skad ces smras so//
397a7(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed pa bde bar byon tam/ sbyin bdag chen po bdag cag slong ba mchis te/ gal te gnang bar gyur na bdag cag bslang bar 'tshal lo// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe
397b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed pas slong mo pa de dag la 'di skad du khyed spongs shig dang / bdag la ci bdog pa 'a'angs pa med par sbyin par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas spong mo pa rnams kyis
397b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed pa la smras pa/ khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po nas rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che rnams bdag cag la byin cig dang / des na bdag cag rab tu bde bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal
397b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas nor bu rin po che gcig la'ang gser srang brgya stong du ma rib bye ba phrag brgyad cu snyed kyi rin po che rnams ma lus par slong mo pa rnams la byin te/ mo'u 'gal
397b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed pa des de ltar nor mang po rnams yongs su btang bar gyur kyang / sems la gyur pa'am/ 'gyod par gyur pa ci'ang med do// de'i tshe legs par rnye
397b5(dkon brtsegs): pas rin po che mang po slong mo pa rnams la yongs su btang nas/ khyim du'ang ma zhugs par slar log ste/ rgya mtshor zhugs nas rin po che len du song ba las// snga ma
397b6(dkon brtsegs): bas phyid 'gyur gyis bzang ba'i rin po che mang po thob par gyur te/ lo brgyad cu 'das nas slar yang rang gi yul du phyin nas grong khyer du 'jug pa las/ de'i tshe nyes pa byas
397b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mad gcig gshed ma pas bzung ste/ bcings nas mi snyan pa'i sgra bsgrags pa'i rnga'ang brdungs/ lam gyi bzhi mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'ang byas nas/ gsad pa'i
398a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas su khrid de gsad par byas pa las/ de'i tshe gsad pa la thug pa de dag gis rgyang nas legs par rnyed pa mthong ba dang 'di skad ces smras so// chong
398a2(dkon brtsegs): dpon bdag cag la mi 'jigs pa byin cig/ bdag cag gsad pa'i nyes pa las skyobs la/ bdag cag la srog byin cig/ khyod ni sbyin bdag chen po skyes bu dam pa
398a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / legs par rnyed pas de skad ces smras pa thos pa dang / gsad pa la thug pa de dag la/ kye khyed la mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing / khyed gsad pa'i nyes pa las
398a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes smras nas/ gshed ma pa de dag gi drung du song nas/ re re la'ang nor bu rin po che gser srang bye ba ri ba re re byin nas/ khyed cag deng bdag
398a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i drung nas slar ma 'ongs kyi bar du skad cig sdod cig ces smras te/ de nas legs par rnyed pa myur zhing rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces smras so//
398a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bdag ni rin po che bzang po dag gis mi 'di dag gi srog 'jal bar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ legs par rnyed pa mi 'di dag gi nyes pa ni gtang du mi rung
398a7(dkon brtsegs): bis btsong du mi rung ngo / / gal te snying zag pa nas nyo bar 'dod na khyod la nor gyi bdog pa thams cad zad par nga la byin la/ bdag nyid kyang shi bar khas len na gdod btang ngo //
398b1(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas de skad smras pa thos pa dang rab tu dka' bar gyur nas/ bdag ni rnyed pa chen po thob pas smon pa rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ mi 'di
398b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gi stabs byas par gyur pa ni bdag gi yid tshim par gyur to zhes/ de nas legs par rnyed pas mi de dag bskyabs te gsad pa'i nyes pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir khyim na nor
398b3(dkon brtsegs): ci bdog pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po nas thob pa'i nor bu rin po che gser dang dngul la sogs pa bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa rnams rgyal po la bul nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po
398b4(dkon brtsegs): mau de dag gdang du gsol/ bdag la nor ci badreg pa nibs par 'dir mchis lags so// rgyal pos nor rnams blangs nas/ gshed ma dag la bsgo ba/ legs par rnyed pa 'di
398b5(dkon brtsegs): khrid la sod cig dang / lha de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes rgyal po'i bka' mnyan nas legs par rnyed par bcings te gsod pa'i gnas su khrid nas/ lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste
398b6(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed pa la mtshon gdab par gzas pa las/ lag pa rengs nas gdab tu ma btub pa dang / skrag cing ngo mtshar du gyur nas legs par rnyed pa srid de rgyal po la dngos po
398b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di zhib tu gsol to/ / mo'u 'gal rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ bdag nyid mtshon thogs te legs par rnyed pa gsang par 'dod pa'i phyir mtshon bteg ste gang ba bar
399a1(dkon brtsegs): gzas pa las/ de'i rje rgyal po de'i lag pa gnyis sa la lung ste/ sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa chen po thob nas gang ngan byung ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so// mo'u 'gal
399a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon legs par rnyed pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems nu de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rnal
399a3(dkon brtsegs): bor gyur pa de ni lha sprin blun po 'di nyid yin no/ / mo'u 'gal de'i tshe de'i dus na'ang lha sbyin gyis pa'i srog 'phrog par byas pa las dbrog par ma nus so// de nga bla na med
399a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshel ba 'i srog 'phrog par byas pa las dbrog par ma nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
399a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang gnod par byed par mi nus na/ lha sbyin blun pos lta smos kyang ci dgos pas
399a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ / lha sbyin ni da ltar yang grogs po ma rungs pa bsdus nas nga la gsod par yang 'dod la/ bdag nyid kyang thabs kyis nga gsod par 'dod pas rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang
399a7(dkon brtsegs): mthu spobs nyams nas gson por lus 'di dang bcas par sems can dmyal ba mnar med par ltung bar gyur to/ / mo'u 'galang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
399b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang la'ang lha sbyin lta bur ban btags pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ lha sbyin ni byas pa drin du mi gze'o// nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
399b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la pha ma lta bur gyur pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o//
399b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mo'u 'gal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ gA sa ri'i rgyal po'i drung na glang po che lnga brgya zhig gnas te// de'i nang na glang po che'i rgyal po bdag por gyur pa
399b4(dkon brtsegs): byang bzhin sdug cing yid du 'ong ba stobs po che shes pa dang ldan pa gcig yod de/ de'i tshe glang po che mang po rnams ri srang nyam nga zhing dog pa lam gcig las med pa zhig tu mtshan mo
399b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur pa rngon pas mthong nas/ mtshan thog thag la ma nyam nga ba der rlabs chen po brkos nas/ 'di snyam du glang po che mang po 'di dag ni 'dir lhung bar 'gyur bas thams cad bdag dbang
399b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bdag gis dga' mgur blang bar bya'o snyam mo// mtshan thog thag rlabs brkos zin nas glang po che mang po rnams btang ste/ lamanyam nga zhing rlabs yod pa'i steng du btang ngo //
399b7(dkon brtsegs): glang po che mang po rnams 'byung bar byas pa las rlabs chen po yod par mthong nas rgal bar ma nus so// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe glang po che'i bdag po des bdag nyid kyi lus rlabs kyi steng du
400a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng du nyal te zam pa byas nas/ glang po che lnga brgyas rgyab kyi steng du brdzis nas/ de las brgal te dong ngo // glang po che mang po bzlas nas bdag nyid kyi
400a2(dkon brtsegs): mthus mchongs pa byas te song ba dang / de'i tshe ri'i lha zhig gis tshigs su bcad de spras pa/ sdig can rlabs zab brkos gyur kyang // de nas glang bdag blo ldan gyis// bdag
400a3(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan gyi sa bzlas pas na/ / don med rlubs zab brkos par gyur// mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ glang po che'i rgyal po dbang po rno zhing mthu chen po dang ldan
400a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ glang po che lnga brgya byung ba de dag ni da ltar gyi dge slong lnga brgya'o
400a5(dkon brtsegs): lha sbyin gyis gzhig par brtsams pa dag yin no/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rngon par gyur pa de dag ni lha sbyin la sogs pa dge slong lnga po 'di lta ste/ khan da dra bya dang / ka ta
400a6(dkon brtsegs): mo ra ka ti sha dang / rgya mtsho byin dang / ko ka li la sogs pa yin no// mo'u 'gal ngas ni yun ring po nas rtag par sems 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams mthong bar gyur na
400a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin no/ / sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong na bde ba byin no// sems can dbul 'phongs pa dag la ni zang zing yongs su btang ngo //
400b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang lam log par zhugs pa dag la ni yang dag pa'i lam bstan to// sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba dag la mi nad kyi sdug bsngal yongs su bsal to// sems can
400b2(dkon brtsegs): gang bkres shing skom pa rnams la ni bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su btang ngo / / sems can gang sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba dag la ni lus kyi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas so// mo'u
400b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gal ba ni smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yang dag par byas pas ngas sems can rnams la khas blangs pa gang yin pa de dag le lo dang snyom las med par byas te/ mo'u 'gal
400b4(dkon brtsegs): n gas sems bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyi bden tshig ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la tha dad par gyur pa
400b5(dkon brtsegs): tsa'ang med de/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin pa de dag le lo dang snyom las kyis bar chad byas par gyur na/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
400b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba zhig nu/ mo'u 'gal nga ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod la// ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras pa yin no// thugs rje chen por
400b7(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste drug pa'o/ / de nas de'i ma 'khor 'dus 'di nyid du dge slong glang po che'i lag ces bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dun par gyur ba stan las langs te/ tharko
401a1(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu gabar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
401a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las dka' ba spyod pa'i dngos po 'di dag thos pas lus kyi sku'ang ldang zhing mchi ma byung bar gyur to/ / deng bdag gi dngos po gcig zhu bar
401a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di skad du ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod la/ ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du
401a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa ya ni no zhes gsungs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ni dang po thugs bskyed pa nas sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam pa zhes pa lags te/ gal te
401a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i thugs dam pa zhes pa lags par gyur na/ da ltar yongs su bzla bar mdzad pa'i sems can dadung ma bas par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs
401a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gal te 'ga' zhig mchis nas/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad du khyed kyi ston pa chen po sngon sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam
401a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhes so zhe na/ sems can da dung ma zad par bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de ci'i phyir zhes rgol ba zhig mchis par gyur na/ de la ji skad du phan
401b1(dkon brtsegs): gdab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong glang po che'i lag la bka' stsal ba// gal te 'ga' zhig de skad du rgol ba zhig yod par gyur na/ de nyid la slar 'di
401b2(dkon brtsegs): skad du dris shig/ khyod kyis chos ji lta bu zhig la sems can yin par 'dod// des gal te 'di skad du phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams gang yin pa de dag la sems
401b3(dkon brtsegs): can yin par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de nyid la slar 'di skad du dris shig/ ci phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams 'dus shing tshogs pa la sems can yin par
401b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod dam/ 'on te bral zhing gyes par gyur pa la sems can yin par 'dod/ des gal te 'di skad du phung po dang // skye mched dang / khams 'dus pa la sems can yin
401b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ khyod bdag nyid kyis lan btab zin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus pa ni sems can yin la/ phung po dang / skye
401b6(dkon brtsegs): mched dang / khams ni sems can ma yin pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gsungs pa'ang bral zhing gyes par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa yin gyi/ tshogs shi'i 'du bar
401b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das ni bral zhing gyes pa'i spyod pa la dgyes pa yin gyi/ 'dus shing tshogs pa la dgyes pa ma yin te/ 'dus shing tshogs pa la sems cas/
402a1(dkon brtsegs): pas so// de gal te 'di skad du phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams nyid sems can yin no zhes zer na// de la slar 'di skad du smros shig/ gal te de ltar
402a2(dkon brtsegs): na rtsa dang / shing dang / gyo mo dang / rdo ba thams cad kyang sems can yin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams nyid sems can
402a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes zer la/ de dag la'ang phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams yod pas so// de gal te 'di skad du de dag la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos kyang
402a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir sems can ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad ces smros shig/ gal te de ltar na sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro//
402a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dag la tha dad par yod par mi gsung bas so// de gal te 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
402a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab las sems can yod par gsungs pas/ de'i phyir sems can yod do zhes zer na// de la 'di skad du smros shig/ khyod nyid kyis lan btab zin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
402a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las yod pa dang med pa las dben pa zhes gsungs pas so// des gal te 'di skad du gal te de ltar na/ 'o na ni lam gyi 'bras bu'ang med
402b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du khyod kyis gang zhig la 'bras bu yin par 'dod ces dris shig/ des gal te 'di skad du bdag ni don dam pa nges par gyur pa gang yin pa
402b2(dkon brtsegs): del 'bras bu yin par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la ni sgra dang tshig med la/ spra dang tshig med pa la ni nges pa yod ce'am/ med ces
402b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod du med pas/ / khyod kyis ni rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la 'bras bu yin par 'dod la/ rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la ni sems can yang med/ sems can rgya
402b4(dkon brtsegs): ming yang med pas/ de'i phyir khyod kyis sems yod do zhes gang smras pa'i tshig de rang nyid kyis bshig pa yin no zhes smros shig/ gzhan yang glang po che'i lag de bzhin
402b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bstan pa las chos rnams 'gag pa med par gsungs pa'ang sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar mdzad pa yin te/ ngas de ltar chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan
402b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid rab tu rtogs pas/ ji ltar thugs su chud pa'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med cing 'byung
402b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no/ / glang po che'i lag gang gis de ltar ngas bstan pa'i chos kyi don shes pa des ci yod pa dang med pa'i ched du las kyi spyod pa slong bar mi byed do//
403a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis yod pa dang med pa'i tshad du las kyi stod pa mi slong ba des ji ltar sems can yod pa dang sems can med par mthong bar 'gyur// glang po che'i lag 'di na ta
403a2(dkon brtsegs): par chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ 'di la ni rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa'ang med/ dri'i'ang med yongs su dag pa'ang med/
403a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ lam yang med/ lam gyi 'bras bu'ang med// ring po'ang med/ thung ngu'ang med/ gru bzhi'ang med/ zlum po'ang med/ dbyings
403a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang med/ kha dog kyang med pas/ de'i phyir chos rnams ni sgo gcig kho na ste/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo zhes bstan pa yin no// glang po che'i lag 'di ni chos kyi sgo mthong
403a5(dkon brtsegs): bab zhes bya ste/ gang gis chos mthong ba'i sgor zhugs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// glang po che'i lag 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos gang gis sangs rgyas mthong bar
403a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i chos de ci 'gags pa dang / 'gag pa dang // 'gag par 'gyur ba'i 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid gcig yin snyam 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// 'di
403a7(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/ chos gang gis sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ci skyes pa'am/ skye ba'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba'i mtshan nyid gcig yin snyam mam/
403b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// glang po che'i lag gal te de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gag pa zhes mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// glang po rmad
403b2(dkon brtsegs): l ag des gal te 'di skad du sku'i mtshan dang ldan pas bdag de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par zhugs nas slar ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa'ang sku'i mtshan
403b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid phyir mi ldog par mthong ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gags pa zhes bya'o zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du dris shig/ ci khyod sku'i mtshan yongs su grub pa la de bzhin
403b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod dam/ des gal te 'di skad du bdag ni sku'i mtshan yongs su grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di
403b5(dkon brtsegs): skad du smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab las ni sku'i mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes ma gsungs te/ gal te sku'i mtshan yang
403b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes brjod na ni/ gyo mo dang / rdo nga / ri dang / klung dang / rtswa shing thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin par 'gyur ro// de gal te
403b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du gyo mo dang / rdo dang / ri dang / klung dang / rtsa shing thams cad la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis med pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes mi bya'o zhes zer
404a1(dkon brtsegs): na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ khyod kyis smras pa ltar mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya na ni/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang de
404a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa yin pa'i rigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas so// des gal te 'di skad du mtshan ni mtshan gyi chos
404a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug par 'gyur bas/ mtshan shes pa'i bram zes kyang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i dngos po de bden pas so zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ gal te mtshan sum cu
404a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin na ni/ khyod bdag nyid kyis mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par mthong bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes
404a5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yin no zhes smras pas/ deng khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan shod cig/ de gal te 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
404a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / zag pa med pa'i dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
404a7(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid du ston to zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smos shig/ khyod kyi stobs bcu la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes smras
404b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pas/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa shod cig/ de gal te 'di skad du ni sangs rgyas dang mtshan tha dad pa zhig yin na ma zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du khyod
404b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid mtshan sangs rgyas yin zhes zer bar zad kyi/ mtshan ni sangs rgyas ma yin no zhes smros shig/ des gal te yang 'di skad du dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos gzhan zhig sangs rgyas kyi
404b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur ram zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos ji ltar dbyibs dang bcas shing kha dog dang bcas pa'i
404b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid du byed par 'gyur/ gzhan yang khyod kyis gal te dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos la sangs rgyas zhes bya zhes zer na/ 'o na ni gzhan dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos
404b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang sangs rgyas yin par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ / gal te chos de dag sangs rgyas yin par gyur na ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bcwo
404b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'ang de'i mtshan nyid byed 'gyur ba'i
404b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ / glang po che'i lag nga'i nyan thos rnams ni de ltar skyes bu blun po rnams rab tu 'dul bar byed do// gzhan yang glang po che'i lag ngas sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
405a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar bya'o zhes smon lam btab mod kyi/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bla na med pa
405a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sems can yang ma dmigs/ sems can gyi ming yang ma dmigs pas/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ rten
405a3(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos dngos po 'di yod pa'i phyir dngos po 'di yod do/ / dngos po 'di med pa'i phyir dngos po 'di med par rtogs pa kho nar zad do// dngos po gang yod pa'i
405a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir dngos po gang yod/ dngos po gang med pa'i phyir dngos po gang med par gyur ce na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod par gyur/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam
405a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen
405a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi/ rga shi'i rkyen gyis mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
405a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams yod par gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gag pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams 'gag/ 'du byed rnams 'gag pa'i phyir rnam par
405b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gag pa'i phyir skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gag pa'i phyir reg pa 'gag/ reg pa
405b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa'i phyir tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gag pa'i phyir sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gag pa'i phyir len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gag pa'i phyir srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pa'i phyir skye ba 'gag
405b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba 'gag pa'i phyir rga shi 'gag/ rga shi 'gag pa'i phyir mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par gyur te/ de ltar sdug
405b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro/ / gang de las mig dang / ye shes dang / rig pa dang / blo skyes pas 'di ltar dbus dang mtha' med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i
405b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba rab tu rtogs par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba de rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos gzhan gang yang thob par gyur pa med kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i chos dmigs
405b6(dkon brtsegs): pa kho nar zad do/ / glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu ston to// glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa
405b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'gyur ba med par rtag tu gnas pas/ 'di lta ste/ ming dang gzugs kyang stong par mi 'gyur la//
406a1(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun 'gal ba'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'byung ba'ang med do// glang po che'i lag nga ni rtag par de ltar chos ston pas/ khyed kyis kyang nga'i dgongs pa bzhin du rig
406a2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o/ / ngas khyed la de lta bu'i chos bstan na/ khyed kyis kyang de bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// glang po che'i lag ston pa chen pos slob ma rnams la gang bya'i rig pa de dag ngas ma
406a3(dkon brtsegs): lus par byas zin pas/ khyed kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs nas/ chos rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i
406a4(dkon brtsegs): lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos nub par gyur pa zhig yin na su zhig lam ston par
406a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ lam ston pa med pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos nub pa zhes bya'o// dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang nub pa zhes bya bas/ 'di'ang sems can thams cad yongs
406a6(dkon brtsegs): su ma bzlas pa zhes bya'o zhes mchi na/ de la ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag gal te de skad du 'dri ba yod na de la 'di skad du lan
406a7(dkon brtsegs): gdab par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin par skye bo mang po kun gyis kyang shes shing mthong la/ rtag par sems can bzla ba'i dus la gzhes pas yongs su mya ngan las
406b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das par gyur kyang da dung phan pa mdzad yin no/ / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas rnams la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston
406b2(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pas/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsrab cing rgyuni mi gcad par mdzad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ni spangs rgyas gcig gi chos yin pas/ de'i phyi de bzhinag d+hAH
406b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes bstan to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i
406b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing / ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad
406b5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad yongs su 'tshol ba legs par thugs su chud pa lags te/ chos thams cad legs par thugs su chud pa'i slad
406b6(dkon brtsegs): du sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las mkhyen pa mngon du gtong zhing mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'brang bas na/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar bstan
406b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du mdzad cing / ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du gsung bar gyur pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
407a1(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin dung ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ba spyod pa'i rje/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing / ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smra bar gyur/
407a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhog nor ba med par 'jig rten du byung nas sems can la phan 'dogs paso// lha dang mi'i bde bo la 'god pa dang /
407a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun gyi ston pa chen por gyur nas yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol bas spros pa mi mnga' bar pha rol tu byon nas da dung ma brgal ba dag yongs su zlos
407a4(dkon brtsegs): shes zer ba la/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig
407a5(dkon brtsegs): bslu ba med cing / bya ba byas pa'i drin bzo ba yin zhes zer ba la/ de ni nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/ sems can gang la la zhig nga la bya ba cung zad
407a6(dkon brtsegs): cig byas pa'i dngos po de'ang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ / glang po che'i lag nga ni dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tshun chad par der nam yang sems ldog cing gyur
407a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par zhen cing mos par gyur pa yang dag par rjes su mi dron yang ngas chos de thos nas/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor rnams nyan thos
407b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'brasdu bu yongs su gnyer ba la gzung ba'i phyir 'dun par gyur pa kho nar zung ngo / / glang po che'i lag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nga mu stegs can gyi drang srong du gyur pa'i
407b2(dkon brtsegs): tsheshes rab gsal zhing rnol mang du thos shing spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang / 'dod
407b3(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga'i nyes dmigs mthong zhing rab tu byung ba'i phan yon mthong nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste lam bsgoms par gyur to// de dag thams cad nga'i thad du 'ongs pa dang / ngas chos

407b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu zhugs te bsod snyoms blangs nas nga la rim gro byas so// nga de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'di ltar 'di
407b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ bdag gis 'di dag gi mchod pa blang ba mi rigs so snyam du sems par gyur to// drang srong de dag ngas rjes su bstan pa'i phyir de lta bu'i
407b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thob par gyur kyang / ngas thob par ma gyur pas chos de thob par bya zhing mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir/ nan tan brtson 'grus bskyod par gyur to// glang po che'i lag ngas nan tan
408a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus bskyed nas chos de mngon sum du byas pa'i tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha zhig 'ongs te/ mngon du lung bstan nas ngal 'di skad du kye ye shes 'di la mngon

408a3(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag nga de'i tshe de skad bsgo ba thos nas lam bsgom pa btang nas/ sems mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du dben par 'dug pa'i tshe dga' bas lus kun khyab par
408a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ / glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis go bar byed cing rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyang thob par gyur la/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang
408a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems rab tu bskyed nas/ gzhan dag kyang
408a6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par skul ba yin/ theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa dag mthong na phrag dog kyang mi byed la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag gcig pus thob par bya ba yin gyi/
408a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis ni thob par bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems pa yin/ sems can nyes pa spyod pa dag la dus dus su rjes su 'dems shing sems bzang pos gtam dag smras nas/ de dag gi dge ba
408b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su srung bar byed pa yin/ bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis chos rnams rgya cher gnyer zhing / gzhan dag la bstan nas ser sna med par gyur pa yin te/ glang po che'i lag
408b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshwa bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis kyang go bar byed la/ bdag nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par 'gyur ro//

408b6(dkon brtsegs): nan tan chos gnyer nas/ / sems can rnams la spel bar byed// ji ltar char ni rlan byed ltar// chos kyis thams cad tshim par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag gang spyod pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas
408b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub 'gyur bas/ / the tsom sems ni ma skyed ces// lha rnams kyis ni go bar byed// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas// nan tan brtson 'grus skyed par byed// dngos po 'di ni nges bden
409a1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ du bdag ni sangs rgyas nges 'grub sems// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// brtson 'grus dang ni smon lam drang // dran pa dang ni shes rab dag/ bdag nyid rgya cher
409a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar 'gyur/ / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// 'jig rten du ni 'byung 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// 'di 'dra'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang zag chen pos

410b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges par byung bar gyur pa lags so snyam du sems lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng sman chud byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzengs bstod cing

411a5(dkon brtsegs): po chen po spyad de/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/ sems can sdug bsngal gyis

411b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang /
411b2(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu zab pa/ shin tu dka' ba/ tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dang ldan par gyur pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
411b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
411b4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa la rab tu dga' zhing yid ches pas mngon par bstod do/ / gang po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u
411b5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgya pa las/ gang po'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya raSh+Ta pA la pa ri brits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
411b6(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/ 'bugs pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tham
411b7(dkon brtsegs): cad la phag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang
412a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye bar gyur pa/
412a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu
412a3(dkon brtsegs): son pa nas/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu mig dang / kun tu lta ba dang / kun tu
412a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer dang / kun tu 'od dang / blo gros mchog dang / blo gros 'phel dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya chen dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang
412a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dpe med pa drug
412a6(dkon brtsegs): cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong po bzhi dang / lha'i bu mtshams
412a7(dkon brtsegs): bzangs dang / lha'i bu blo gros logs gnas dang / lha'i dbang po thams cad dang / klu'i dbang po thams cad dang / ma 'am ci'i dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi
412b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa thams cad dang / 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
412b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni mngon par 'phags/ nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni
412b3(dkon brtsegs): snang / zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba ni mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar de ni bzhugs/ brgya byin ltar sku ni bsnyen par dka'/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun
412b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ni ldan/ seng ge ltar chos thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni sgrogs/ me'i phung po chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni ldan/ lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas/
412b5(dkon brtsegs): bsdus pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis ni kun tu 'bar zhing / stong gsum gyi stong cha'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas/ don shin tu rnam par nges pa/
412b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/ sems can thams cad go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis chos ston te/
412b7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge bo/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dog pa/ yongs su byang ba/
413a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug
413a2(dkon brtsegs): bdes/ bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma stong las lhag po'i 'od kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil du rlag par mdzad nas/ shin tu lhung drir bzhugs par mthong
413a3(dkon brtsegs): skye/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bskyod
413a4(dkon brtsegs): do/ / lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// klu deng nyan thos dag dang sangs rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis// zil mnan khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal// rgya mtsho'i
413a5(dkon brtsegs): dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes pa/ / lhun po lha yi tshogs kyi gnas lta bur// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhugs te// 'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed par mdzad// tshangs pa'i
413a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de/ / tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar// bsam gtan rnam thar ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs// sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal// brgya
413a7(dkon brtsegs): byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang du/ / gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar// mtshan gyis sbas pa ye shes yon tan phyug/ thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal// gling bzhi
413b1(dkon brtsegs): mi yi bdag po snang ldan pa/ / 'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar// 'phags pa'i lam du 'dzud pa rab mdzad cing // thugs rje'i dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes// mkha' la
413b2(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma lam me tha la ba/ / nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar// nyi ma stong pas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal// dri med zla ba nam gyi gung gsal
413b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ / shin tu rnam dag 'gro ba kun la gsal// rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nya ba 'dra// kun 'od zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// ji ltar ri bo'i zom la me 'bar ba// mtshan mo
413b4(dkon brtsegs): mi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar/ / gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni// drang srong chen po'i ye shes 'od kyang gsal// seng ge ri sul brtan pa'i sgra sgrog cing // sa la ri dgas tshegs rnams
413b5(dkon brtsegs): skrag bgyid ltar/ / mi dbang stong pa bdag medu gsung sgrog cing // pha rol mu stegs can rnams skrag par mdzad// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang po gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu thams cad zil
413b6(dkon brtsegs): mnan lam me lhur/ / rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// 'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lam mer bzhugs// 'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// lhag pa'i
413b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can mchis par ga lo 'gyur/ / bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thebs rnams dang // yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// mi yi dpa' bo 'gro la lam me ba/
414a1(dkon brtsegs): mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong // gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthil la bdag gis gtugs// yon tan
414a2(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron/ / grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mang la// bdag gis bstod de bsod nams 'dir thob des// 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog
414a3(dkon brtsegs): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/
414a4(dkon brtsegs): mig gnyis mi 'dzums par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni lta/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod/ zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / khong du
414a5(dkon brtsegs): chud par dka' ba dang / brtag mi nus pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang phra ba la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yal bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni rjes su rnam par dpyod
414a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes su rnam par sems/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la ni yang dag par lta/ de bzhin gshegs
414a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thabs kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni rtog/ sangs rgyas bcom
414b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa nam mkha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' ma yin pa'i yang rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam
414b2(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni mngon par 'dod/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa la ni 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byamasu
414b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa med
414b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rjes su dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to//
414b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/ de zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas/ de lhung bzed dang chos gos
414b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gsar bu las dang po pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang lhan cig tu/ mthar gyis yul rgya ba rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bya
414b7(dkon brtsegs): rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
415a1(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis
415a2(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// mi mchog 'od mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal
415a3(dkon brtsegs): lo/ / rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byam kun tu yang // 'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bsdigs pa
415a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gsung / / rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing // yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mtshig tu mchi// bde gshegs tshul dang 'thun pas mchod bgyis te// thub pa che las rdul bral chos
415a5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ / de dag khyod kyi yon tan 'phreng brjod cing // yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi// byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyi thugs ni skyo ba mi mnga' bar// bskal pa bye ba
415a6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig bas mA yas su/ / sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad// 'dren pa khyod kyis sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad// bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslabs// shes rab
415a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs/ / des na rnam 'dren tshol phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang dang mngon shes mchog la mkhas// dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslabs// sems
415b1(dkon brtsegs): can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs/ / mnyam med ye shes mtshol phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen// spyod pa grang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang // tshul
415b2(dkon brtsegs): sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba/ / de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong // gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang //
415b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'di 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las// 'gro bas legs pa bgyis dang nongs bgyis mkhyen// 'gro ba phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang // da lta lha dang mi yis mchod rnams
415b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / / gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin// bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen// dge ba'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
415b5(dkon brtsegs): dang nyan thos dang / / drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad// rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen// mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas ci 'dra dang // rgyal ba'i rang bsrel mchod pa ci
415b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra dang / / der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba// de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen// dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi// ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga'
415b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shes mtsho khyod la// khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis ga la lhag/ skar me rnams kyis nam
416a1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' sbas pa ltar/ / mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab smras pa// mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du
416a2(dkon brtsegs): mchid/ lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du brlag par bgyi// tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha yi rnams// khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags// khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'//
416a3(dkon brtsegs): dbu snum 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil bar gnas// lhun po rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags/ bsod nams rgya chen byung ba lam mer bzhugs// 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed
416a4(dkon brtsegs): cing / khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes// 'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa// spyan ni ut+pal 'dra zhing yid du mchi// zla nya dri med mkha' la ji lta bar//
416a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lam me ste// lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba// zhal bzangs mi yi mchog lo phyag 'tshal lo// ngang pa rma byA ri dgas rgyal gyi stabs// glang
416a6(dkon brtsegs): po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis/ / sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs bu// stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la
416a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes/ / sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas sbas// bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing slebs// sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo dra bas
416b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bas/ / sde steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs// zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i// mi rnams gus nas lha yi 'jig rten mche// chos kyi rgyal
416b2(dkon brtsegs): po nor bdun sbyin pa po/ / chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba// chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa// 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i
416b3(dkon brtsegs): ral gri ma chog/ tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'// de yis skye 'chi srid srid 'phel bgyid pa// nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur// brgal nas sems
416b4(dkon brtsegs): can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol/ / grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel// bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba// bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston// gang
416b5(dkon brtsegs): na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing / / bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de// thugs rje brnyes nas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad//
416b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas// bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags des// 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgyar
416b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te stan las langs nas/ bla gos
417a1(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
417a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
417a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong
417a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom
417a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par 'thob par 'gyur/ gzhan la
417a6(dkon brtsegs): rag ma las pa'i shes pa 'thob/ myur ba'i shes rab 'thob/ spobs pa rnam par nges pa 'thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par
417a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / som nyi spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob/ sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang /
417b1(dkon brtsegs): ldem po ngag yang dag pa dang / sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa dang / zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur du thams/
417b2(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa/
417b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag nyid du ji ltar je 'byung dang // ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa// mi mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta
417b4(dkon brtsegs): bu/ / sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bsogs pa// khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gi nyen lags// byang chub spyod mchog dri med dang bdag gsungs// gzungs dang bdud
417b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi/ / ye shes mi zad ji ltar thob par 'gyur// gang gis skye ba'i ngogs pa bcod 'gyur ba// shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mang
417b6(dkon brtsegs): por ni/ / 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen la lta bgyid kyang // skyo ba'i blo ni nam yang mi skyed cing // de dag don dge sten par 'gyur ba dang // dag pa'i zhing du phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // tshe
417b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ni phun sum tshe gas zhing dang / / sems can ched kyi bka' mching bla med dang // byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol// bdud 'joms mdzad pa lta ngan sbyong ba po// sred pa skems
418a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam grol reg mdzad pa/ / chos kyi tshul yang bskrad par mi 'gyur bar// sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol// gzugs dang longs spyod spobs pa phun
418a2(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs/ / snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim mdzad pa// bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan du gsol// ka la
418a3(dkon brtsegs): bing+ga'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa/ / tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa// chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyis// gtso bo bdud rtsi ro yis tshim par mdzod//
418a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa mchog la 'dun pa mchis// chos la 'dun pa zlog pa'i mi rigs te// 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// rin chen dam pa bsgrags pa'i dus la bab//
418a5(dkon brtsegs): thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis// bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen// rgyal ba co dri mi lags don du gnyer// spyod pa dam pa legs par bshad du gsol/
418a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyod legs so legs so// yul 'khor skyong
418a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / bon pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub
418b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon/
418b2(dkon brtsegs): la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan
418b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di
418b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' 'thob bo/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang / sems can thams can la sems mnyam pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pa
418b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// 'di la 'di ni chos
418b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa// byang chub lam las mi ldog yid ldan pa// g.yo med tha ba med cing sgyu med pa// ye shes mtha'
418b7(dkon brtsegs): yas ldan pa de dag yod/ / skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir ba// sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir// de dag chos
419a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor/ / nges pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa// bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la lta// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis
419a2(dkon brtsegs): dgrol lo zhes/ / gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par khong du chud// bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma yin// 'dus byas sgyu ma rmi
419a3(dkon brtsegs): lam 'dra ba la/ / byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs// mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa// de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas// dul zhing zhi la rtag tu skyon
419a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams spangs/ / rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob
419a5(dkon brtsegs): bste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs 'thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos thob mo la bzod pa 'thob pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yang dag par spyod
419a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis
419a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur ba/ / gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu thob// nam yang chung zar mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu
419b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phel/ / de dag ye shes chags pa med cing chos kun pha rol phyin// byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i
419b2(dkon brtsegs): lam mchog ston/ / de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la brten pa ma yin te// tshig byed bdag nyid ma ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong // dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos
419b3(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ / de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung // de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan// sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems
419b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyang sbyor/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul
419b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa/ byang chub sems
419b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar
419b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po
420a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so/ / 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gzi brjid
420a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong // byang chub dam pa mchog tshol tshe na sems can dgrol ba'i phyir//
420a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod// 'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyang nyan// thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor//
420a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang / 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyid mi skye// de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med// slong ba
420a5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'/ / grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang // thams cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba med//
420a6(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor
420a7(dkon brtsegs): skyong byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang bkur sti la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor
420b1(dkon brtsegs): skyong byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog la blta bar mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/
420b2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya'o// skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi blta// yon tan ldan pa nges pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul// de dag
420b3(dkon brtsegs): gang du'ang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed/ / bse ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la dri ma bral// de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur/
420b4(dkon brtsegs): mi thob yid zhum med// 'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgyu dang tshul 'chos spangs// sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas// sangs
420b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin/ / lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam spangs te// bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag/
420b6(dkon brtsegs): tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med// thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom/
420b7(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang
421a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas pa mi 'dor ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med/
421a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang 'thun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong mang du
421a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i
421a4(dkon brtsegs): chos so/ / 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing // tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung // de dag
421a5(dkon brtsegs): nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi sems/ / tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du
421a6(dkon brtsegs): shes med/ / gzugs kun rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong // 'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong // 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul 'chos med/
421a7(dkon brtsegs): bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu sbyor// thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen ngon du gnyer// skye rga 'chi bas bcom
421b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing nad kyis rab gzir ba/ / 'gro ba mgon med skyid pa'i btsonar 'dir bltas nas// zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gru sgyur te// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las rtse bo sgrol bar byed/
421b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs mgon dang // dpung gnyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis// bdug gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes//
421b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btab/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe
421b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ bde 'gro 'thob ste/ de'ang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu byed de/ de'ang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ston pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par
421b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ste/ de'ang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / spobs pa thob ste/ de'ang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag ni cang
421b6(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o/ / 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa nags dang sul na rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag rtag tu 'khor mor rnyed pa don
421b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyer min/ / chags med blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing spos pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu 'khor mor bla ma rnams la gri zhu byed// de dag ji skad
422a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor/ / bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed// rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grags pa chen po
422a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur/ / lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud// dge ba bcu po dag la yang dag sbyor bar byed//
422a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dga' 'gyur te// de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal
422a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas rnams las 'grel/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
422a5(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te/ dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog pa
422a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la ro ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos sna ba rnamapa la 'khrul pa mi tshol bste/ yul 'khor stong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
422a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spong ba'i chos so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshetshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bla na med pa'i byang chub
422b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa na/ / tha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med// de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin// g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spos sems med// khyim gyi blo glos yang mya ngan n+ya// skye bo ngan/
422b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba// spangs te de la mi lta rab byung nas// thar pa 'dod pa'iri khrod gnas par byed// dgon pa bas mtha'i rnam pa sten pa na// shes khe 'thob pa kun la
422b3(dkon brtsegs): mi rten zhing / / lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la// seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba la// ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed
422b4(dkon brtsegs): cing / / rtag tu bya ltar sogs pa spangs nas ni// 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dper na bsi ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing // seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin//
422b5(dkon brtsegs): dgas lta bur sar 'jigs yid mi rton// de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med// gsang sar lhung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// rab tu thar bar bya phyir 'bad par byed// gal te
422b6(dkon brtsegs): bgayod dge ba'i chos spyod na/ / bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen 'gyur// mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na// 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab snyun tshig smra zhing // sdug dang mi
422b7(dkon brtsegs): thug rtag tu rnyog sems med/ / rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos// 'dus byas kun la snu ma lta bur rtog/ yangs pa'i blo can zhi dang
423a1(dkon brtsegs): rdul la dka'/ / de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis mgu// ci nas byang chub lam ni sgrub byed cing // de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong // gzungs
423a2(dkon brtsegs): dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na/ / yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di bltas nas// gang zhig don du gnyer ba de dgar 'gyur//
423a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa/ blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang skyed// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul
423a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la rten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor
423a5(dkon brtsegs): skyong rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gis rA ba dang bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'
423a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi g.yangs s+ho/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangasa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcing ba 'di dag bka' stsal to//
423a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la// de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin// de dag byas pa mi gzo ga yo can te// rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams sbyod cing rmongs// rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen
423b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ / de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dga'// kha cig/ tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltas kyang // 'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smra// de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems pa ste/
423b2(dkon brtsegs): glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin// de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'// de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ring // phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon
423b3(dkon brtsegs): tan rab ring ba/ / de dag mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang // phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed// byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu ring // 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring //
423b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni// de dag 'gro ba ltar ni 'khyim par 'gyur// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs
423b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma dad pa byang chub sems dpa'
423b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor myong nga rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor stong pha rol gyi mchod pa la
423b7(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la
424a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rnanas/ na sam ga sa byu gag/ sa / mn
424a2(dkon brtsegs): gon pa'i bcan rtag tu khro/ / bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni// gtsug lag khang nas 'gro che dbyig pas rdeg/ pha rol mchod phyir 'di ni phrag dog skye// de dag sems ni
424a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yod ma yin/ / glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshol btsun// sul 'khrul yod gang la gle ba bya snyam// de dag nga yi bstan pa 'di las ring // de dag yon tan sdang zhing ngan song
424a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhol/ / de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni// ngan song shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba'i 'gro// de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang // chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas// rtag
424a5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khor mor byang chub la mal sbyor/ / ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re// sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che// bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur// da lta dal ba dam
424a6(dkon brtsegs): brnyed pa la/ / gal te thar 'dod pag med spang bar gyis/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul
424a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor stong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bstan par mi bya ba dang /
424b1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba ste/
424b2(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sdig pa
424b3(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing / / gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed pa// de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// dper na mkha' la zla ba yar ngo bzhin// dmigaswA bAr wA la rtag tu
424b4(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa dang / / bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dag/ de dag dus phyis bzhin du rtag tu spang // gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer// gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos//
424b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi 'thung spong ba// de dag dper na ngan skyugs rdza bzhin spang // gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags/
