424b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa// de dag rnams dang 'dris par mi bya ste// de dag me yi 'o bas bzhin spang bar bya// gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang // 'khor lo dam pa bla mad
424b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba dang / / de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rnyed dang thug dang
425a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug dang / / grags dang mtshung 'du phrag dog nga spangs te// sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
425a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal
425a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma
425a4(dkon brtsegs): mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems
425a5(dkon brtsegs): drapa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
425a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba// de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na//
425a7(dkon brtsegs): des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' las rnyed// yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol// shes pa mdag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod// gang zhig rtag tung rgyal khengs gyur la// bla ma 'phags pa'i
425b1(dkon brtsegs): po mi 'dud cing / / sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min pa// chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med// bsgrub dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos// sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa/
425b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas// las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs// dmyal ba 'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam// yi dgas 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed// gang
425b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing / / mi yi dpa' bo sdug bsngal mtha' 'byin pa// de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te// byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya/
425b4(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gnyis pa/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la brnyas pa byang chub sems
425b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis sgom pa la sbyor ba dang mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
425b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la rten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
425b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba ste/ yul la myong ba'i po dngag ni byang chubasams dpa' rnams kyi 'ching 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshigasasu bcang pa 'di dag pa 'phrul to// rtagatus mnas/
426a1(dkon brtsegs): la ni brnyas byed cing // rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi bsam gtan sgom// wA b+hur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te// glang de lus da 'dam du song ba bzhin// khyim la 'dris
426a2(dkon brtsegs): byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang / / gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems// ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa// mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal
426a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa 'di dag dang / / skye na 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod pas// brnyas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur// sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma
426a4(dkon brtsegs): lus bzod byas te/ / bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas// sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang // brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur// pha rol phyin drug sa dang yon tan
426a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / / stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor// yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas// 'gro ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bsam mi khyab par sngon spyod tshe/
426a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du// sbyin dang dul dang des la rtag tu spyad// gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur// bas mtha' nags su rtag parang dga' ste// byang
426a7(dkon brtsegs): chung ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyangs/ / brgyal ma na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur// skyes chen rnams kyis shes de 'dra'o// srid pa'i btson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyam pas// sems can 'khyam pa'i
426b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba mthong nas ni/ / sngon chad 'dir ni shing rje ma chen byed// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs// bsal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing // rang gi bub bu mo chung mjug
426b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor pa dang / / grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang // me tog 'brus bus chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i// nabs smra thub pang ni bzod dkar gyur// su mtshon
426b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcang / / de tshe nga ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur// nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas bla ma rgas pa gso ba na// mi yis dbang pos sra ba'i mangs bsnun kyang //
426b4(dkon brtsegs): yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur// legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yangs nas// lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur// nga ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir// lus dang srog la ltas
426b5(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur to/ / stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir// lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyis// skyes tshon brtson 'grus brtan pa legs
426b6(dkon brtsegs): shes bsgrags/ / gang mo sngon chad srid par spyod pa na// sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'agyur tshe// rin chen ched du rgya mtsho ba thams nas ni// nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas// rgyal po hA
426b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bu zhes bya mar te/ / brjod pa grags shing de ni spyod pa'i tshe// nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya// bsang por byas pa myur du thar par byas// dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong nas/
427a1(dkon brtsegs): nga yis 'phangs pa'i lus ni btang byas te// nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas// de tshang ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur// nga 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur ba'i tshe// skyabs
427a2(dkon brtsegs): su 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni/ / rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te// rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas 'phongs ma btang // rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe/ ldan pa mchog
427a3(dkon brtsegs): gis nga yi ched du ni/ / mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang // srog btang ngas ni de dag gzhan la byin// 'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad spyod pa na// rgyal po che ba bzang zhes bya gyur tshe//
427a4(dkon brtsegs): chung ma ma dri khyo las mi 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang // gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya gyur tshe// nga sngon lo ni stong du tshang bar yang // bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa ba ni bzod
427a5(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ / nor dbang pal yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo // rgyal bu gzi brjid drim med zur tshe// ri mis rgyal ba'i ring bsres mchod rten bdun// mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang rje// stobs
427a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun par ba rnams la mchod pa byas/ / ngani rgyal po 'od gyur ba'i tshe// mi bzang mig can thos par gyur nas nI// de yis ngami mag pa bslangs pastan// de rmo sas mag pa bcad de'i
427a7(dkon brtsegs): nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes bya gyur tshe/ / grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang ste// thams cad du yang rgya chen sman gyi rnams// de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go// srid pa rnams na spong pa
427b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe/ / nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na// bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis// lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas// gang tshong sngon mi yi rgyal po ni// rin chen gtsus
427b2(dkon brtsegs): dud gyur tshe me tog dang / / spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi// cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo // nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe// shing bal 'da' ba 'jam pa
427b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dang / / pad+ma'i 'dab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo // ded dpon seng ge 'dzin du dU ra ba na// snying rje med cing mi bzad rab gtum pa// srin
427b4(dkon brtsegs): mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas/ / rgya shug gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur// gang tshe mig bzangs shes byar gyur pa na// byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa// srin mo dag la na chung
427b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa/ / tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar bar byas// gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer gyur pa na// lha yi bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa// bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su// rgyal ba'i bstan pa
427b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni rab tu byung / / sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na// dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi// rgyal por gang tshong ni gyur pa na// sor mo dra bas 'brel pa rgya chen btang // rgyal po ut+pal mig
427b7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya d+har tshe/ / pad+ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig/ yid du 'ong zhing snying du sdug gyur pa// 'gro ba'i don du bayis btang ba byas// ldan pa'i rgyal po kwa 'drar gyur pa'i tshe// sdug dang bral bas
428a1(dkon brtsegs): nyen pa mthong nas ni/ / bud med cha byad gzugs dang blo nyams pa// ngas ni snying rje la yongs su thar bar byas// sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur ba na// nad kyis btab pa nang pa
428a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong nas/ / nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te// mi de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas// rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni// nad kyis rid par gyur
428a3(dkon brtsegs): la rkang byin te/ / ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo // rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe// rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing // 'phangs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste/
428a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar par byas// rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe// byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// 'khor lo'i mtshan can pad+ma lta bu yi// lag pa phrugs kyang ma bltas rab
428a5(dkon brtsegs): tu byin/ / rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe// snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod de// skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi// gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas// rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes
428a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyur tshe/ / 'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dkar ba'i brla// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni// rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni bya gyur tshe// bung
428a7(dkon brtsegs): med bkres skomanyam thag ngas mthong nas/ / gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa yi// nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyis ka btang // rgyal po dpal grags shes byar gyur pa na// shin tu nyams dga' ba
428b1(dkon brtsegs): yi rgyan mchog dang / / rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhon// gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma btang // rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral// rin
428b2(dkon brtsegs): chen phyir ni de yis dmig phyung / / 'on kyang ngal khros pa'i sems med do// srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe// grog sbur dag ni 'chi bar gyur dogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang
428b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byas/ / de tshe nga yi sems ni g.yo ba med// spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na// rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste// nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga'// nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs
428b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ / skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni// snying rje skyes pa byas nas lus btang ste// gdol pa mi yis mda' rnams bsnun kyang ni// spre'u gyur ngas ni mi de ma btang ngo // rgyal po dbang
428b5(dkon brtsegs): du gyur tshe nga yis ni/ / glang po bla ma rgan dran lus skyabs te// shin tu yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos// de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar par gyur// 'grod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur//
428b6(dkon brtsegs): yis zhag bdun rab tu bsrungs pa'i mi// de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang // nga ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med// kha ba kun da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur// byang chub mchog rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol//
428b7(dkon brtsegs): drug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsnan kyang ni// mche ba dam pa byin gyis khros pa med// dum bu'i gling du nags tshal spyod yul ba// sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe// mthong ba tsam gyis
429a1(dkon brtsegs): me ni ni gyur nas/ / lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor// ri dgas myu ra tshe gang+gA'i rlabs shugs kyis// khyer bzhig ni da yis bsgral byas pa// de yi
429a2(dkon brtsegs): gsod pang gan khrid de 'ongs/ / 'on kyang de lang ni yid ma khros// rgya mtsho'i dbus su son te mgon med pa// tshong ba lnga brgya dag ri bsgral byas nas// bkres pa do dag rnams kyis bsad d+har
429a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ / rus sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan// da ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// sngon chad chun rgyu ba'i nyer gyur tshe// sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste// srog chags brgya
429a4(dkon brtsegs): stong dag gis zos par gyur/ / srog chags nges par gang tshe gyur pa na// nad ba rgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas su// lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas te// sems can bde zhing nad kyang mang
429a5(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ / ri dwags rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan// mnga' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med do// de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa byas/
429a6(dkon brtsegs): dung dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du// nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur ba'i tshe// srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams// ngi yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad stong
429a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ / 'dab chags kun lar ning gyur tshe// 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas// bud med dbang du nga ni song ma gyur// gel ba nags gnas ri bor gyur pa'i tshe// legs spyod ri bong tshogs
429b1(dkon brtsegs): b+hur de la bstan/ / thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkreb 'phongs pa// de'i ched drungs ni gnas kyang btang // sdong po me toga' zlas rgyam na tsa'i che// sdong po pa rnams kyang ngas ni dam bta // u0f7f/
429b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin byas gzong mthong nas// sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas// nga ni sgra yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste// spra yi tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas//
429b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton te// nga sngon ne cor gyur te pha ma'i phyir// sA lu blangs tshe me yis bzungs nas ni// ne ci ci phyir nga yi sA lu len// lo tog smin 'di ma rung byar sems sam//
429b4(dkon brtsegs): ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol// bdag ni brku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len// pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir// de la snying rje bdag gis sA lu blangs// gang tshe thog ma sa bon 'debs pa'i
429b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ / 'gro ba kun la shas shas sbyin no zhes// de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te// des na bdag ni brku bar gzhar mi 'gyur// ne tse legs so sA lu tsi dgar khyer// sri zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na dkon//
429b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni mi yin nga 'dir dud 'gro yin// legs so khyod ni dul zhi yang dag bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na// sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams// spyod pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya
429b7(dkon brtsegs): la yang / / nga yi yid ni spro bar gyur pa med// nang gi dag dam 'on te phyi yang rung // nga mis dngos po ma btang gang yang med// tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan thabs
430a1(dkon brtsegs): dang shes rab ngas spyod do/ / sha dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas// bas mtha' dag dang phug na rU ba'i tshe// ngas ni de tshe lus ni
430a2(dkon brtsegs): bskams par byas/ / gang la sbyangs na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi// sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa// sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te// sngon spyod tshen nga ni rtag tu 'jug/ spyod
430a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe na nga yis gang bstan pa/ / brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang // spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams// tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro// 'di thos gyur nas de yi tshe na ni//
430a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur// de dag zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing // rtag tu gnyid non khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la spang // bstan pa sun par
430a5(dkon brtsegs): byed cing yon tan nyams/ / zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na// 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer// nga yi slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur// mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin/
430a6(dkon brtsegs): de yis 'di yi rnam par ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas// pha rol las kyang rgal bar gyur de yi// bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chu// des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas
430a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ / 'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor ba yin// gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang // rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa// tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bad de
430b1(dkon brtsegs): / yingal bdon med 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po yin na ni/ 'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med// gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa// de la bdag gis ngal byas don
430b2(dkon brtsegs): med 'gyur/ / sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas// rang gi b+h+rUM yos rang bzo byed pa ste// dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni// tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro//
430b3(dkon brtsegs): tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang // khwa ltar spyi brtol che la rgod gtum zhing // phrag dog ngargyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi// dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la 'byung // lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob
430b4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / / chos gos grwa rnams kyang ni kyog par byed// chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas// grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu// de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni//
430b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed// bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas// de dag rtag tu 'phrin yig 'khyer bar byed// de dag pa glang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag phyugs dang bran po bran
430b6(dkon brtsegs): mo bsrel/ / zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la// brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin// de dag 'phags min tshig kyang mi smras med// bya ba ma yin pa dag gang yang med// de dag rnams
430b7(dkon brtsegs): la mchod rten nor dang ni/ / dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor de mtshungs// dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni// de dag la yang mi snyan rjong byed de// tshul khrims 'chal bsku bzhugs nas ni//
431a1(dkon brtsegs): bud med 'jig pa byed mi bzang rab ces brjod// rab tu byung ba de dag padam bkar// khyim pa 'dod pas pa dam pa de lta min// khyim par mtshungs pa de dag rlung ma dang /
431a2(dkon brtsegs): bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur// gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang // lus dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba// de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags shing // nyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu
431a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags ma yin/ / 'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal bar ltung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing // de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi min// ji ltar de
431a4(dkon brtsegs): dag bdag nyid ma dul ba/ / de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul// kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la// de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed// bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir
431a5(dkon brtsegs): min te/ / de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin// 'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni// bdag gis snying rjes
431a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag sdung byed kyi/ / slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni// rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra// de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang // lus la sha bkra n+dan dang gzugs mi sdug/ rtag tu
431a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags min mi dga' cig kyang / / 'ongs shing lhags pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur// lung nod pa deng sdom pa rnam par nyams// de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson// de dag khyim pa ma yin dge
431b1(dkon brtsegs): slong min/ / de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs// de dag so sor thar dang bslab pa dang // 'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur// de dag rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste// lcags/
431b2(dkon brtsegs): kyu btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra// de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni// sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste// nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la// de dag sems kyang gnas
431b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'gyur/ / de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang // bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjed nas ni// rgyags dang nga rgyal dregs pa yongs rgyas te// de dag mi bzad mnar med
431b4(dkon brtsegs): ltung bar 'gyur/ / de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing // rkun po'i gtam brjod pa la'ang rab tu dga'// nye du gnyen la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste// de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed//
431b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su// rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson// gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed// de dag slob ma 'khor yang ma dul ba// nga ni gtsug lag khang
431b6(dkon brtsegs): ki lag gi b+ha/ / bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te// dge sbyong gang dag nga mi rjes 'thun pa// gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// chos
431b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson la/ / dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa// de dag rnams ni sdud par mi byed do// 'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste// 'di ni nga yi lhan cig gnas pa'i
432a1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ / 'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa'i yin// khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyis song // 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod // mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos
432a2(dkon brtsegs): zin la/ / 'di na rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin// 'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song // de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba// nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te// de dag khyim pa lta bur sogs
432a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / / 'tshog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyis ma'i dus nang yi bu de dag/ kun tu spang ba byis par gyur nas ni// de dgang yi tshig ni dran gyur te// bas mtha' dag dang
432a4(dkon brtsegs): nags su de tshe gnas/ / kyi hung rnyed pas zil non yon tan sdang // dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa// rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag/ ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur// phyi dus
432a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag/ rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste// de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams// spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur// 'byed dang zug zer
432a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thab mo dga' ba dang / / yon tan nyams pa rtag tu bsti snang byed// de dag skye bo'i ston par grags 'gyur te// de dgang rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur// 'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gteb
432a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba/ / 'dir ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang // rgyags pa'i sngon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur// ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas brus pa
432b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / / pad+ma'i rdzing bu yongs su ba rnams pa dang // rin chen mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshen dam pa'i chos/
432b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzad tshe// dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba// de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin// spyod pa 'di la rten par dga' ba rnams// de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod
432b3(dkon brtsegs): de ring / / 'di nas shi 'phos yi dgas 'gro ba dang // dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// lo brgya du mar sdig bsngal mtha' yas pa// mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar
432b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / ji ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed kyang // rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag rten pa// long ba 'am 'on pa 'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur// lus
432b5(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu sha bkra 'a byung bar 'gyur/ / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur// gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa rten pa ni// de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur ro// de yi tshig la yid ches
432b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur zhing / / de ni rtag tu smra 'bab par yang 'gyur// de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs// mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun// bkres dang skom pa'i 'jigs pas
432b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdungs/ / mang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyag// sdug bsngal mtha' mas pa dag thos nas ni// nges pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i spyod bor la// lags pa'i spyod la rtag tu brten par gyis/
433a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur ta re// gang zhig spangs rgyas dang ni 'phagasna tshogs dang // bslab dang sbyangs pa'i blo la dga' 'gyur ba// gnyen dang rnyed dang grags brjod
433a2(dkon brtsegs): spang byos la/ / de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis// 'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang // 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang // sdug pa kun dang mo ring 'bral 'gyur zhing // 'di la rtag
433a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yang med rtogs la/ / pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la// rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis// ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa// de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams
433a4(dkon brtsegs): ma byas/ / gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal che la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag
433a5(dkon brtsegs): ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur// mi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par sems par 'gyur la/ zang
433a6(dkon brtsegs): zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur zhing chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / gam dang ldan pa dang / bya wa ltar nu cor sba ba dang / tshul 'chis pa dang / nye du wAr yin par 'gyur
433a7(dkon brtsegs): ban tshun pasngags parlabapa ded pasgrub bar 'gyur/ rang yongs su bkyil pa'i phyir de dag zong du 'juga'o// de ga mas can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma med/ sems can la zhing ba
433b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin par 'gyur/ de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'thar nyan du/ bdag shes pa dang ldan par khasa'
433b2(dkon brtsegs): pabar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le
433b3(dkon brtsegs): lo can dang / phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos bgro ba byed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyus pa dang / rigs
433b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas
433b5(dkon brtsegs): dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa bshags
433b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med par 'gyur na/ ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas ye shes kyis khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong ngo zhes bdag nyid
433b7(dkon brtsegs): khas 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa'ang mi smran/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig/ de dag la ni bde 'gro'ang ring na// byang chub lta
434a1(dkon brtsegs): spos kyang ci dgos/ / rdul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par swA ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang /
434a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nang
434a3(dkon brtsegs): mang ba dang / yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong
434a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis khas 'che ba la byang chub ces mi smra'o/ / tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la sangs
434a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// shes rab 'chal pa la the tsom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ser sna can la bsam pa yongs
434a6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ / mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs 'thob cesang mi smra'o// yang dag pa'i nan tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde 'gro 'thob ces da mi smra'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la
434a7(dkon brtsegs): lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ / spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang 'phrad pa zhes nga mi smra'o// khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ma gus pa la sems yongs
434b1(dkon brtsegs): sa dag pa'i zhes pa mi smra'o/ / tshod mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes du mi smra'o// lus dang srog la lnga pa dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes du mismra'o// yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu d+hAn po /
434b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la smad ba ltar/ ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi sdod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan du sbal gzhan du byed pa'o// lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o// de nas
434b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can// ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che// nyon mongs zil non thab nyon
434b4(dkon brtsegs): mongs bcas/ / de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring // chags pas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel// le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams// dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul
434b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal bar 'gyur na bzang 'gro nyams/ / dbul por gyur pas rab tu byung gyur te// mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur// de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su// gso ma'i khur ni len
434b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed dang mtshungs/ / rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro// der song nas kyang gos dang nye du tshol// mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs// bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin// rmongs
434b7(dkon brtsegs): nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan songs/ / mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang // dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang // mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin// de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos//
435a1(dkon brtsegs): bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams// g.yang sa chen po mi bzang lhung bar 'gyur// de nas bskal pa bye bar thar pa med// gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na// de phyir
435a2(dkon brtsegs): lha sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob/ / rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya ltang ltar// chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so// bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags// tshul khrims ma ngag dge ba
435a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams las nyams/ / byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma tho ba// de dag bstan la mi dgos ngur shing bzhin// byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos 'tshol ba// dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so//
435a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni rnyong gi spre'u la dam byas ltar// nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub don du gnyer bar chos tshig phyir// nga sis rang gi srog ni 'phangs pa'ang btang // chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan
435a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / don med gyur nas stan las lhung bar 'gyur// nga ni sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir// g.yangs chen por me lce 'bar bar mchongs// de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa// thams cad rnam par
435a6(dkon brtsegs): spangs te nan tan gnas/ / bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la// de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi sten// chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod// dper na long ba lam bsal med dang mtshungs
435a7(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor stong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ / bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ tshad
435b1(dkon brtsegs): med par sgyur ma do'i ma de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i byas rtswab rnyig pa dang ga drus bu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mAd+h+ya b+hU/ b+has Ta/
435b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i kha lo skur pa/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
435b3(dkon brtsegs): po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo / / yul 'khor stong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de
435b4(dkon brtsegs): nagrong khyer nyi khri dang / khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba
435b5(dkon brtsegs): shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang / mig mangs ris su bres pas mdzes par byas pa yod
435b6(dkon brtsegs): do/ / de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ @
435b7(dkon brtsegs): na thug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa zhi ga yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to// rgyal po'i khang bzangs kyi nang du'ang rin po che
436a1(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi gter mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur to/ / yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can thams/
436a2(dkon brtsegs): cad yi rangs par gyur to// sems can gang dag btson ran 'khod pa de dag kyang btson ra nas thar par gyur to// yul 'khor sgro ba rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i
436a3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams
436a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu khyod bag yod par gyis shig/ mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ gzhon nu mi rnams kyi srog ni chen po med pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis/ 'jig
436a5(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya zhing / / las dang bya ba dang ming gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te// de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gzhon nu bag med
436a6(dkon brtsegs): bar ni gyur ta re/ / bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re// bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing // bder gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang rgyud// des pa gang dag 'di na bkra
436a7(dkon brtsegs): / yod cing // legs sdom dga' la ser sna med pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang // 'di
436b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung ga rdzo/ / de la ge ba ma kyi / yang / shA ga / nga tig
436b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyan/ / bskal ba bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang // byang chu dam pa 'dir ni don du gnyer// lag pa rkang pa de bzhin rna ba s+dza// sdong pa rnams la rab tu dgas byin na// byang chub yon tan kun
436b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis bsam rdzogs nas/ / de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang // nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te// 'dus byas gar la lha dang sbyar ma
436b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dras/ / 'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis// srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo// 'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can// brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min// gzhon nu 'dri
436b5(dkon brtsegs): la rtag med dge ma yin/ / ngan 'gror lhung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni// pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med// de yi dge dang mi dge gang byas pa// de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i
436b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya yi bskal mang rgya mtshor ni/ / don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de// khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med// don med nyid du ngal ba bstan par gyur// da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byung
436b7(dkon brtsegs): chu bzhi/ / mtshungs me go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir// rkang dang sha dang pags pa de bskams kyang // de lta na yang khyod ni ngalam sems// bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dkal/
437a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dkar// bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs gsal na// sangs rgyas ye shes ring po mi thogs 'thob// bshes gnyen bzung la rtag/
437a2(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs rten cig/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis// de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed// lam gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed// brtson 'grus shin tu brtan
437a3(dkon brtsegs): pa legs byos te/ / lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nus// rdo rje lta bu'i snying gi bsam gtan par// sangs rgyas lam nyid 'di la gnas par gyis// sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od
437a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ / kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa// tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon par dga'// khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs// dgon par gnas par rtag tu dga' bar gyis//
437a5(dkon brtsegs): pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen// skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs la// lus dang srog la sred par ma byed par// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis// yul
437a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang dgod par ma gyur/ rtses par ma
437a7(dkon brtsegs): b+har/ dga' bar byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang byed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin// nam yang grul dga' bar ma gyur/
437b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sring dang / nor dang / khyim dang / grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par mgyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig tu sems shing gnas par gyur to// nang du yang nga/
437b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jig pa dang dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la
437b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang / srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing
437b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyi/ bdag gis cang mi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar
437b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu gnas par gyur to/ / yul 'khor stong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ sa phyogs shig tu grong khyer dka' mchog ces bya ba byas te/ lho dang
437b6(dkon brtsegs): byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so/ / rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog shing dang / bla re dang ldan pa rim pa
437b7(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ / lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so// rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sbrel to// rin po che
438a1(dkon brtsegs): spang tha nga phyogs pa zhis shing bya ma ni'i rjed bye ba sbres to/ / de dag rlung gis pastod da / 'dri/ dbyer na ral mas sa gyun ba
438a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lta bu'i sgra'ang 'byung ngo / / lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ dbang po dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//
438a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ khyed nyin mtshan du glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing //
438a4(dkon brtsegs): ci nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig/ sems can gang la'ang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra zhig ces bsko'o// lam srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza'
438a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'adod pa rnams la ni bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas/ gos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang /
438a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru dang / sa le b+hU maM dang / dngul sil ma dang /
438a7(dkon brtsegs): glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / baglang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byin zhing / skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i phung po'ang bzhag par thar
438b1(dkon brtsegs): to/ / de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ khyim khor yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun mig mangs ris su bres pa/ rtababs ban+d+has/
438b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu brtan pa byas so// de'i nang du lang bzangs cig byas te/ der gnon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so// de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing
438b3(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa thams cad dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo // yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad
438b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel lo// gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsug
438b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ / rdzing de'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo// me tog ut+pal drang / ku mu ta dang / pad+mA dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyus so// khor yug tu'ang rin po
438b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to/ / dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so// rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgya bskyed/
438b7(dkon brtsegs): de/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i srung pa rnams kyis spel zhing / thams cad du'ang shing ta la'i 'phreng bye bas sprul te/ de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bskul na/
439a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzhon nu'i lus las dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong zhes/ rdzing de'i steng rin po che
439a2(dkon brtsegs): dra bas bkab par gyur to/ / de'i tshe khang bzang der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng du'ang ras bcos bu lnga brgya brgya bting bar gyur to// gang du
439a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po che bdun las byas pa/ 'phang du mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der/ ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu
439a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to/ / khri thams cad kyi drung du'ang pog por nas a ka rus bdugs shing / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grems par byed do// gser gyi
439a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga ldi bres so/ / gser gyi pad+ma rab tu dpyangs so// mu tig dang nor bu'i dra ba skyes so// nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so// rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu dpyangs so//
439a6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la'ang ba dan brgya brgyang dbyangs so// skyed mos tshal kun tu'ang nor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur
439a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal den bya'i tshogs mi'i skang du sgru ba/ ne tse dang / ri skyugs dang / khrung khrung dang
439b1(dkon brtsegs): khu byug dang / b+hU dang / drang pa dang / drA pa dang / kun la dang / ka la bin dang / shang shAng te'u 'khod do// de dag srad 'byin cing lnga klog pa na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rtags/
439b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to//
439b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon pa nas lo nyi shu lon pa'i skyed pa dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do// thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas
439b4(dkon brtsegs): dang las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang 'chog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba shes brgyad cu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to// pha ma gnyis kyis de
439b5(dkon brtsegs): la bu mo bye ba byin no/ / nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mi bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba/
439b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug yon pa/ b+hU mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgyumakhas pa/ garam bas pa/ dgong mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i

440a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sdom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi sngob/

440a3(dkon brtsegs): zer gnas so/ / glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra de la kye ma'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang / bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'o snyam
440a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed do/ / de de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na gsad par bya ba'i mis gshed ma mthong na ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang
440a5(dkon brtsegs): bud med de dag mthong na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ / grong khyer de la'ang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa
440a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des pa dag thar par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par/ nam yang
440a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal
440b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer ldan la/ gzhon nu ni ma na to// dmyal par mi mdzad do// dartseb dbar mi spyod do nas smras / bab po gabum pa sem 'o//
440b2(dkon brtsegs): / yul 'khor spyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing
440b3(dkon brtsegs): lus 'dar te/ mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to// de sa las langs nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam pa ltos shig
440b4(dkon brtsegs): smos/ / nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nangs la 'gyel// su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur ngal smros// de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya// khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis
440b5(dkon brtsegs): gang smras pa/ / lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig/ 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod deng myur spros// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan// pad+ma'i mig can
440b6(dkon brtsegs): mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa/ / lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses// ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug
440b7(dkon brtsegs): dedagarab dka' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan/ / glu dbyangs pheg rdo ba dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes// khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad+ma rnyis pa lta bur ci phyir dang
441a1(dkon brtsegs): lus dman+ta/ / me tog 'bras bu mal ga 'dub rgyam skyed mos tshul// sna tshogs steng bzhag sa mi sna tshogs shing d+hA u0f7f// sems shig khyod kyin chod 'dir m
441a2(dkon brtsegs): a yin/ / dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'dir bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// ut+pal dang pad+ma dag gi tshal gyis gang // pad+ma rnams kyang bung brgyags
441a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog gis brgyan/ / de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dag la mi byed// dang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang // ka la bing+ga shang shang te'u dang kun la// yid 'ong sna ldan grangs nye spos dang
441a4(dkon brtsegs): ldang 'dra ba/ / thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba 'thob mi 'gyur// gzhal yas khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ gser dang bai DUR+Ya sa spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog
441a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba/ / gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i 'phreng bsgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan b+hA bsngags pa// khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin d+ha ne// bu mo
441a6(dkon brtsegs): stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ / dga' tshal lnga yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba zlog/ mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir// rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dir ni dga' mi byed/
441a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu khyod kyis rtsed grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba// bu pho de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis// khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci//
441b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gcer/ yon tan bsags babring pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// zlar/
441b2(dkon brtsegs): ba don gnyer pha la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gror
441b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yang sar ltung byed pa/ / sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dka'// bdud kyi zhag pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa che// rtag tu 'phags
441b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad/ / sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bsten// bud med 'di dag pags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi
441b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyer/ / khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi// dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi
441b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas rmongs par bgyi/ / kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis// ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol// shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na// dgon
441b7(dkon brtsegs): rudung shing ltar gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags/ / mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur
442a1(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed mi rug/ sring pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod// 'dod rgyus phan tshun gson pa'i 'grol bltas nas su// 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung
442a2(dkon brtsegs): gis mi bskyod bzhin/ / rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min// bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste// sems kyi dbang
442a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro bar ma gyur pag yod mdzod/ / mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung // srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung // 'dus byas 'di zang glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung // rgyal po
442a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas la srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan/ / lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min pas bskul// 'jig rten phan pa snying brtse ma
442a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi/ / rgyal po bag med sprod la byang chub yod ma lags// rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen skyo sems 'khor ba// de ni bsod rnams chud za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe ba
442a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rgyas pa rnam yang spyad mi bgyi/ / skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar dbugs phyin gyur// khams rnams sprul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra// zab dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong

442b1(dkon brtsegs): bzo ba 'di la badrug bltas nas/ / rdul po d+ma ring ni de dag grol ba dang // gnyid logasang bar bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug d+hArtsa nas gdo dang la ma yog bzlog pa'i phyir// bdag nyis

442b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ma mchis/ / rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro// mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar lhung // byang chub lam shes nas ni
442b7(dkon brtsegs): su zhig bag med 'gyur/ / 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po chog tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus// lhun po'i rtsa nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod spo yis// bdag 'dir

443b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rang byung bi ma pa'i spros/ / sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems// de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar
444a1(dkon brtsegs): @dag/ bzhi bcu mnyam ning thugs bzang chung srung legs par thug/ rgyal bdas pa mchog de'i rnams kyi mche ba bzhi// de mi lpags ni rab sangs rang gi zhal gdong labs/

444a3(dkon brtsegs): tshim byed pa/ / rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan la 'thun// chos kyi 'phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa// sil snyan dag pa bsgrags
