444a5(dkon brtsegs): cad rtogs byed pa/ / rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// bskul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba sbyong bar dgar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod dang 'thun pa zhus nas tshim byed pa// chos
444a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di/ / ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum// dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun yang mtho// phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni
444a7(dkon brtsegs): ring zhing zlum/ / rgyal ba de li sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog/ baspu galas su 'khyil zhing rtsen du re re stes// lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rdza yi 'dra// rab byung e n+ya ya yi byin pa
444b1(dkon brtsegs): glang po'i rna 'dra'i bzla/ / nabs mthil mdzes par bris pa 'ag shis 'al mo'i mtshan// zang po'i dbang por 'gros thabs se ge'i rgyal gyi sgrubs// rtswa mchog btungs pa'i skabs can
444b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po mchod sdong rgyas/ / mkha' las me tog char 'bab me tog gdugs su bya// gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos// rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed pade dang sdug bsngal dang /
444b3(dkon brtsegs): grags dang ma grags de bzhin stod dang smad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med// mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med/ yul 'khor skyong de nas
444b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgul yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde
444b5(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes par gyur to/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs
444b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ci 'dra ba dang / / des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang // de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang phrad pa dang // byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji
444b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang
445a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa smad pa dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun gnag rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang /
445a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar sems gdul bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs su mi shes te sdug bsngal rnam par
445a3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung ba dga' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa
445a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun bcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su ma
445a5(dkon brtsegs): bsrun pa dang / ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro chung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di
445a6(dkon brtsegs): mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pas rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor
445a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni/ bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nus ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
445b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyab par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo/ / de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sngo nas byung na ni nya du'i tshogs kyis ngar chad byas su 'ong dal/ bdag khang steng 'di 'thur du
445b2(dkon brtsegs): mchong ngo snyam mo/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo dag la ba de logs su phyogs
445b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs pade bdag la dgongs su gsol
445b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes kyang smras so/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dron grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/ 'od des
445b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go/ / 'od de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i phang lo tsam byung bar gyur te/ pad+ma do las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste snang ba chen
445b6(dkon brtsegs): por gyur nas/ snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la 'dug nas/ bcom
445b7(dkon brtsegs): l dan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo deg la ba de logs su thal mo sbya rab btud de sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du rjod
446a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ched du brjod do/ / yul 'khor stong de napa de bzhin gshegs pa don thub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang / gzhon nu de sdong po bcad pa bsngal ba de bzhin du de bzhin
446a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal lo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan
446a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas gdod// tshogs ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan
446a4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas ni/ / bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol// 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni
446a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dir mchis na/ / mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu// lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu der gyur cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs
446a6(dkon brtsegs): rje ldan/ / g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhig/ dbul por gyur pa dag ni bskul bar mdzod// mgon po bcings pa dag ni dang dgrol mdzod// som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis
446a7(dkon brtsegs): bcad du gsol/ / byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol// mun pa dag la sngon me mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad
446b1(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ / ldan pa'i rgyal po bdag gi drug rngu b+hung // khyod kyi ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod// srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa bcad du gsol// sar+b+ba la gA brgyad pa'i sam gyi la/
446b2(dkon brtsegs): chen gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang zung // dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam sbyinA ring por mi thog pa 'grug
446b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed cig nges gsungs/ / byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyad na// 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur
446b4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ / 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam
446b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo//
446b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga'ang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor ro// yul 'khor skyong
446b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan
447a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/ / gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis// mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod
447a2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes sdum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di ni rI rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshung ma mchis// thub pa khyod kyi
447a3(dkon brtsegs): smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes/ / kun da zla ba la ba dung ltar dkar// thugs rje dang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa// spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri med spyan la/
447a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// de yi rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khe bas// chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam snum gsung ldan khyod lo phyag
447a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ / tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag
447a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil
447a7(dkon brtsegs): durlag/ e n+ya'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs// bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sadang ri dang bcas pa
447b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo bar mdzad/ / bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas paste// khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra// 'gro ba gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis/
447b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad// khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la
447b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ / khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'// mtshungs med ye shes
447b4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ / khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'jom// khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la
447b5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ / thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag/ pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos// khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la bing+ga'i sgra// srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo//
447b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang // gar la lha dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med// chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi bskye ba med
447b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul/ / ma shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyam gyur te// thugs rjes thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzung bar mdzad pa lags// 'dod chags la sogs nad mang /
448a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'grol rtag gzigs te// bde gshegs sems can brgyad g.yongs 'grel cing // zla med sman pa lta bur rnam par n+d+ha/
448a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non// sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tu na pa'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro la
448a3(dkon brtsegs): dgas dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su/ / 'gro kun shing rta'i phang lo bzhin du 'khor// glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis// de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad// gtso bo
448a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa/ / 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyis// chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// 'ja
448a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing mnyen pa yid du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa// dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog/ sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad// bden dang drang ba mi
448a6(dkon brtsegs): zad thabs tshul gyis/ / yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung // de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag ban+d+ha dag/ theg pa gsum gyi zhi bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pa
448a7(dkon brtsegs): lha yi bde ba yi/ / rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yis thob// mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa// phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// mtshungs med khyod la dang bskyed pa ni/
448b1(dkon brtsegs): gling ba'i'i bdug pal gyur ba la bang+gA cu po dun 'byed pa// ran can dang bzang bdur ldan thab par 'jur// rnam brgyad la mchod pa bgyis pa ni/ 8 b
448b2(dkon brtsegs): abargya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang / / yongs su dga' ldan lha'i bdag po dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'thab bral ra ba dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par sa la mdzad pa// mnyam me/
448b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang // thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa// 'jig rten 'di
448b4(dkon brtsegs): ni ngan pa'i lam las zlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde bzhi pa rdul dang bral la 'god// bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod nams bgyi ni
448b5(dkon brtsegs): brtag tu mi bas te/ / byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni// skal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa// yongs su dge zhing mdzes pa thob pa 'gyur//
448b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs// yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur// mtho ris thar
448b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yi yi bde ba dang / / 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags
449a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'phreng ba ni/ / bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs// rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom
449a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan dbang po zhi bzhi dgyes pa/ / mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyis gsungs thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bde
449a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te/ / dri med chos ni 'grol rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// son tan kun gyi mthar byin deng bstod pas// bsod nasas rgyu chen
449a4(dkon brtsegs): gang bsgrubs gyur pa 'dis/ / 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shogayul 'khor skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i nam langs pa dang // rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bung
449a5(dkon brtsegs): med kyi 'khor du ba'i sgra thos so/ / thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces spras so// khyed ci'i phyir du/
449a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel
449a7(dkon brtsegs): te langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to/ / yul 'khor kyong de nas grong khyer den grong khyer gyi lnga gang yin pa des// rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skadaM ces smras so//
449b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / byug bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo //
449b2(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nus rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang // srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi phyogs
449b3(dkon brtsegs): cha gal ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
449b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ sgyid gsum khyod
449b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis/ / sems can dam pa lta dbang lha maun rgyal pos bkur// skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag
449b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba khyod sgra sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongs su pa// rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug gzugs
449b7(dkon brtsegs): mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyi sa mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad// sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam
450a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab mdzad/ / des na khyod spu bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhini ting 'dzin shes rab dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam
450a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs/ / khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid du 'chi ba'i gzug
450a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ston/ / chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags// rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gda' ma lags// khyod ni dga' ldan
450a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'/ / 'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dga' glang por gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad// thub chen nam mkha' lta bur
450a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rjes su zhugs/ / bcom ldan phyogs 'gar ba ltam pa ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste// sa 'ga' dag tu gom pa bdun por gda' ba mdzad// nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin+d+ra tu b+h+ya/
450a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang phyung // thub khyod chos gang la yang the tsom mi mnga' yang // yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod/
450a7(dkon brtsegs): yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par gda'// yab dang yum dang sa dang bud med rnams kyang btang // gnyis rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing du//
450b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas yongs bskor nas// nags gnas gnas gcig pu nas 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad// khyod ni bdun bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na
450b2(dkon brtsegs): bdud 'dul ba yang gda' ba ston pa mdzad/ / sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskor gyur kyang // khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu ltag lta 'du shes ldan
450b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/ / mya ngan pad+ma zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsungs// rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// khyod ni zhi ba bsil 'gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung //
450b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsungs// kun tu
450b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gda' yang // thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'ang
450b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am byon ma lags/ / sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa// lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod logs gsung // bdag
450b7(dkon brtsegs): gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas/ / mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi// mi yi dba' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba// srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis
451a1(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas byung bsgrubs des// 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhing mchog thob par shog
451a2(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
451a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
451a4(dkon brtsegs): pa don grub blo la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu
451a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
451a6(dkon brtsegs): pha ma de gnyis dang / grogs po de dag dang / bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags
451a7(dkon brtsegs): bar de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci
451b1(dkon brtsegs): nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan de ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ / ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas/
451b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de la gsol to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa/ steng du rin po che'i 'dra ba'i bla ri bres pa/
451b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting
451b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos kha na mtho ba med pa gang yin pa de phyi nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so// de lo bye ba phrag
451b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa
451b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la'ang mi lta na/ dngos po gzhan dag la
451b7(dkon brtsegs): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsung ba de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gnyis sum zhus so// bar skabs der khrus ma byas/
452a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nga ma gyis ma phru/ rgyu sa sgru/ dang 'i du gas rgyu do// khan dru h+ma byung pas ga m+b+ha gyur /
452a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsan ngan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhin po byas so// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la zhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du/
452a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/
452a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rkyen thams cad sogs te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi dri ba'i bla ra dag
452a5(dkon brtsegs): bris so/ / mchod rten re re la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo// mchod rten thams cad la'ang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling khor yug tu me tog gi gling
452a6(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa bsnun to/ / mchod rten re re la'ang mar me'i rdzi bo brgya stong las mar ma bus so// mar me'i rdza bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gis mar me bus so// spos dang / 'phreng
452a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so// tshul de ltar bus lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te phyis rab tu byung ngo // des rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag tu bsod
452b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms spyod pa dang / rtag tu cog pu bste/ nam yang blos ma phab bo// nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bya ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi
452b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byin te/ des gzhan la tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la'ang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos mnyan pa'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar mgyur to//
452b3(dkon brtsegs): la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gyi mi thams cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su bslabs te rab tu byung ngo //
452b4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob cing / yul mi thams cad rab tu byung gis/ bdag cig gis de la rim gro dang
452b5(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas
452b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongs su bzung ngo // tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas mo// yul
452b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom pa'am ming gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// kyi
453a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rtul bru gzhon nu bas
453a2(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na
453a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to/ / grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byang
453a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su
453a5(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa dang / bag yod pa spyod pas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
453a6(dkon brtsegs): thob bo/ / de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang / shes kyi khe la chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / 'dod
453a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing shathang ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / rab tu byung ba don med pa dang / dge sbyong mun par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngamu rgod
453b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems mi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang / khas 'che ba nor ba dang / rang gi dang bcas pa las nyams pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang
453b2(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i ched kyi sman dang / yo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa dang / cho ga nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod
453b3(dkon brtsegs): yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to// yul 'khor
453b4(dkon brtsegs): skyong de lta bas na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas/ sngogs pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang mi sten par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
453b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na// snying ni 'thob dang shes kyi khel song // byang chub yon tan brgyas khebs
453b6(dkon brtsegs): bor nas ni/ / de dag 'a thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo dral// shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song // nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhol//
453b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra// lus ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du// 'thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod// gnam dngas ltar thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra'i
454a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag sbrul ltar ring du grangs/ / de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan brgyas kyang dga' ma yin// mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam
454a2(dkon brtsegs): du song / / sdug pas 'phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams// nga yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas// yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor// bskul pa bye
454a3(dkon brtsegs): ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyis/ / de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig thag mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rgyal bu de yi yon
454a4(dkon brtsegs): tan dran par bya/ / bsams te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par byas// de ltas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtog pas 'phags pa'i
454a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs la brten/ / rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya// bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shig/ byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams sa re// 'dir
454a6(dkon brtsegs): niri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya/ / der gnas nas ni bdag mi bsnyems shing gzhan mi smad// sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mnyes ma byas// rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun
454a7(dkon brtsegs): du bdag la spyos/ / lus dang srog la sred pa ma chag spangs par bya// gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par gyis// nga yi mdo 'dir bsgrubs pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na// de dag rnams
454b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis byinapa byang chub rnyed ni dka'/ / gang dag rtul ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir shing yid kyis 'jug par bya ba'i rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bsta/
454b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod g+ha ra ta re/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la/ yang gang zhig bdag 'dril bslab
454b3(dkon brtsegs): bo/ / bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri la nan tan gyis sgrub na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gan nA brgya'i char yang nye bar
454b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan
454b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
454b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zug pa rnams las sems rnam
454b7(dkon brtsegs): par grol lo/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji
455a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor
455a2(dkon brtsegs): skyong de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam
455a3(dkon brtsegs): bar nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
455a4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
455a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgyad pa las/ yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bco brgyad pa rdzogs so//
455a6(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis
